product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: The media could not be loaded. I apologize for such a long video, but I wanted to capture the candle shooting flames into the air. I bought 3 candles. The other two are excellent. However, this one ‚ÄúHome Sweet Home‚Äù just snaps, cracks, sizzles, and shoots flames out the top. That‚Äôs if I can get it lit.  I‚Äôve NEVER seen a candle do this.  I‚Äôm so disappointed, because it actually does smell wonderful.  The first time I burned it, I had no problem.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: The media could not be loaded. I apologize for such a long video, but I wanted to capture the candle shooting flames into the air. I bought 3 candles. The other two are excellent. However, this one ‚ÄúHome Sweet Home‚Äù just snaps, cracks, sizzles, and shoots flames out the top. That‚Äôs if I can get it lit.  I‚Äôve NEVER seen a candle do this.  I‚Äôm so disappointed, because it actually does smell wonderful.  The first time I burned it, I had no problem.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Renee
review: I've been a Yankee Candle addict for well over 15 years, and this scent, "Home Sweet Home," is the only one I use year-round! This purchase was delivered a day early and is a REAL Yankee Candle, not fake (believe me, I would know immediately if they were). People have asked me why I always buy the Yankee Candle brand? Because they're more expensive than others. I explain to them that I have bought other "knockoffs" to save money before, only to end up getting exactly what I paid for...wasted wax without any scent at the last 1/3 to 1/4 of the jar üòí, so they didn't save me anything. I don't work for the company, but I am a stickler for being well informed, so I know why the Yankee Candles cost more than their competitors... See, other companies only use their scented wax at the top 3/4 or 1/2 of their candle products, the bottom is just colored wax with a hint of scent. This way, they are able to trick the average customer into buying them. Don't get me wrong, at first, they all have great "throw," however, as they burn down, their scent becomes much weaker. Some brands don't even use wicks long enough for their candles, causing them to fizzle out long before they should. Yankee Candle Company uses fully scented wax throughout the entire candle. They also have a high concentration of scented oils, to insure a strong throw of scent, from the first time you light it until it burns all the way down. *** P. S. Make sure you buy the REAL THING, not a cheap knockoff. I noticed that the complaints here are all about the "Cinnamon Sparkle" scent. Even though they're listed under the "Home Sweet Home" one. I ordered 2 of the "Home Sweet Home" scent here, and they're real Yankee Candle brand. If you get a fake one, like some of the other customers, report it to Amazon immediately! Amazon is just a distributor. They'll accept a return, even if your candle is burned to the wick, refund your money, then investigate to persecute the dirty posers!***

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Just sayin'..
review: I have had this scent for almost 20 years, give it take. The last one I had was bought about 5ish years ago and cycled seasonly with other Yankee Candles. It definitely always had a cinnamon smell but not like this. This one is almost satirical! This Home Sweet Home candle has such an exaggerated cinnamon smell, it burns the throat to smell it! You'll notice I made a point to let it be known I haven't bought a HSH Yankee candle in about 5 years. I did that incase Yankee has changed the formula to increase the Cinnamon. Or maybe it was a mistake buying on Amazon? Maybe it's a second? Or maybe I am just getting old and my olfactory glands are 'going' first? The only problem with the latter is the previous HSH candle I had was at it's wicks end and I was able to compare. So if it's my olfactory senses, they went haywire overnight. Yankee offers candles with Cinnamon in the name to let it be known cinnamon is what you're going to get. Wow, if they are more 'cinnamony' than this, it would double as a tear gas agent. Just imagine putting a Yankee cinnamon candle on a warmer during the holidays. One could clear out any family or friend visitors from sheer discomfort alone! This HSH is more than half way there. One could use this to politely clear any guests out of the home. It's just too much!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Teena
review: Please don‚Äôt by this scent. Home Sweet Home it is NOT.  It smells like an old man cologne. It just stinks!!!! I didn't return it because I lit it/ used. Recommend not to buy this candle scent unless you like old guy cologne smell. Lol

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: danielle kristjanson
review: This Yankee Candle smells amazing! It smells like a variety of warm spices and it has a hint of sweetness to it. It's not your typical fall scent so it can be used all year long, but it still puts me in the holiday spirit. I noticed it filled my entire bedroom with fragrance within only 20 minutes, which isn't typical for Yankee Candle nowadays. A lot of Yankee Candles are hit and miss in recent years with issues such as tunneling and no throw, but this candle was a hit! It's melting to the edges and smells lovely. This candle might have put my faith back in the brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: RSS
review: The scent is good if you like a really spicey aroma. I am not too happy about it but I hope the person I give it to likes the scent. Because it smells so spicey, I would recommend using it in a kitchen, breakfast room or dining room. I bought this to give to someone for a housewarming gift because the name of the candle is Home Sweet Home. I was very happy with the way this candle was packaged. It was wrapped very well in a shell of fitted cardboard and then boxed. It was delivered quickly and was completely intact, which is great because the candle is in a glass jar. I think this candle was too expensive, but I think all Yankee Candles are too expensive. I wish Yankee Candle would make more candle scents for housewarming gifts and name them accordingly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: kellygirl925
review: This is one of my favorite selling candles from Yankee. The smell is wonderful and the candle last a long time. The price was a lot cheaper than at the Yankees store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: SCEMB
review: Many years ago they were the best, but now, I'd rather use Colonial or Village, the smell is much more pronounced. Yankee has lost their edge, my opinion.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Kevin and Mari Cornish
review: I'm not sure what's going on with this candle. I've ordered this fragrance, Home Sweet Home, many times from Yankee Candle. The scent is always strong and pleasant and fills the entire house with fragrance.  This candle had no scent. It smells like it should when I take the lid off, but when I burn it- nothing. I purchased 2 of these and both have no fragrance when lit.  I won't purchase these from Amazon again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Chayse
review: Should‚Äôve listened to other reviews but I chose to give then a try bc we love this scent and couldn‚Äôt find a lot of alternatives especially not reasonably priced (if I recall correctly).  Arrived totally broken, couldn‚Äôt even unbox it due to amount of glass.  And of course we have forgotten to return it so will have to eat the cost.  Do yourself a favor and find a different seller because it‚Äôs clearly an issue on their end if this many people are bothering to inform others that it was broken via their review.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: BarryBonez
review: I hate it but I have to give it 5 stars because my mom likes it and it does what it promises. My entire house smells like the inside of a box of Red Hots candies. Other people complain about there being no scent, so maybe there is some sort of issue with consistency in these candles, but let me tell you, the one I have has my house absolutely reeking of spicy cinnamon. I dont really like the smell but the price was so cheap that I gave it a shot thinking 'it's probably not that strong of a smell'. Man was I wrong. So if you like the smell of Red Hots, give this a try, hopefully you dont get a dud like other people are complaining about.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Lori K
review: The two candles I bought are sitting in the exact spot I always put the candles I buy directly from Yankee. Even so, they burned down the middle like cheap candles.  I had to scrap the wax off the sides to fill in the cavern. That helped somewhat build the sides, but the wick is spent.  Huge waste of money. They smell great and look great until you start using them. Reviews on the Yankle Candle website show the same poor quality feedback. I contacted Yankee Xandke and was told the Amazon Store that's called Yankee Candke isn't Yankee Candle. So, no guarantees.  And the Amazon "Yankee Candle" won't reply.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Mom of 2
review: Honestly if you are not in the same room you can not smell anywhere else. Disappointing as i love this as a holiday scent. ****UPDATE. I ORIGINALLY BOUGHT 2 CANDLES. MY FIRST REVIEW WAS FOR THE FIRST ONE. TODAY I DECIDED TO TRY THE 2ND ONE BEFORE SENDING BACK AND IT SMELLS SO GOOD. MY WHOLE FAMILY COMMENTED ON IT. I HAVE NO IDEA WHY ONE CANDLE HAD POOR THROW AND ANOTHER SAME CANDLE HAD WONDERFUL THROW AND SMELL

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Bryan J. Mulholland
review: I love the scent of Home Sweet Home. It's perfect to get you in the holiday spirit.  However, my experience mirrors that of numerous other reviews: this candle is the weakest Yankee Candle I've ever smelled.  With every other Yankee Candle, after one is lit, I can smell it throughout the entire house.  With this one, the only way I can smell it is if I bend down over the candle and take a deep whiff while it's burning. I've never had a problem with Yankee Candle's QC before.  This leads me to believe that my candle is either counterfeit or several years old.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Lori in georgia
review: I never bought yankee candles because of the cost, This year for Christmas my husband wanted us to have them. I bought 3, 2 vannila and this cinnamon. The 2 Val. came in first I was so ready to light them and have my house smell like a cookie.. That didn't happen you could not smell them at all. When the cinnamon came in the glass jar was broken so i couldn't use it. They sent me another with no trouble but, when i got it it had no smell either... Very disapointed to pay that much and my 5 dollar walmart candles smelled better..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Lyse M. Gunderson
review: It also seems that it will only last that long IF it isn't burned CONTINUOUSLY for that amount of time.  The candle needs to rest and reset for it to last that long. I'm not impressed by the scent, but then again, I much prefer earthy or floral scents over food or spice flavored scents.  So vanilla cupcake, cinnamon stick, cookie dough or other such nonsense is not my thing in a candle.  By far my favorite is Yankee's Balsam and Fir. Now that's a candle!  Lavender? YES.  This cinnamon stick is rather weak, just a meager hint of something old in the oven but is is cinnamon? hmmm. not sure.  Could be a baked potato

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: G. Avci
review: I don‚Äôt like food smell. I have an open concept kitchen and living room. So when I cook something smelly like roasted garlic or fried fish, the smell gets all over the place. This candle is magic! I light it up and in five minutes my kitchen smells amazing. Even my husband noticed the smell and enjoyed it. I definitely recommend it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Ginger
review: I was truly hoping for Yankee candle quality. Not even halfway down through the candle the wicked disappeared. Generally, when you light a Yankee candle, it will easily, leave it‚Äôs more than aromatic scent. My downstairs is more than 1200 ft.¬≤, the whole first floor, attic, and the stairs going down to the basement are always inundated with the delightful smell. Sadly, it did not encompass this area in the least. It barely scented my 14x14 kitchen.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Kindle Customer
review: Very disappointed. I don't buy many Yankee candles because they are too expensive for my budget. I splurged on this one since it is Christmas season. I love the Christmas smell of balsam and the spicy scent of cloves. This candle has very little scent (had scent the first time I burned it but that has faded out) and what it has smells more like baby powder. Absolutely no clove scent at all and no balsam scent either. I paid almost $30 for this candle and it will it in the closet because it's pretty worthless as to making the house smell nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: HamiltonLane
review: This is what i think a house should smell like during the holidays. Its a very light, comforting smell. I use it when i have people over and its the 1st thing the mention coming in the door- smells like home. Its hard to decide the smell beyond that. Makes me think of spice cake and cinnamon, apple pie, and xmas. Hands down my fav scent from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Austin Grandma
review: In appearance, the candle is excellent. I have almost burned it to the bottom, and I see no sign that the wick is going to disappear, as some people have reported. Unfortunately, the most important characteristic of a scented candle is the scent, and it‚Äôs much less than I hoped. I purchased the ‚Äúsparkling cinnamon,‚Äú and I can only smell it when I‚Äôm within a few feet of the candle. If I leave the house, I will notice it when I come back in, but it‚Äôs faint. I would not purchase this candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Maria Hull
review: I had received this scent of candle 22 years ago as a gift‚Ä¶.. the smell is as stated ‚Äúhome sweet home‚Äù. 22 years later I‚Äôm still buying it. This is the first time I‚Äôve gotten it from Amazon, and was a bit hesitant. If you are, don‚Äôt be!!! It was packaged beautifully, and soundly. The quality is all YANKEE, and it fills the house will amazing smell!! Great candle. I‚Äôll definitely be buying more scents from Amazon in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Renee
review: As for Yankee Candles, excellent in all regards! I recommend for any reason! Sorry to say that (1) one of the (2) two candles I ordered were broken upon delivery. I heard the glass shards rattling in the (1) one box when I picked it up in the mail room. I am not going to ask for a refund/replacement this time, but will if it happens on the next. This is unusual for me to experience in all my 15 years of an Amazon cutomer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: H.M
review: I was excited to get these candles at $11.99 but I see why they were so cheap now. I've always bought Yankee Candles but these aren't like any I have had in the past. There is no scent! You literally have to put your nose up to the candle while it's burning to smell anything. Usually Yankee Candles when burning will fill my entire home with the scent. I would not recommend these particular candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Robin Alwine
review: This apple-cinnamon scent actually permeates a large room, which I've found a little unusual for this brand.  This scent is crisp, reminiscent of fall and Thanksgiving.  Like all their large jar candles, it burns a for a long time. The wick creates a lot of smoke, though, and their prices have skyrocketed.  Fancy jars and colors don't make a good candle.  Good scent, longevity, and quality wicks do.  Not to mention, these include paraffin.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Teri Barker
review: I purchased this Yankee Sparkling Cinnamon Candle from Amazon and literally let it burn for 8 hours and there was absolutely ‚ÄôNO‚Äô scent at all!  I had previously purchased a Sparkling Cinnamon Candle from an actual Yankee Candle Store at our local Mall.  It was rich with cinnamon scent. I‚Äôve been told before there are cheaper versions and to only buy from the store... now I believe it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Sunni
review: The candle arrived double-boxed, however the wax inside was broken and all on one side of the jar. I melted it down to liquid wax to make it useable. I will only buy candles from Walmart where I can inspect them first. Same price there, $16.88.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: It's rare, but YC seems to have produced a bad batch. I've been buying this flavor for years, but this one smells wrong - only very faint cinnamon. I don't THINK it's my nose, as other candles from last year smell ok, but what do I know. And no, I'm not sick. Take it with a nose of salt.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Candace
review: dont buy candles are sent out in bags and come broken and a ball of melted wax I am going to return this hope no one gets cut all I can say big waste of time and money I cant gift it or use it thanks for my troubles prime time is becoming more problems i might just start going back to stores with this kind of help and service

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Annchapman
review: I have purchased Yankee candles for years and was very disappointed .I remember when sugar cookie candles had a very pleasant strong scent this candle had no more scent than if you had gone to a craft store and bought a cheap candle.. it was a waste of money.. I got more scent from my airwick plug in products... Yankee candle has gone downhill

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Schim
review: I wasn't sure I'd like this but it smells great! I've been burning it most evenings since I got it. Perfect fall scent. I'll definitely buy this one again. Update: In the process of buying 3 more every one that comes is smashed in its box.  Broken glass all over the place.  Yankee Candle packages them well so someone is really mistreating these boxes to have them all smashed up.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Elizabeth V
review: I ordered this Yankee candle because the company is known for its great scents that you can smell through your house. This scent when you smell the candle directly has a cinnamon scent, but when you light it, the candle only has the light smell that it‚Äôs burning without any of the scent. It‚Äôs not even worth lighting because who wants a slight burning smell in their house?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Gary B. Sessa
review: It's been burning now for about two hours and I still don't get cinnamon wafting through the house. It smelled really good when I first opened it, but unless you are right over the candle, you wouldn't know it's burning. Big disappointment. I imagine the longevity is the same as the other Yankee candles; however, I do not recommend buying it since the scent is so weak.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Brooke1982
review: For a candle, it functions well. For a Yankee Candle, definitely not the quality I‚Äôm used to. The top looked like it had melted some but I didn‚Äôt order it during any extreme heat. I‚Äôve also burned the candle twice now and it doesn‚Äôt give off any smell, which is why I purchased it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Tay
review: Due to COVID restrictions, I was unable to obtain a yahrtzeit candle on time for the anniversary of my mothers death. This seemed like a hefty candle and was deliverable in-time, so I went for it with the hopes that it would be large enough to burn in her memory for the length of the day. I was quite overjoyed when the candle burned for three days straight, and it smelled wonderful too. It may not have been a yahrtzeit, but I felt at peace nonetheless.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: IndyColo
review: The only brand I buy or gift. I burn it all the time.  Care and Longevity Hint: For the first burning only use for an hour.  After that snip the top of wick before lighting everytime. This will help keep the candle burning evenly. If it has two wicks as this candle does, make sure when you snip that the wicks are the same size. They always melt evenly with no wax build up on sides and no crater where the wicks are located. Love these Candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: SJ
review: I am not impressed of this candle. I got deceived for I thought it's good when lighting this candle. I regret not taking a picture how the candle looks like when you already have the candle burning because it made the entire glass black because of the flame. Also as I was trying to finish the candle, it didn't continue lighting because there's no wick left. More left over candles as it stopped lighting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: New homeowners
review: We purchase scented candles to make our home feel more cozy.  At this time, we aren‚Äôt sharing many indoor spaces with others, so feeling comfortable is most important.  The candle scents will vary during the year.  This one reflects baking on a cold winter day and anticipated enjoyment of time with our friends and family so come.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Britt
review: I specifically ordered this because it was supposed to smell like real cinnamon. Sadly, it has more of a clove scented base. I got tired of buying cinnamon scented pine cones and I wanted something that lasted longer than they do. Unfortunately I'm just not a fan of the candle like I was hoping I would be. Seems to last awhile, but the scent is not close enough to genuine cinnamon for my liking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: michaeldj5
review: This is absolutely the last time I will buy a Yankee Candle Sparkling Cinnamon candle. I am appalled at the lack of scent this thing puts out. The candle smells so nice when it's unlit. But, as soon as you start burning it, it produces virtually no scent whatsoever. My Bath & Body Works cinnamon-scented candle fills the room with scent. I'll stick with them from here on out. I wish I could return this pathetic candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Jen
review: I'm going with the other reviews of the sparkling cinnamon.  If it is authentic, it's definitely not up to standards of Yankee Candle.  It isn't burning evenly and has an "off" aroma.  My family never comments on my candle obsession, but each one has asked me to throw this one away.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Maria
review: It's FAKE!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!! We've been using Yankee candles for a decade now and this is the first time that we had a Yankee candle that doesn't have a scent/smell at all even for hours of burning. Another thing is it melts and easily. I'm definitely reporting this to Yankee Candle company.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: K-Del
review: I have been buying Yankee candles for years and have always liked them.  I almost always buy Cinnamon stick and when the large jar is done I order another. The candle I bought earlier this year has barely any scent, where it used to fill the entire level of the house with fragrance. I wasted $30 on this thing and wish I could return it. I will not be buying from Yankee anymore in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: lvd Zwaag
review: This is one of my favorite holiday/winter candles. Guests often comment about how my home smells when I have it burning. I have an open livingroom/diningroom/kitchen space and it can fragrant the space. It may be a bit strong if in a smaller space. I've always had a lot of success with my purchase of Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Scott
review: I've placed 4 separate orders on Amazon for 2 candles per order (over the last 2 weeks).  On 2 orders, I have gotten the wrong candles.  Who is doing QC on these orders?  The candles are nice, and they smell good, but when your order 2 of the same candle and get random candles in the box...that's a problem. The candle smells good, but 3 stars because the seller needs to do better.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: mda
review: I  ordered 4 Sparkling Cinnamon candles and upon arrival 2 had leaked wax out of the container and were a mess. One other candle has very little scent. When the box was delivered I picked it up immediately so it wasn't subject to hot weather and melting once it was delivered.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Wendy Tietz
review: I have bought this exact candle at Yankee Candle store and it smelled great. Buying this on Amazon, the best way I can describe the smell is paint thinner. I decided to go to Yankee to make sure my scenes weren't off and it smelled like it should have. Never buying candles unless its from the store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Fran Claflin
review: Send this candle back

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: W. logan
review: I opened the boxes and the two candles sprayed red wax all over everything on my desk and the floor.  I have used Yankee Candles for years and never had this issue. Not happy with the mess.  I have recently purchased a few other scents and did not have this issue.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Jessica Dawn Campbell
review: I love Yankee candles, but just like everything there‚Äôs going to be some since you like less than others, home for the holidays is it my top choice. I was able to give this as a gift though and the person receiving it absolutely loved it. It all worked out and again it was packaged impeccably.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Manilisa
review: The Sparkling Cinnamon: Smells amazing, but a piece broke of easily as I was putting the lid on. Disappointed though because I could not give it as a gift - which is the reason I got it. The Balsam Cedar: I LOVE the smell so much! but I was sad when I opened it. It was all broken in pieces :( so I couldn‚Äôt give it as a gift either.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Sherrian Reece
review: I don't know what happen to Yankee Candle, but I bought this as a gift and also bought one for myself. I was so embraced to find there's no fragrance in mine. I've been embraced to ask about hers. I won't buy another one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Denna
review: The description for these candles states that they are 2-wick medium tumblers that weigh 14.5 ounces. I ordered 3 of them thinking that it was a great price! Well, what I received is not what is described. They only weigh 7 ounces (half of those advertised) and there is only 1 wick. Be careful that you don't get bamboozled like I did.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: AF
review: Two arrived in the same package.  One was fine and the other in pieces.  It's actually the medium 2 wick tumbler but for some reason it's showing the jar which arrived in good condition.  When the jars arrived, they were packaged really well.  These came wrapped in bubble wrap in a flimsy paper envelope.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: kate
review: This has a pleasant scent that is strong enough to kill odors quickly.  I only buy 2 wick.  I don't like that if you don't pay attention 2 columns burn straight down with high sides.  Have bought many candles of this brand. I prefer this wider opening to the other jars.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Evefalling
review: The scent just isn't there.  It smelled great when I first got it, but as it burns,  it loses it scent.  Won't buy this one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: DAVID FERGUS
review: I BARELY smell this candle!!!! very disappointed i thought yankee candle made good strong smelling candles??? either its the scent the candle or both not worth it stick to BATH AND BODY WORKS THIS IS LIKE A LARGE CHEAP DOLLAR TREE CANDLE GARBAGE!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: April Jones
review: I'm not usually a Yankee Candle customer, because they are a bit pricey... but this was on sale, half off - so I said YAY! The scent is nice and it burns for a long time... though you can't really smell the candle when you step away from it... I love a candle you can actually smell... but, for the price, it was a good buy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Monica Dutton
review: This just showed up. It smells great because it is a melty mess out the top of the jar. The lid has been pushed off with the wax. Super disappointed this is how it arrived. Will be sending back for a new one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: elle
review: I had this candle lit for about 30 minutes and could not smell a thing! Not sure if all Yankee candles are trending this way, but this particular one was beyond disappointing. Will be returning for sure as I ordered 2!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Cindy Kates
review: Loved this candle! The scent is fantastic if you want your house to smell like cinnamon, which I do. It lasted along time as well. Matter of fact, this would be a great gift for your candle lover as well. I would buy this again and again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: chips627
review: I have been purchasing Yankee Candles in their store and on Amazon for a long time and this is the first time I have been disappointed.  There is no scent at all.  Not even a whiff.  What a waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle was no big deal smell wise. What smell is question. I wanted my room to smell beautiful and basically this is just a red candle. Also the two wicks are not required it almost takes away from relaxing vibe as the seems to vibrant and strong.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Uboatman
review: These candles (I would assume all under the brand name of Yankee Candle) have far too much soot and debris while burning.  For the price; unacceptable.  Potentially an airborne contaminant.  Recommend consumers look for a product with less smoke, soot and debris.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: cwarriner
review: Yankee Candles are the best I have found, except for Illuminations, but I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre in business any more. Kitchen Spice is the perfect scent for the holidays. But... Amazon said this candle wouldn‚Äôt be available until January, so I left it in my cart and ordered one from Yankee Candle - at almost twice the price. Still waiting for that one to arrive.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Katie
review: This was amazing. When I opened my mailbox, the scent wafted it out towards me powerfully. Unfortunately, the candle jar had cracked. They sent me a new one immediately. And the smell is one of the best and most powerful out of all candles I have ever burnt.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Tiddywagon
review: I don't understand why some yankee candles are really powerful and others don't even permeate the room.  This one doesn't get very smelly when burned.  Womp.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: WhyteKnyte
review: Smells quite nice. It takes about an hour for the scent to really start spreading. Yankee candles usually last significantly longer than cheaper candles, which is a bonus. The scent is strong enough to be noticed upstairs while I burn it on the main level, but is not overbearing when sitting nearby. Product is as advertised.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: njlady
review: The fragrance in these candles is always great and the candles burn evenly.  IMO it's  much better to buy these than less expensive brands where you can hardly smell the fragrance when you open the jar.  Will always buy this brand of candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Irene L
review: This candle is TERRIBLE!! It smells good when you open it. But their is NO  SMELL when burning. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Charmaine Bennett
review: I have always loved Yankee Candles because they have a full and fragrant scent but I am extremely disappointed with this purchase.  This Cinnamon large jar has absolutely no scent at all.  It was an expensive jar of wax.  I don‚Äôt know that I will ever feel comfortable purchasing a Yankee Candle ever again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: LilMar
review: Good throw, nice scent. I don't like "good" smelling scents, my fall favs are McIntosh then harvest. I added this one in the mix this year &I really liked it.  Yankee has a lot more door than it used to but the accents are still true so I'm a fan over other brands. And they last a long time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: laura burch
review: I love the smell of cinnamon pine cones. So I thought I would try a cinnamon candle to try and give me that nice smell in the house. Well my kid's tell me it makes the house smell nice, but it wasn't strong in the cinnamon department. Nice candle, just not to strong on the fragrance. Thank you

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Pennang
review: It came really well packaged- so no fear of breaking. The scent I find pleasant but a very weak. Can't really get a sense of what the smell is as melted wax smell is stronger, I think I'll try a different one next time. Or may just have to get them at bed n bath where I can smell before buy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Gregg E.Miller
review: SPARKLING CINNAMON Absolutely a must buy.  The wonderful cinnamon aroma scent flows throughout your home.  If you like the smell of cinnamon then this is a must to buy.  It is long lasting and it makes a GREAT Gift.  I give this Yankee candle a five-star ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê rating.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle is completely unusable!  It has NO wick to light and it seems have it was melted and then formed wrong.  I can't believe how bad it is.  I will need a replacement or refund.  Very disappointed n this Yankee Candle purchase. I was sent a replacement and the glass was broken.  What a waste.  Poor packaging.  2 candles sent in a week and both were damaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Angela
review: I purchased this candle to have a lovely scent over Christmas. However, it did not have a strong scent. No, I'm not sick and I can smell everything just fine and I'm not Covid or Omicron infected like everyone is blaming it on. Not happy with this weak candle!! Will not purchase again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Sherry13175
review: I don't know if it's the seller selling old candles or if Yankee candle has dropped the ball, but this candle had absolutely no scent! what a waste of $20!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Jessica
review: No scent at all my pumpkin dish soap in bottle has more shell closed than this did burning for 6 hours really disappointing wish I‚Äôd bought bath and body works brands they actually smell for the price

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: J. Fisher
review: This candle was virtually scentless. I burned it for two afternoons and got no scent filling my home. The quality was very disappointing and it‚Äôs being sent back.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Kat S.
review: It‚Äôs not overpoweringly sweet or spicy. It‚Äôs just right and reminds me of my Aunt baking with cloves and mixing cinnamon and brown sugar for sticky buns around the holidays. Like I said it‚Äôs not too sweet. It‚Äôs just right.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Sekhmet
review: Very little scent . The candle wax was in 3 or 4 layers rather than solid . I don‚Äôt know if Yankee sold them to Amazon just to get rid of a damaged product or if the separation of wax was actually due to improper storage .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: J P
review: Ok, weird. It smells like cinnamon candy a bit when you smell it. Light it? No scent. At all. I used to love Yankee Candles but if this is what I am getting, no more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: vls

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Hunter
review: My daughter loves candles. I bought this as a gift but didnt realize it has more of a cinnamon smell. She just bought her first house so I liked the name "home sweet home". She loved it and thats all that matters. LOL

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Nichol Cassoni
review: I received a much smaller, different brand, different scent product. It was during the holidays so I did not have time to return, unfortunately.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Diane

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

review: I read the reviews and figured I‚Äôd give the Sparkling Cinnamon a shot. Quite disappointed. The flame flickers heavily producing an extra amount of stinky smoke and the cinnamon smell is nonexistent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Justine Beckham
review: As a yankee myself their is no other candle like a Yankee Candle.Everyone try..Home for the holidays my sister buys me one every year,I will buy one for my entrance  for the holidsys....Go Yankees

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Christine

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Bernadette Riley

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: txdiamonds

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Patti
review: ....and no, it‚Äôs not because of Covid, we smell fine. That just wasn‚Äôt a strong scent. It was very subtle. I prefer something that makes the whole room smell good. I won‚Äôt purchase this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

review: Neither best scents ever!  And that don‚Äôt fade? The Walmart brand candles may be cheaper, but they burn up in a day.  Plus Walmart sells Yankee candles for $20. On Amazon I can get them for $14.99 to $16.99!! Yankee candles are the: Elon Musk version of candles of FOREVER.  Best customer service!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Stormy
review: I bought 4 different scents and none have any scent when they are lit. I wanted an Eucalyptus candle and they were almost $25 and now they are over $35. They have got to be kidding.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

review: Burn really nice slow ,must keep wicks trim so theres no smoke not 5 star on scent seems less than what yankee is knowen for is giftable thou buy on sale too!! Dee in michigan 2021

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

author: janelle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: I picked this up on a discount and I am so glad that I did. I chose the cinnamon stick, it is not too heavy it smells great and burns well! Especially on cloudy days this makes me feel happier.üòÉ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Tina Camp

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

Not sure how that happened since it arrived in a Yankee box with the jar protective insert, however the box appeared to have been previously opened and retaped.  May have been someone else's return.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Cindy
review: Very disappointed with the smell being extremely light. Normally when I have a yankee candle lit I can smell it in 2-3 rooms. This 1 you have to be standing next to it to smell it. Even hrs after it‚Äôs been burning. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Black Cherry
author: East Coast Propsners
review: We got the Black Cherry candle. The scent is strong and can be detected even while still inside the shipping box. Yet it is also not overwhelming when placed in a good-sized room like a living room. Both my spouse and I immediately declared that it smelled like popsicles (unlit). It really, uncannily smells like the classic cherry popsicle when unlit. When lit, it starts to smell a bit more like cherry cough drops. It is a pretty good scent, though not as "cozy" as certain other candle scents, possibly because the cough-drop scent evokes less pleasant memories.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Black Cherry
author: Alpyii
review: The media could not be loaded. I'm an avid candle user. My candle came unbroken, everything looked fine. However once I started using yet I noticed that flame would be smalle are on smallie. After about 10% of use the wick would not light anymore and would just turn off on its own. Here's my short of video of my candle experience with this candle. Also the smell is a strong cherry but it became slightly overwhelming when lit for more than 15 mins.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Black Cherry
author: Giulia & Ray DeShields
review: I bought 2 of these candles one for myself and one for my mother unfortunately both candles did not burn right . It started tunneling straight down the middle at first. Then once the sides started melting the wick kept getting covered with the wax and going out. Im assuming it must of been some kind of defect because my mother and I live in totally different houses and we both encountered the same issue.  Also I order alot of yankee candles from Amazon and I haven't had  any issues with them burning like this. My mom and I are so disappointed

review: I use this candle for aroma therapy. The cherry brings memories of happier times. Well worth the money and is shipped in a special carton to prevent breaking.

review: i used to buy the wax melt of this smell and it always smelt so good. the candle smells the same way. I like that the smell isnt over powering . some candles give me a headache but this one is a nice crisp smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Psalm 144 1-2
review: After reading the reviews I was reluctant to order but decided to give it a try. First time ordering a candle online, fall is our favorite time of year so I chose, autumn wreath. It arrived in 2 days (thanks prime), sealed in a cardboard container with more than enough packaging, all in one piece. Even though it‚Äôs hot here in Florida the candle didn‚Äôt melt so way to go!! The smell is a perfect blend of clove, leaves and a hint of allspice. Not over powering just right. My mom happened to be visiting when the package arrived. She has a very sensitive nose yet she loved it so much I‚Äôm now ordering her one. My husband also loves it, he‚Äôs from the Blue Ridge Mountains and said the scent reminds him of autumn up there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kyle H
review: During pretty much any time of year I'm burning candles. I've burned cheaper ones like "American home" or "village candle" and I've burned nicer one's like "yankee" or "kringle". The cheaper candles are always faster burning and less fragrant. It's worth it to get a decent candle. Unless you REALLY want a specific (usually seasonal) scent, don't pay more than around 18$ for one of these. I've seen a bunch on here for like 25$+ and at that cost you're better off ordering kringle or some "artisan" brand. For 18ish bucks this candle is fantastic. This specific scent has lasted longer than some others, in that everyday I light it I can still smell it despite burning it for a week. Your nose and sense of smell is logarithmic (like your other senses) and after you have been exposed to the same smell for long enough, your brain stops recognizing it as unique and potent to your environment. It helps to buy several scents and rotate between them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cher
review: I‚Äôve always been a Yankee candle fan, until recently. The quality isnt what it used to be. I received a candle today and was shocked when I took the top off of the candle. It had mold on the top. At first I thought it was just air bubbles, but after getting a magnifying glass out and looking at it, it is definitely mold. I called customer service and they said I may have to return it for my refund. Which means I have to take it across town to the UPS store to return it. I was sold faulty merchandise and it should not be my responsibility to take care of a bad product. Beside the mold issues, which is enough, it barely had a scent. It may smell stronger once it is burning, but there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm burning this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Karina-Oh!
review: It's worth the effort to always see what Amazon Warehouse has in stock before you buy your item. I've gotten in the habit of doing this when I'm looking for a Yankee Candle. I found a Spiced Pumpkin large jar candle just a couple of days ago that was reduced to $13.39. So I decided to give it a shot. All of my past experiences have been good and this one was no exception! It arrived 1 full day early & it was very carefully packed. Upon opening, the jar was in excellent condition. Everything about the candle is authentic Yankee quality. However, when I removed the glass lid I saw that the wick was slightly singed, yet none of the wax surrounding it had been melted. Sort of like it had been lit and immediately blown out. It wasn't intended to be a gift; but if it was it wasn't giftable, so I rated it only 1 star for that category. I lit my candle and in a few seconds, no one was the wiser, lol... This candle currently costs $24.97 brand new on Amazon. I can live with the savings of $11.58, though. It pays to check the Amazon Warehouse from time to time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nancy S.
review: It is a Yankee candle, came in a Yankee Candle box in one piece. Smells good before lighting it. But, it appears that during production the wax was old or something as there are a lot of what appears to be air bubbles through out the wax in the jar. Since its not a gift I went ahead and lit the wick. It is a faint scent, smells good, but hardly able to smell it unless I'm right up on the candle. I like candles to smell strong enough to fill my living room with scent. I wont purchase this again as not worth the money spent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Michele F
review: I have been buying Yankee Candles for years. My favorite is Macintosh apple. When I saw this scent, I decided to try it. Initially the scent was wonderful, my whole place smelled like someone was baking with cinnamon. I thought I had found a new favorite. Fast forward a couple of weeks. Once the candle had burned down about an inch, all of the scent disappeared. I am so disappointed. I have practically a whole candle that has no aroma. I've never experienced this with a Yankee Candle before, however I've read many reviews from people who have experienced a similar issue with other scents. If you're looking for a long lasting candle with a nice scent, steer clear of sugared cinnamon apple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Martha Male
review: I don‚Äôt always write a review for my orders, but after reading the reviews from previous purchasers I felt I should. My candle arrived today and it‚Äôs amazing!!! I am so pleased! With Covid, going to Yankee Candle just isn‚Äôt going to happen. Took a chance and I am so happy I did! It‚Äôs just what my home needs this fall. If I am going to continue to be stuck at home, damn sure it is going to need to smell good!! I have a husband and animals, they don‚Äôt smell good. My candle is my Covid hero!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gina G-Lover
review: The first one I ordered arrived semi melted. See my photos. You‚Äôll see one where it actually leaked thru the cardboard it was packed in & thru that to the box it was mailed in. I returned it & got a replacement. The second one arrived semi melted too but not as bad as the first one. See photos. The top of the candle wasn‚Äôt flat & it got wax inside the cover & like stained it. I couldn‚Äôt wipe it clean. The second one wasn‚Äôt that bad so I kept it & it‚Äôs actually almost all gone because I‚Äôve been burning it. I was a big fan of Yankee candles because you could always smell the scent through out your house but I didn‚Äôt find that with this one? Not sure why?? Funny thing is I ordered this I believe in November/December & it‚Äôs not hot enough for the wax to be melting inside the candle during the shipping process. I don‚Äôt think I will buy anymore Yankee candles‚Ä¶besides the other ones I bought through here & had issues with too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Great scent, arrived within 24 hours..the only reason for 3 stars instead of 5 is because it arrived melted (as pictured), it was supposed to be a gift, but is not presentable, so I'll just use it in my jar warmer instead. I bought 2 Harvest, still waiting on arrival of second candle, hopefully it's not melted too....*note, I also purchased 2 other yankee scents (mistletoe) ,they arrived within 24 hours & are not melted...I mentioned that because its june, & all candles are not melted.*

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe E.
review: I have purchased many different brands of candles over the years trying to find a company that competes in its fragrances with Yankee candles. I finally decided several years ago that I would only buy Yankee candles and stop wasting my money on the other brands, since I am always disappointed with them. I was thrilled when I found my favorite Cranberry Chutney jar candle available on Amazon a couple of weeks before Christmas. However, as I have burned it over the past several days, I have been extremely disappointed. My house used to be filled with the delicious aroma from this candle, but this time, I can barely smell it. I have heard the excuse that people are complaining about Yankee candles' scents this year due to a loss of smell from Covid-19. That is not the case with me, because I have not contracted covid, and my sense of smell is just fine. If other people are complaining, I have a feeling the Yankee Candle Company has changed something in the way it adds the different fragrances to their candles, so now, they are less potent than they always have been. I want a candle that can fill my house with a delicious scent, not one that I have to keep trying to smell! If you are expecting the Yankee Candle of old when you purchase this one, you will be disappointed. Please, Yankee Candle Company, go back to your former formulas for your candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ann McD
review: You cannot beat the price of an authentic Yankee Candle. I live in MA and it‚Äôs hard to find any on sale Amazon had the best selection. I buy them all the time for gifts. They‚Äôre packaged exactly how the company would ship them. I‚Äôve had bathe and body works candles show up broken and glass everywhere. Not these! This candle has incredible throw of scent and it lasts forever! For $19 I‚Äôm blown away. It‚Äôs like getting 4 regular candles in one. No comparison. Highest quality and timeless scent is worth the price. Thanks Amazon for letting me keep one lit every day! Makes my house homey! Perfect gifts- I recommend the sage and citrus, lilac as well. Not pink sands‚Ä¶ avoid that one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Weekend Coffee Guru
review: I am a long time purchaser of Yankee Candles and for the most part have always been satisfied with their products.  That being said, the Autumn Wreath Candle by Yankee Candle is very disappointing.  This candle has no scent what so ever unless you count the smell given off by a typical unscented candle.  Perhaps these candles lose their scent over time and this just happens to be a very old candle at the time of my purchase.  I also had made a gift of a second Autumn Wreath candle to a close friend and she also stated that her candle had no scent either.  At the same time I purchased a second scented Yankee Candle this one being Balsam & Cedar and am quite happy with that purchase.  Could it be just a bad batch of Autumn Wreath Candles?  Who knows?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Pamela Edwards
review: I bought Autumn leaves  2 years ago and absolutely loves the scent. I burned it almost every day due to a large animal population living with us at the time. It was amazing. I bought a new one a few weeks ago and I‚Äôm SO DISAPPOINTED. It barely smells, and it‚Äôs very different from the old one. I also bought Yankee candles in the past that came shattered when I opened them. I even reordered and the same thing happened. I also bought a lavender scented one that is disappointing. Yankee candles used to be the very best. My Fresh Roses one is almost gone ( it was perfect) but I doubt I will be reordering any more. I certainly hope Yankees Candles reads these reviews. It seems I‚Äôm not alone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chase
review: Arrived completely defective. It was visually leaking outside the packaging and this was clearly on Yankee Candle's end because the rest of my products inside the same Amazon box were all completely fine. Absolutely unacceptable. I usually buy from Village Candle instead, and believe me, you should too. I have had issue with every Yankee Candle I've purchased before and never a problem with their #1 competition...I'll let you draw your own conclusions on which company to buy from!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: scarredforlife
review: The last 3 Yankee Candle purchases I made were horrible.  On 6 candles, 3 large jars, 1 large two wick tumbler, and 2 perfect pillars, the wicks will burn to the level of the wax before the top of the wax is fully melted to the edges of the glass.  The worst of the bunch was my latest, a two-wick tumbler in "Crisp Fall Night". After the 6 prior candles I bought with 6 bad wicks, I waited for a year before I bought this newest candle.  I see it's still the same.  The Crisp Fall Night candle didn't make it past 1.5 hours until the wicks were burned right to the wax level.  I don't have this problem with any other brand.  I guess Yankee will be without a customer.  Strangely, I don't think they'll miss me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: DrM
review: I purchased this from Amazon and did not use it right away. When I went to use it, the wick was not useable so I could not burn the candle. I called Yankee Candle since it was outside Amazon's return window and they refused to replace it, kept referring me back to Amazon--even though it was not Amazon's fault they made a defective product. Very disappointed in Yankee Candle customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ariana
review: What‚Äôs not to love about a nice fall/winter candle? I chose this scent because it has a lot of spice accents to it, so I can use it when fall is approaching, but I can also use it as a Christmas candle because of the warm spice scents. I also purchased one for my stepdad and he uses it all the time - and it‚Äôs still very full, so he‚Äôll get a lot more use out of it. I love Yankee Candles because they tend to last a super long time, so they may be more pricey sometimes but it‚Äôs worth the money. Not to mention, sometimes Yankee Candles sold on Amazon are marked down to $15 or $16 as opposed to the full $30 price that Yankee Candle sells them for in their stores and on their website. A huge steal in my opinion! I only ever buy my Yankee Candles off of Amazon for this reason. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: ned stone
review: The scent from this candle is unbelievably warm and long lasting. The fragrance smells like the real thing not chemically made. The jar and lid are heavy duty even surviving a fall from a desk.  The wick is thick and lights up immediately and does not turn off unless I turn it off. The fragrance extends outside my home but is not over bearing or ‚Äúfake‚Äù smelling. It‚Äôs been used for over 20 hours and it is 2/3 finished. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I am so sad this candle sucked so bad. I bought this maybe a week or two ago. And it is literally one of the worst I have ever dealt with. It came with weird wicks. I clipped them in the hopes to fix it. But from the get it constantly will not stay lit. I have soaked out wax with cotton balls. And everything else I know to do. At this stage I am half way through it and to make it work I am dumping out wax. I bought this maybe 2 weeks ago. It‚Äôs a real shame :( something with this is just off. I have never before had a yankee candle be a dud. But I will not buy this one ‚Äòcrisp fall night‚Äô ever ever again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Hal and Michelle
review: The Cranberry Chutney Yankee Candle is even better than it's description. The fragrance is superb and fills the first floor of our home without being overpowering. The longevity is far superior to other candles and burns exactly as it should. If I had to select one word to describe this particular scent, I'd say "delicious". Several reviews mentioned that their candles arrived with the glass jar broken. That was NOT my experience. The packaging was very secure...and I ordered three others. Absolutely no issue at all. GREAT JOB!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe
review: Wife ordered 2 of the pumpkin spice candles.  When we opened them the smell was strong.  Hit us right in the face like a Yankee Candle normally does.  That was the end of that.  As soon as we lit it there was no smell at all.  Was lit for hours and the house just smelled like burnt wax.  2 of these burning in the house at the same time would normally make every floor in the house smell good.  Nope not these.  Disappointed in them.  Will be returning.  Seems pretty common based on the reviews not sure how people lucked out with good smelling ones and others didn't.  Maybe they are hit or miss but usually everytime I've ever bought a Yankee Candle directly from the store itself the scent was always really strong when they were burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I buy a new pumpkin apple yankee candle every fall, and decided to try ordering through amazon and it's the exact same candle and scent. Mine arrived in one piece and I took it straight to my office and light it daily. The scent is amazing and I cannot go through fall without it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: N&G
review: I got the Sugared Cinnamon Apple and find that the scent is very similar to Home Sweet Home, but a little less "Christmas-y" and heavy in the scent like HSH. I think Sugared Cinnamon Apple a good transition into winter months, or good for warmer weather versus Home Sweet Home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dan B.
review: The product is fantastic! The problem is Bezos taking his cut which don't leave much meat on the bone for the seller, and I think that's BULLSHlT!! I sincerely hope, from the bottom of my heart that Jeff and the Sanchez live forever! Again, fantastic product! Great seller! Thank you very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rich Briere
review: The Candles are Fabulous........Best on Earth....but have you purchased one of these to go with it?  3 times the Candle Life by NOT using Scissors to cut the wicks on your Candles.  Don't be a Mister Bungle..... Add this to your order. "EricX Light Candle Wick Trimmer, Polished Stainless Steel Wick Trimmer".  Do I have anything to do with that Company?  Nope..... but you should get a couple of 'em with the order you're about to place. :)  RB https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01N78UYIZ/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_FctOFbPBNDNVA

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kate C
review: Received my candle quickly, however I noticed immediately when I opened it that there was liquid surrounding the lid of the candle. Prior to opening it also looked red all inside of the lid and on the upper walls of the candle. Open the lid and the candle is liquidy and getting all over my hands. The top of the candle has visible air bubbles on top of the candle with melted candle all over the sides. I would not give this for a gift, but technically is still usable it is just not visibly nice to be sitting on top of a table.  I am wondering if this will burn through quickly because the consistency does not seem to be of a usual candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: ajones
review: I have older "spiced pumpkin" candles -- it has a strong, pleasant scent. These older candles can be identified by the label: If it says "a subsidiary of Jarden Corporation", BUY IT!  If it says, "a subsidiary of Newell Brands", BUY SOMETHNG ELSE! These new ones are "meh". I'm not impressed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: EmBee
review: One of YCCs best fall scents (even good for winter). Smells like apples and woodsy as well as sweet spices. Not overpowering but excellent throw. Doesn‚Äôt tunnel too much. I use a topper and every so often push down some wax that builds up on edges with butter knife. Beautiful shade and label. Make sure you trim wick to 1/4‚Äù after each use. Burns best this way.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: LeAnne P
review: This candle was either fake or old. I've had new Yankees in Spiced Pumpkin before, and the smell is amazing. This one? Nothing. I let it burn for an hour and could not smell it. I left the room for a while and came back - still nothing. There is no point to an $18 spiced pumpkin candle if it does not smell and smell strongly. Returned.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Colton
review: Candle was shipped without the original box, loose rolling around in the Amazon box missing the lid. Pretty ridiculous to pay almost 30 dollars for a candle that was obviously not original stock. Even then the candle did not burn well the wicks burn down too short and end up tunneling, pouring out wax exposing more wick did not work either as the wick burned short again. Scent was good is about the only positive thing about it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Merressa
review: So I heard so many Good things about these candles so I decided to try one this year . I usually Grab some Bath and body works but didn‚Äôt feel like going into a store with Covid & all and that‚Äôs the fun part so decided to add one of these to my order . I‚Äôm not sure if mine was just a bad apple but I barely could smell anything I gave it about 3 tries before I decided to fill for a refund but I was definitely not satisfied. If I where you just Grab some Bath and body works They never disappoint

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smells nice but is no where near as nice as a real Yankee candle.  I think these are counterfeit - someone kept the jar and refilled it with a candle but it just is not as strong nor pleasant as a real Yankee candle.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rambonrse
review: I LOVE the smell of fall spices. However, some of the candles made by Yankee seem to burn faster than they used to, which is disappointing. I will purchase this again because of the smell, and price was reasonable (~$18). Wish Yankee would do more quality control with their wax to slow burning time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Hope4Humanity
review: This candle doesn‚Äôt disappoint. It has a very pleasant fragrance that reminds me of holiday cooking, like pumpkin pies, apple pies, etc. It‚Äôs been a staple in my candle collection for years and I use it throughout the different seasons.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Scott Lamb
review: Everyone out there in Amazon Land take heed. Yankee Candles are not worth the money, you‚Äôre basically paying for the name. I bought 3 candles, had them lit for well over an hour and could barely pick up any scent other then the burning wicks. Granted some scents maybe stronger then others, but I‚Äôm not willing to take that chance. Will not purchase Yankee Candles again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kimigo
review: Apple Pumpkin is my very favorite harvest time scent for October and November. All the scents of the season in this one, great throw without being overpowering. The candle is a beautiful color that blends perfectly with my fall decor. Yankee Candle did a great job on Apple Pumpkin!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Laura Kirkland
review: Like many customers say in their reviews, very low scent. Not like any of the Yankee candles I've bought in the past. Also arrived shattered like so many others. What is going on, Yankee??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Todd
review: I'm a fan of Yankee Candle and have even visited their facility/headquarters. I've never purchased a candle from them and been disappointed . . . until this candle.  I ordered this and also a Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup, for the Fall season.  We can barely smell anything from the Yankee Spiced Pumpkin.  For a similar seasonal scent, I'd recommend the Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup. Great scent. Yankee needs to go back to the drawing board on the Spiced Pumpkin.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rcbird
review: I ordered the Honey Crisp Apple Cider candle. It‚Äôs been burning for at least an hour and there is little to no smell. I‚Äôve never had this issue with Yankee Candles in the past so not sure if this is a fake or they are starting to lack. Would leave 0 stars if I could. Don‚Äôt waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mimi
review: I am very disappointed in this Yankee candle. I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for more than 20 years. This my first Yankee Candle purchase on Amazon. In the past, I have always purchased from Hallmark Stores or Bed, Bath & Beyond, and never suffered a low quality Yankee Candle. This candle from Amazon vendor has a very weak scent. Past purchases had scents so strong the fragrance required burning a short 10 minutes only.  I have burned this fake candle almost 2 hours to only get a faint Autumn Harvest scent by sniffing near the jar. Having bought a same scent Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer, I am astounded at the difference being night & day. This is a knock-off Yankee Candle and my last purchase of such on Amazon. I would not recommend any fragrance offered of this cheaper version. You get what you pay for‚Ä¶buyer beware! Burned but not by the candle wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: E
review: I read reviews that said this had a very weak scent, but I gave it a shot anyway. First, it arrived in a Yankee Candle branded box, as if it was shipped directly from the source, and it was packaged well. Although when I took the top off, there were weird bubbles on the top of the candle that deprecated when I touched them...weird! I was just in a full price Yankee Candle store yesterday and it appeared to be the same candle (I shouldn‚Äôt have hesitated and just bought it directly from the store). I lit the candle and went into another room to test it out. I waited to see if the fragrance would carry over to the room I was in, because that‚Äôs what happens with my other Yankee Candles. I checked periodically and there was zero scent. The only time I smelled anything at all was if I stood directed over the candle and put my face close to the top. This is ridiculous. I think this is an OLD candle. Just like perfume, I think candles can lose their potency. Don‚Äôt waste your money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: B. J. Cory
review: I have been buying these candles for years, maybe too many.  For the most part, I like them.  However, because the large ones last a fair amount of time, they should really have two wicks.  Most of them don't burn eve Love You and one must move the wick back to center after every burn while soft or you end up removing all the unburned wax from the edge.  Removing and letting melt usually works but, for the price, I don't think I should have to do that.  Please just add a second wick to the large size.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Florida Girl
review: Love Yankee candles but this was the very first I have purchased that had absolutely NO SCENT!  It‚Äôs still a pretty candle but without the scent‚Ä¶‚Ä¶so disappointing. What happened Yankee Candles?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: 1956netta
review: I purchased this Candle in November, & saved this particular candle to light closer to the week of Christmas. The scent whatever it is did not work for me. There is hardly a scent, & smells nothing like Apple Cinnamon. The way it burns, & aside of the wax looking really weird, I‚Äôm inclined to believe this is not an Authentic ‚ÄúYankee Candle!‚Äù Will be returning!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bone
review: NOT an authentic Yankee candle not even close, burning in a small room for almost 3 hours now and can barely smell it. Sad that amazon keeps letting sellers rip buyers off with replica products. A true Yankee candle burning for 3 hours would over power a large house, with which ever scent is burning. This candle is 5 feet from me and I smell nothing. Got up left the room came back in a few times and could barely smell it when i re entered. Its what i get for trying to save $10 bucks. Ill be ordering directly from Yankee from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe Morrow
review: Love the scent of this particular candle. Seasonal and warm. My kids love it, too. These candles last forever - dozens of hours of burn time. Do need to use a wick cutter, but that's basic candle care. When these go on sale, I love to give them away as holiday gifts because there is such a variety that they are customizable in terms of who I give them to.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chandra
review: I got an off brand yesterday (different candle. It‚Äôs 10000% better than this one) that puts this candle to shame. Also wtf is this? Messy packaging and melted. Will not be buying another yankee candle with my own money ever again. Village candle is way better and much more worth it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nora M .
review: This is the first Yankee Candle that I didn't care for . The scent was not as I expected at all. The scent was more like a rancid and old smell . Was not giftable at all , the top of the wax was bubbly and discolored.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dennis Husejnovic
review: I don't know if what I got was fake but I was never this disappointed by a Yankee candle. The pumpkin spice candle smelled like burning wax, no scent at all. I wonder if I was sent a fake... Never spending the money on them again, now they are expensive for no reason.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: NO SCENT...I have never had a Yankee Candle with no scent!  I was so disappointed!  If you buy Yankee you know that delicious scent usually permeates the entire room/ house.  Not sure if these are factory rejects or what?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Colette Burns
review: I was disappointed when it came and was smashed, but contacted seller and they are replacing immediately.  I bought my daughter one and hers was fine. Several are writing about the lack of fragrance, but mine is great and strong and I can smell throughout my house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lateralus
review: This candle does not give off hardly any scent. Unfortunately this is not the first Yankee candle I have purchased that gives off almost no discernable aroma. I jumped on google to see if anyone else has had these issues with Yankee candles and apparently this has been going on for eight or nine years with even ardent candle enthusiasts and fans of the company itself blogging, filing consumer complaints, and posting to message boards with the same complaint. How can you be atop the scented candle market with the most aggressive pricing and change the potency and ingredients that got you to the top on the first place?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ben
review: The media could not be loaded. I bought this candle for about $20. It was bought using a gift card & I had no idea if it was worth it, but I wanted a candle & this scent caught my attention, and I am not dissapointed. I've had the candle lit for 12+ hours and it hardly made a dent in the wax. I've used it everyday since I recieved it 3 days ago. The scent takes just a little while to set in, but it will fill a room unlike some soy blends. I am almost certain that this candle will last me until March/April. And when that time comes, I WILL buy another. I recorded a video to show the small dent it has made. (Ignore the WAP in the back)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Brooke1982
review: I worry about buying candles online because sometimes they come melted, cracked, or older with no scent. This candle smells like it should and is in gift giving condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Overall, my customer experience is positive. I ordered Cranberry Chutney, which smells just like a cranberry-scented Febreeze spray that I bought last fall.
