On a negative note, the scent isn't very strong...it's better for a small room (hence, my 4-star review). Last, although the first candle arrived shattered, I had no problem getting a free replacement. The next one arrived three days later, thankfully unbroken. In conclusion, this candle is not my favorite because of its weak throw, and I will probably purchase only if on a good sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lisa D. Sample-Page
review: I‚Äôve always loved Yankee Candles,  I especially love the ‚Äúautumn‚Äù aromas.  This candle definitely delivered, great aroma, last forever, would make a great gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: K. Daisley
review: I can't even write a review of the product because the jar arrived smashed and the candle in pieces. Not even able to return it without risking injury. *Update* I've changed this to four stars because the company immediately replaced the broken candle for me without issue.  I love the scent and I would be happy to order again thanks to the great customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Janellemp
review: My household loves Yankee Candles. We purchased the Spiced Pumpkin scent for the fall. I've tried the votive size before and they spelled great. However, this larger jar doesn't seem to smell much. When we burn the candle, we can barely smell it. Disappointing because it's such a large jar. The candle was packaged very well so there was no issues with breaking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: QAmidala29
review: This is my least favorite of all the YC candles. You can't smell anything within the first 30 minutes; after that it just smells like a burning candle. I would not recommend. I'm going with my normal smells next time. Don't get me wrong I still love YC candles but I'm also trying to go towards SOY candles to help with in home toxins and help out my air filter.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Courtney
review: I bought 5 of these for myself and my family as gifts. I feel terrible i gave these to my fam. They don‚Äôt smell like anything at all. Not my experience with yankee candles.. don‚Äôt know what to make of how not good these are.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: kathy b.
review: I always buy yankee candles but I think this is the last time I have bought 3 in the last 2 or 3 months and I do not get that high smell like I got in the past years.  I don't know what you have done but the candels are not the same the smells are VERY VERY FAINT  I AM UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER AS OF NOW

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nonnie
review: I burned this candle for 3 hrs & it gave off no scent, at all. I grew up in MA where authentic Yankee Candles were manufactured. The reason everyone paid extra was for the extraordinary scent, which filled the New England homes. I bought 2 of these & neither of them give off any scent. Dollar store candles are better than these. Do Not  Buy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Moby
review: I am so Disappointed. I read several of the reviews that said that this Yankee pumpkin spice candle had very little scent but others  were very positive so I decided to go ahead and purchase it. Well I‚Äôm here to tell you there is NO SCENT WHATSOEVER! It‚Äôs been a number of years since I bought a Yankee candle as I had become disillusioned with less and less scent that they gave off but this is the worst ever. Grateful that I didn‚Äôt pay full price for this although it‚Äôs a total waste of money for me. Never again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mike Graff
review: Smell is good, but it is the name you're paying for. Plenty of less expensive candles that last as long and smell as strong and good for about half the price. Burnt the candle about 1/3 of the way and the way it was made,, the wick was too close to the glass and it cracked from the heat.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jaclyn Hensley
review: It was major savings and a risk (scent). Hope it smells better while burning. Apple is great, but the pumpkin or combining it has that indescribable unnatural tinge I dont like.  Packaged was impressive! Always worry about glass! Egg carton around the candle and fit snuggled in Yankee candle box, shipped in another box.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Philly T.
review: This candle burned out constantly. I trimmed wick but every time there was a pool of melted wax that would put out flame. This candle did not smell on opening ! It may be old but did not work like atypical Yankee. It was tossed when at half full ,the glass cracked. Very unhappy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Wright
review: This scent sugar pumpkin swirl smells so good and delicious. The scent last forever in your house. I used it one night and came home the next day at 6 pm and my house still smelled wonderful. Coming back for more. Reminds me of the maple bar doughnuts I use to eat as a kid.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bgood
review: I am a frequent yankee candle shopper. I like my candles on the stronger side and this fell way short of that. Its a Light, crisp, sweet, fall scent. Nice for a small space but does nothing in a larger room. Kept it lit for hours, smell didnt last. Wasted money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Diann
review: Very disappointed in these candles. Very little to no  fragrance. I burned and also tried to even use as a tart melt. I would not suggest this candle if you‚Äôre looking for a scented candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: MCM
review: Very strong, smells like Fall, and permeates through the house. For awhile Yankee Candle's candles were not as strong as they used to be. This is a winner! Will order more!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Marta
review: Read all the raving reviews and had to get it now for the holidays. My family walked in Thanksgiving and immediately mentioned how wonderful my home smelled and they weren't talking about the turkey. Fills your home with this cozy, warm smell. I'm glad I got 2 of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: CarrieJo-83
review: While I will admit the scent of the candle is WONDERFUL! The whole candle is garbage. I ordered this on 12/27. This is how it arrived. Melted and not usable. I contacted Amazon.com who said I had to contact Yankee Candle and I did. No response. No refund. No replacement. So this $20 candle is garbage. Pretty disappointed. Especially in the Yankee Candle brand who claims they pride themselves on customer satisfaction. Buyer beware! If it arrives damaged, you‚Äôre stuck with it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ann Marie Thompson
review: I have been looking for a nice fall scent and this was perfect. I burn a lot of candles. I am very pleased with yankee candles. They have gone up in price that was a bit of a surprise. But I guess like everything else. You can‚Äôt go wrong with this brand of candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: DSG YBK Mom
review: Wonderful full-size Yankee candle at a terrific price. Get as many as you can and save for the holidays or house warming gifts.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Schippert, Leslie Ann
review: I love the candle and the scent. However, the base was broken in many pieces. You could hear the glass clanking in the box, so I'm not sure why it was delivered this way.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: A. Mitchell
review: This was my first time getting this scent. Instead of 'sight unseen' this was a case of 'scent un-smelled'. I relied solely on reviews and I'm glad I did - this smelled great! This scent created the ambiance I was looking for and I would gladly recommend it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cynthia
review: Never had an issue with Yankee Candle before so I'm very disappointed. No scent. Can only smell it in Jar or if you're immediately next to it and even then it's very, very faint. definitely doesn't fill the air. Thinking the candle wasn't pored / manufactured correctly- I've let it burn to 1/3 of the jar- still nothing. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gigi Mitzner
review: I was so excited when I placed this order, but I couldn‚Äôt be more disappointed with the fragrance unless your nose is literally in the candle. I do not smell it in my home, which is very surprising considering it is a Yankee not sure what went wrong with the sent; I will not recommend it, nor will I purchase this again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: 1love1life
review: I purchased the Sugared Cinnamon Apple, large jar candle. Scent is great in the jar, but once you burn it there‚Äôs no scent throw. I was even sitting with it, in-front of me while I did paperwork at my desk. Very disappointed, because I do really like the scent, but there‚Äôs no point in keeping it. I ended up returning it.üò´

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susulynne
review: I‚Äôm not sure about this scent and if it will smell. The scented oil from candle leaked in jar, lid and outside of the jar. Not sure what happened or if candle was stored too long. I did light it and it does smell, but, I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs pumpkin spice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Knovi
review: As my title suggests, the scent doesn't travel far on this candle but it still smells good. I bought this candle because I have the car jar in the apple pumpkin and that is amazing. This didn't quite live up to how much I love the car jar. The candle somehow smells a little different, not as good, as the car jar in my opinion. But like I said, it's still a nice smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: X
review: I was a bit skeptical to buy another candle from Amazon. The previous candle I purchased from Amazon was melted to one side of the jar (I was able to melt the wax and reset the wick). And I've read the reviews about similar melted candle problems, and people complaining about no scent. But I'm very happy with this purchase. This candle arrived in perfect condition and has plenty of scent. Exactly what I expected it to be.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: G.K. Ray
review: I have been a loyal customer of Yankee Candle for years. I love their products; the scents are always perfectly concentrated for me to enjoy the holiday season especially. I appreciate their willingness to replace my deliveries twice. However, I will NO LONGER buy their candles online. As wondrous as their products are, their package team leaves much to be desired. Every order and complimentary replacement arrived broken. Package glass better, please! Thank you for the replacements, but get it together.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mellowjade
review: I got 2 of these but I have to say - they really lack in scent. Not sure if I got an old batch or what but they weren't what I expected. I find that some Yankee candles just lack in general so that could be the case with this particular scent. Won't purchase again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: mesh
review: I don‚Äôt know if this spiced pumpkin candle had been shelved for too long or what but what I received was packaged oddly, with bubble wrap not in normal cardboard fitted for candles. The top showed signs that the inside was melting at some point & it smelled nothing like the Yankee Candle spiced pumpkin I‚Äôve had in the past. I believe the candle was old.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Drew
review: Smells fantastic. Throws a pretty strong scent when lit, not overwhelming but noticeable. What's more surprising is that I actually catch a whiff of it walking by when its not even lit. The pumpkin spice is perfect for fall. Was supposed to take a couple of weeks to arrive but actually came in only a few days.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I bought Autumn Wreath so that my living room could be infused with a holiday scent.  The candle is basically a red candle in a jar with zero scent.  It has a slight scent when you get your nose right up to it--but then you risk burning it off.  I really regret this purchase --stay away.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sunny417
review: The spiced pumpkin candle smells great, really helps put me in the mood for the holidays.  It arrived on time and in great condition.  I burned it in my family room and within 5-10 minutes the smell had really moved into the entire room and into our adjacent kitchen.  Happy with this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: April Jones
review: Yankee candles are not my go-to, but they were on sale, half off... so I said, "what the heck..." They last a long time and smell nice up close - you can not smell them when you step away and they don't really add a scent to the room. At this price, I would definitely buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: D. M. DiCioccio
review: Here‚Äôs a pro tip. If you pay less than $20 retail for a large Yankee candle, it is going to be weakly scented. I would have to burn 10 of these autumn wreath candles for $16.99 in order to get the scent that I would for one regularly scented autumn wreath Yankee 22 ounce candle. Buyer beware.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Debby Ng
review: Just go to the store and buy one - it's not worth it. I don't have time in my day to return it and don't want to spend my weekend driving to an amazon or ups store. Its an expensive candle to look like this when you get it. It does smell good but I suggest going to the store because it's unusable like this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Christina Vasquez
review: Disappointed this candle arrived damaged and melted. I was planning to give this as a gift but will need to return it. Next time, I‚Äôll take the time to go into the Yankee store or order online. I‚Äôve never had issues when ordering directly from Yankee but was trying to avoid having to go to the mall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: J. Baird
review: I mostly burn candles in the winter months only, that being said this is my favorite or tied with my other favorite which is the wreath scent from Yankee candle, especially around the holidays. It burns slow and smells great, leaving a nice homey scent for my apartment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kalliope
review: Bought this as a gift and the person who received it has raved about it.  The most important part being the fragrance.  As with all Yankee candles - it burns well, last a long time and the color was perfect for Christmas.  Would recommend - the person has already bought another one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kristie Roseman
review: My candle was delivered today and as soon as I opened my front door, I could smell it. Opened up the box to find a melted gooey scented mess that used to be a yankee candle. I‚Äôll have to go back to buying candies in store. Good scent though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Melanie
review: Autumn wreath makes you feel like it is fall all year round. For those of you who agree with me that fall is clearly the superior season, you will quickly see that autumn wreath is also the superior scent of all of the Yankee candles. No cap!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: MDC
review: Was hesitant after reading several reviews claiming product was damaged or suspected to be not authentic. I‚Äôve had this particular scent before and I am happy to report that my candle was delivered quickly and in perfect condition. The throw is great I am sitting more than several feet from it and I can smell it just perfectly. Very happy with my purchase and the cost. Would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Just me
review: I order these every Christmas for the wife although last year the glass kept breaking. And Amazon did there best to get it in one piece. Orders it this year and the new packing is perfect got it in one piece and of course yankee candels are always the best

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Shyla Smith
review: I have left this burning for two days. There is absolutely no sense whatsoever. Yankee candles I have gone in the toilet the last two years.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jeff
review: I love the scent of this candle because it smells like Christmas.  I actually used a candle warmer to melt it.  I use it in the months of Oct-Jan. I even had a co-worker to step in and say it smells like Christmas because she could smell it in the hallway...she loved it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: A reader
review: This scent is warm and welcoming and works for both fall and the holidays. I like the Yankee Candles because the scents seem to be high quality and I'm often over-sensitive to perfumes. They also last a long, long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Carol Schon
review: This fall fragrance quickly became a new favorite for my daughter and me from the 1st time we lit it!  It is a perfect mix of the apple notes with pumpkin and permeates our house the entire time while the candle burns, albeit 1 hour or 4 hours! I've now ordered 10 as gifts for family and friends!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kourtney Anne Green
review: Best candle ever

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Steve-o
review: I bought this for a family member, and was surprised when someone gave my wife the same scent! I found myself lighting it all the time. Even when it's not lit, I will catch a wiff of it when I walk by and always think, "Wow! Something over there smells good!"

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Anthony
review: I‚Äôve been looking for different scented candles and I decided to try this one out. I purchased it a few days ago and I honestly have no complaints about the overall candle. Smells the entire room and it‚Äôs not too heavy, burns at a good enough pace to last you a while and it seems well designed. However, I ordered the Apple Cider scented candle and as you can see, I received French Vanilla. Didn‚Äôt want to deal with the hassle of returning it but besides that it‚Äôs a great candle and would‚Äôve given it 5 stars if the right product was delivered.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jacqueline D.
review: The scent was good smelled like Cinnamon and filled the the living room. I would definitely gift this candle. I love Yankee Candles so I burn them often. I wish they'd last a little longer but the quality and scent are worth the sacrifice to me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Casey
review: I bought this candle when it was on sale. I have another Yankee Candle I bought from Kohls and I love it! This one doesn't smell bad, but does not put out much fragrance when you burn it at all. Bath and Body Works candles are far better than this particular Yankee Candle. Would not purchase this one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susan B. Southwell
review: The price was great and I love the scent. Arrived the next day!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Elbat53
review: For being a Yankee candle, I expected a strong fragrance and a good throw. Unfortunately, I got neither. The most prominent smell that comes from this candle is that of the burning wick. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: ELM
review: Overall, I really like the candles from Yankee Candle. This candle has a really good blend of both apple, and pumpkin spice scents. I would 100% buy these again for burning at home during the fall & Holiday seasons.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: NJN
review: I think this candle is a fake....this is my favorite fall scent, but this candle that I just wasted $17.00 on smells like burning wax....it seriously has ZERO SCENT! Not even a hint of Spiced Pumpkin...I definitely think this is a fake Yankee Candle! Buyer beware!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joanne
review: I expected a warm, fall, pumpkin scent.....nothing. How??? No one in the family can smell when it‚Äôs burning. Hello quality control.....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ava Joy Porter
review: Candle snells nice and the glass holder looks good.  A bit pricey but great gift idea.  The best part is that the packaging is awesome.  The only reason why not 5 stars was because I would have preferred a stronger atoma.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: tort
review: I ordered the Pumpkin spice.  Upon opening the jar, the smell was pleasant.  After burning it for about an hour there was zero scent in the room where I had it.  I usually buy Bath and Body works and will be going back after this disappointing experience.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: L & K Dean
review: Yankee never fails to satisfy! Thank you, Amazon, for carrying this perennial favorite.  I bought it for my daughter who lives in Southern CA, and misses the scents of the north in the fall. Always the best!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: MAK1965
review: Scent is strong! It is very nice. I put in laundry room near A/C  ducts and the entire house Upstairs and Downstairs smell great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cynthia
review: The smell is absolutely delicious.  Definitely made the house feel like fall.  I would have lit this year-round, but I had it lit almost non-stop and was used up pretty fast.  Didn't give me any headaches/migraines.  No allergy reactions.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Beth
review: I bought this and the candle was all melted in a lump with the wick buried. I tried to remelt the candle several times and reset the wick however this didn't work either. I ended up throwing it out. You can keep the $30 because it's the last $30 I will ever spend on your candles. Adios.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cory
review: Yep, it was probably from leftover stock, but it was perfectly fine. Smells like Caramel Apple, had a nice wafting aroma Well-boxed, no problems with shipping I would recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amber
review: The candle scent is amazing, however it isn't really giftable due to the packaging. Wherever it came from must have been warm, because the wax has bled into the lid. So it doesn't have an attractive appearance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: L. Amundsen
review: I love Yankee Candles, and I like Midsummer's Night, but I ordered Cranberry Chutney. I'm not dealing with the hassle of a return during Christmas, so I'm glad I at least like the scent I  got.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Foxys' Mom
review: The candle smells great but it arrived with the jar in pieces. Customer service was excellent about the whole thing. I think these need to be package more carefully. There shouldve been bubble wrap inside but there was just a cardboard holder that was also broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kate Cullen
review: Candle wax was melted and slid as it resolidified  so it covers most the wick. The lid didn't seal good because its lined with melted wax. It fell off as I was moving the candle and it shattered! The wax is all bubbly. Not sure if i will be able to salvage this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Monika Flynn
review: There is hardly any smell with this candle. This scent has been my fall favorite for years, and you could smell it all over the house. This one barely gives off a scent. You have to sit right next to it. I'm mad I dropped $30 on this dud. Should have gone straight to yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Angela
review: Used different angles and distances for others to see the the size, it‚Äôs pretty to look at and smells great! Package was great, no damage at all, shipping was quick. The person who delivered it put it on the wrong door, I had to swap packages because I received someone else‚Äôs package and they had mine...other than that all is perfect!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joseph Melendez
review: This came but the glass was cracked in half. Maybe damaged in shipping. Needless to say somewhat disappointed BUT, the candle was in tacked so I took it out and put it in a similar sized glass jar and poof, new candle. üëç‚ò∫Ô∏è

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mark
review: This is the third time buying this candle. I bought two last year and gifted one of them. This year, it was gifted as a birthday present. This scent couldn‚Äôt describe fall any better!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: K
review: Best smelling Fall candle around!  I re-purchase this same exact candle every year.  I burn it every night and even after one month still going strong. Lasts a long time. Highly recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: L. Kulczycki
review: Love Yankee Candles!  Lasts a long time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: rosemary keshock
review: I was really expecting a stronger scent. This company has never disappointed me. Been buying their products for many many years. However this one really didn‚Äôt have that item scent. Or it was so mild I couldn‚Äôt pick it up. But yet the other scent that I ordered is very strong!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: bee
review: I ordered the cranberry chutney candle and has no fragrant at all. I only buy yankee candles and this one is the first yankee candle that doesn't not smell at all. So disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nicole
review: I orders 4 and 2 came melted with oils that leaked out from wax. I want to gift them to family members embracing home school/ Covid that is starting in less than 2 weeks. Unfortunately, I can not give them out as gift bc of the mess and deformities.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sally D.
review: I ordered 2 Cranberry Chutney large jar candles, the boxes were labeled on the outside with Cranberry Chutney but when I opened them they were both Midsummer's Night.  I don't know if I like them, not sure I want 4 of them if I try to order again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Patricia
review: Wonderful holiday smell!! Well packaged. Amazing speedy delivery! (My candle order came 3 days earlier than expected, and on a weekend before 3pm.  AMAZING! And... I have yet to dislike any of the Yankee candle‚Äôs smell... every gamble or ‚Äúnew‚Äù scent I have tried... I LOVE!  All so amazing. Will buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sean Perry
review: I was expecting a nice strong scent throughout the house but this candle was a let down especially for the price. The scent is not that good like other candle brands and not nearly as aromatic when lit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Obother
review: Cranberry Chutney is one of my favorite scents of Yankee Candles. Yankee Candles are always high quality candles. I never fear getting a bad candle. Great product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chris J
review: One of my favorite scents! Comes in a Yankee Candle box, with appropriate packaging so it can't get damaged. Very impressed. Smells amazing, and was a great deal when I purchased it! Definitely wouldn't hesitate buying again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: AL
review: candle came undamaged, burned it for about 3 hours and it filled half the house with great cinnamon and apples smell. burns slower and has stronger scent than box store candles. Am saving it to burn Thanksgiving thru Christmas to fill house with a holiday scent.  very pleased and worth the 18.88 price

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Wevsbell
review: Scent is really nice, one of the things I look forward to in the fall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lisa
review: this came with some liquified oily residue that had seeped thru the inner packing, and was all over my hands when I took it out. I burned it for 4 hours and no smell AT ALL even standing over it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Vicki Perkins
review: Very disappointed. This candle had zero scent. I burned it for several hours and could not detect any scent after being outside and coming into the house. Smelled great when I took the lid off, but that‚Äôs where it ended.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Veed
review: Very disappointed in this candle. I expected to receive a nice candle that would fill my small apartment with the smell of spiced pumpkin. I can barely smell anything. DO NOT BUY this candle. It is not worth  what it cost. I will not buy a Yankee candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Coddiwompler
review: Burns a tunnel then just makes the air smoky... I do t know all the candle maintenance la de da but I do trim wicks and this was still a lot of effort to burn - I threw it out about half way... it did smell good

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nathan Shaver
review: I love Yankee candle products. Their candle aroma fills the room and makes it feel warm and cozy. For some reason, when I light the candle the scent is very weak and hardly noticeable not the strong smell I'm use to with their products.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: KRD
review: Not sure if this is authentic? The pumpkin spice scent smells very weak compared to my other Yankee Candles that usually fill my home with lovely scents. This scent is amazing when you sniff the candle but it doesn't disperse well...disappointing. Good burn life, though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Alison
review: I was nervous to buy this after seeing some reviews stating it was knock off. But my candle came in the jar as pictured, and has a great scent. I think it‚Äôs great for fall and wintertime !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Brit
review: Smells wonderful. Lasts a good while. Good gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Julie
review: I had the ‚Äòsame‚Äô scent (Apple Pumpkin) that I purchased in store and though this one is close, something about it is definitely not the same. Bummer since the cost was nearly as much. Unfortunately, I don‚Äôt plan to purchase from here again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: trafick
review: This candle smelled more fiery than anything which I like.  Sent the wrong style.  Bought single wick jar and received double wick.  I decided to keep and glad I did.  Single wicks don't burn nor throw well IMHO.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Paula Eby
review: The scent is fantastic. Love the candle to give as a gift. Durable. Great value for the money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: DG
review: I thought the scent would be stronger....except for when you stick your nose close to the jar.  it last long.  looks good.  very durable.  but was hoping the scent would fill up the room more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Elizabeth Curry
review: The candle came sideways and The wax melted into the lid. I had to scrape out the top and remelt the candle just to find the wic. :/ after some DIY work the candle looked normal and was usable. Smells great. Like cinnamon apple fall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kelly T
review: I remember when a Yankee candle could fill a room with fragrance.  Not this particular candle.  I smell the smoke more when I blow it out than when I burn the candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: April
review: I buy Yankee candles because the smell has far beat any other candle, except for this one, it no smell at all. Not sure if I was given an old candle or if something went wrong in their quality control dept.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: MAUREEN P
review: I‚Äôve been buying  this exact candle for over 10 years and the scent of it has declined I can‚Äôt smell it unless I‚Äôm close to the candle which has never happened in the past. Disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Scott Frantom
review: This pumpkin spice and the Apple pumpkin candles we lurches just do not have much scent. I think we are going to stop purchasing yankee candles. I would not purchase these. The autumn leaves we purchase does have good scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Delivery driver was great.  He noticed some wax that leaked out of my box and suggested I open it immediately in case it the jar was cracked.  It wasn't,  the candle was packed upside down and Florida heat made the candle st as it to leak out from poorly placed lid. I was thinking about ordering more prior to this delivery as presents , but not after this experience. I didn't return it because it was still functional but just not pretty.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nani
review: These are by far the best fragrant Candle out there I buy them every year and use them daily They make a great gift and your house smells amazing Great Great Great Love them

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: strawberry23d
review: I had this candle burning since about 6am. It's now about noon and I get a very faint smell of cranberry. This was a good price but I'm not sure I'm going to keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jacklyn and Eduardo
review: Not sure why it don't smell st all when lit but sure has a lot of black smoke coming from it.my other on is perfect not sure why this one's not smelling.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tyler
review: I‚Äôve been buying yankee candles for years! This has absolutely no scent whatsoever!!! Very disappointed!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Linda Liddic
review: I have a huge shelf filled with Yankee candles. For years one could only buy them at a Yankee Candle store. This candle had no scent ( aroma) at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: H Steiner
review: I‚Äôve always liked Yankee candles because they lasted long and they always had a very nice scent.  Now sure what has happened to Yankee but this will be my last purchase of this brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tak191
review: Best smelling late summer/fall candle. I love the fresh and fruity smell. I give this to all 3 of my daughter in laws. They all have different tastes but agree Farmers Market is the best smell & they all love Yankee Candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: S. Wilshe
review: I love Yankee Candles, especially this scent, Farmers Market. The only issue I have is that this is the second candle that‚Äôs arrived with the outer glass shattered. (See photo). It‚Äôs still burnable, but ugly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sarah
review: I love Yankee Candles and was really looking forward to getting this. However, it seems that the product sold here on Amazon was damaged- first, the box had clear evidence of spilled wax. After opening the box, I saw the wax inside the jar appeared to have melted at some point (probably in storage) and re-solidified in a way that covers over the wick so I can‚Äôt even burn the candle. I will be returning this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tammy Boone
review: Buying this product for a gift for someone who loves this scent and was so upset to find that it was being discontinued. Thrilled to find it here on Amazon. I can't wait to see the surprise when its opened.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kat
review: This is a Wonderful candle! Long lasting. and smells so much like autumn. It fill's my home with forever scent. Yes, Recommend this Candle 100 percent. AAA+++

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jen S.
review: Love this scent! Not pleased with the high price and to get an uncentered wick. Hope the pictures do it justice to show how off center it is. Hoping it will burn properly but really hope so since this scent is my favorite and I‚Äôd like for it to last a while.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chef Shan Cooks
review: I love the scent and the fact that it is strong enough to smell across the whole room.  Good Quality candle. Smells like sweet tart cranberries to me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: John
review: It's scent is a little peculiar. I ordered pumpkin spice and it smells like bubble gum and doctor pepper mixed, not sure if it's ment to smell like that. For a Yankee candle I was expecting it to smell like what it advertised.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Didi
review: I love the smell.  The product was well packed and it arrived on a timely manner even tho it was shipped to a military base. Thank you so much!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cindy T
review: It arrived melted but we‚Äôre able to use it. I should have known better than ordering a candle to me delivered in Arizona.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Non-fiction Addiction
review: An excellent, refreshing scent perfect for fall and winter. This is the large (22 oz) jar with a single wick. Great packaging and a good value in a scent I had enjoyed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: AFT
review: I love the smell but it‚Äôs not enough to fill a room with an aroma, which I love and why I buy candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Megan
review: I bought this on a whim not knowing the scent. Yankee is a fantastic brand but I‚Äôm picky about my scents. This smell is phenomenal. The perfect fall candle. I‚Äôm going to buy 10 so it lasts forever....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lostinabook
review: The scent is barely discernible, the shape is narrower and taller, and the wax looks totally different than the one I bought from the Yankee Candle store.  If this had been my first YC, I‚Äôd never buy another.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: linda simpson
review: I have used the scent Autumn Wreath for several years! I love the way it makes my house smell! I use the candles and the scent plug ins. My daughter has used the same scent as long as I have. Love it and always keep a candle or scent plug in on hand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: K B
review: Yankee is one of the best brands of candles. The scent is always great and the last for weeks, even if you burn them everyday. I always buy Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: tstuckey
review: Smells amazing for a long period of time! Perfect for a gift! I absolutely love Yankee Candles! Wished I had the funds to only use just that‚Ä¶. YANKEE PRODUCTS!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jcjwebster
review: The shipping box was fine, what I found inside was the lid was upside down and the glass busted. Not Amazon's fault, most likely the way it was originally packed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bee/my 2nd review after buying more Baleaf Shorts!
review: Warm clean fragrance!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: K. Sheehan
review: I have bought a Yankee Pumpkin scented candle for years.  This one did not live up to my expectations.  There was not much scent and the candle burnt very quickly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Paula Cox
review: Love the wonderful scent. It's my daughter's favorite one. Highly recommend this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susan M. Booker
review: This candle was not up to the quality of the previous one (same kind) that I purchased. It was unevenly colored and the scent was not as strong (although just as lovely). Glad I didn‚Äôt purchase it as a gift for someone. Something must have happened to it in transit or it was poorly stored at the warehouse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jax Naydol
review: The sun is a very nice fall sent but it doesn't smell up the living room it could probably smell up a bathroom but it's not as strong as they used to be. I've been searching for a strong scented candle and I just can't seem to find one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: dawgsmum
review: do I need to say more; If you ever have had one then it lasts forever....smells great for christmas but I buy these all year round...love the cranberry smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Matounagi
review: Smells like Bad cologne. It also doesn‚Äôt have a very strong scent that fills the house, which I guess might be a good thing. But for 40 bucks for a candle and a little disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Aquaquality Pools Spas, Inc
review: These Yankee candles just do not give off the scent like years ago.  I returned it.  I even bought Yankee candles at Bed Bath & Beyond with the same issue.  No scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: K Klein
review: Bought this scent for the first time and wasn‚Äôt very impressed with scent. Can hardly smell unless your right up next to it. Will try other scents next time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: jill
review: this candle makes me so happy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: memories
review: My favorite candle ever !!  I use coupons and get them at the yankee store for a few dollars cheaper , but perfect if you don‚Äôt have a coupon. Cheaper than Walmart . I love yankee!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gregory - Northeast USA
review: They dont make them like they used too! I only lit it bout 4 times.  For about an hour each time.  The wax is half gone already.  Jeez.  It does smell good.  This is their large size 22oz. But I cannot reccomend üôÑ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jan Bolding
review: This was not in good condition when I got it.  It was a gift for my daughter and she told me it broke easily after she got it out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jamie&Jordan
review: Comes very well packaged. It‚Äôs a very spicy cinnamon scent, it really fills the room. This candle also has a nice long burn, very helpful for a house full of kids and their assorted smells.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Richard Portwood
review: First off, I received it the day after I ordered it!!! SO that was a really nice bonus surprise! The candle is exactly what I look forward to every year, about this time, as I really start to anticipate and get excited for fall. Absolutely no complaints at all! 100% satisfaction!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: weezeee
review: Yankee candles are quite a bit more expensive than other generic ones that looks the same.  But the scent is much nicer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Starlena Profitt
review: Love the way this candle smelled. It didn't seem to last as long as other Yankee Candles I've gotten but it smelled great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Faye
review: I am not usually a fan of Yankee Candles, but I was purchased by so many reviews. When I opened the package, I noticed the scent was mild, and when lit, the candle didn‚Äôt put out any scent at all! And of course, it isn‚Äôt returnable!! Do not waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joan White
review: I always love Yankee candles. I got the Spiced Pumpkin for one  and Autumn Wreath.  Each one by itself fills the house with a wonderful scent true to its name.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Leshkee
review: This candle is one of my favorites from Yankee Candle. It smells fantastic and fills up the house with a great scent. It's also not too "spicy" scented like many other spice candles, it's just a perfect scent for Fall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Robin
review: I got this candle for my home office hoping the scent would be invigorating, as I have found lemon to be. I was very excited about its arrival to the point that I stalked its delivery progress like I would have a major electronic. Alas, I am super disappointed. The candle seems to burn well, and it probably burns long. However, it is sitting right next to my computer, and I cannot smell a thing, which is odd because I can smell scents as well as a dog. So, the search for an invigorating lemon candle continues.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Jules
review: SMELLS AMAZING! I haven‚Äôt even lit it yet and I could smell it outside of the packaging it came in. I‚Äôm so glad I ordered it! If you love citrus üçä smells buy this candle. I have a feeling I will be making repeat purchases for my ‚ÄúHoney Clementine‚Äùüéºüéºüéº. #inLOVEwithmycandle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Maria Robin Estes
review: I ordered 2 of these candles which were sold by the same company. They were shipped and arrived on different days. I‚Äôm still trying to understand why. Both candles were shipped poorly. The 1st had the top tapped as if done by an elementary student and thrown in a box. The 2nd appeared to have been taped, but somehow the top became detached and it was shipped in an envelope. What I noticed upon opening the envelope was lack of fragrance. I cleaned away the tape and decided to light the candle and burn for a couple of hours. I was extremely dissatisfied. There was a very faint fragrance and the candle began to burn straight down the center. I‚Äôve purchased this candle in the past. I know how beautiful the fragrance is or should be and these candles last for a long time. The candle that I‚Äôve been using in my bathroom was purchased in November 2019 and while I don‚Äôt burn it every day. It is still very fragrant and after a year still has quite a bit of burn time left. My Plan was to gift one of these candles to a friend for her Birthday but due to the tacky wrapping, it simply is not presentable!! Poor quality and presentation for the Cost. This was a very bad investment!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Robin
review: I got this candle for my home office hoping the scent would be invigorating, as I have found lemon to be. I was very excited about its arrival to the point that I stalked its delivery progress like I would have a major electronic. Alas, I am super disappointed. The candle seems to burn well, and it probably burns long. However, it is sitting right next to my computer, and I cannot smell a thing, which is odd because I can smell scents as well as a dog. So, the search for an invigorating lemon candle continues.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Jules
review: SMELLS AMAZING! I haven‚Äôt even lit it yet and I could smell it outside of the packaging it came in. I‚Äôm so glad I ordered it! If you love citrus üçä smells buy this candle. I have a feeling I will be making repeat purchases for my ‚ÄúHoney Clementine‚Äùüéºüéºüéº. #inLOVEwithmycandle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Maria Robin Estes
review: I ordered 2 of these candles which were sold by the same company. They were shipped and arrived on different days. I‚Äôm still trying to understand why. Both candles were shipped poorly. The 1st had the top tapped as if done by an elementary student and thrown in a box. The 2nd appeared to have been taped, but somehow the top became detached and it was shipped in an envelope. What I noticed upon opening the envelope was lack of fragrance. I cleaned away the tape and decided to light the candle and burn for a couple of hours. I was extremely dissatisfied. There was a very faint fragrance and the candle began to burn straight down the center. I‚Äôve purchased this candle in the past. I know how beautiful the fragrance is or should be and these candles last for a long time. The candle that I‚Äôve been using in my bathroom was purchased in November 2019 and while I don‚Äôt burn it every day. It is still very fragrant and after a year still has quite a bit of burn time left. My Plan was to gift one of these candles to a friend for her Birthday but due to the tacky wrapping, it simply is not presentable!! Poor quality and presentation for the Cost. This was a very bad investment!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Mamalinde
review: My favorite!  The scent is so clean and refreshing and the candle burns cleanly.  I ordered 2 of these and 1 arrived with a different scent.  I let them know through the Amazon site - they attempted to direct me to the YC site, where I was asked to open an account (ummm) and the toll free number refers you to the YC website.  Anyway, I explained the issue and less than 24 hours later I received not one but 2 Sicilian lemon candles.  That‚Äôs amazing customer service.  I‚Äôll drop the silver birch that was sent erroneously in the 2 month window they allow.  Let me also say that the packaging was really off the charts good, I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to send as gifts.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Brian Stackhouse
review: Great Candles. If you sign up for the PAPER catalog from Yankee that STILL comes in the snail mail you'll get coupons for B.O.G.O. Free on the large jar candles. The coupon says buy 2 or 3 but I've bought 5 and got 5 free. I'd recommend stocking up in the winter months to avoid melted / misshaped candles. Imagine the candle bouncing on its side while inside one of those brown trucks that's been outside in the summer sun all day long with no air conditioning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Toby Moore
review: This was purchased as a small Valentine's gift for my wife.  I had bought her a Lemon Verbena candle (different brand) for Christmas, which smelled really nice.  But then we noticed the terrible black soot it left on her home office walls and ceiling...so much for buying another.  She's had dozens of Yankee candles over the years with no issues, and this one was "Amazon's Choice" so I went for it.  Simply put, this jar missed the fragrance nozzle on the assembly line.  We're talking basically no lemon, unless you concentrate it in a very small location.  And even then you have to practically singe your eyebrows off leaning into it to smell anything.  Nothing like other Yankee stuff in the past.  Production mistake?  Yankee's new cost-cutting philosophy?  Who knows.  Just $17 wasted.  We'll go back to generic candles bought at the supermarket.  They may not burn quite as long, but they have 20 times the fragrance and cost about a third as much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: LS
review: Really disappointed with us Mel. I am a lemon free, I like the freshness and zest of lemon. I tried it for after the New Year to get rid of all the Christmas smells, and I actually had the blow it out. I am not one of those fuzzy people who complains, I love candles oh, but this one was actually sickening. I kept trying to decide what it smelled like, and it smell like a gas station bathroom with one of those air fresheners. No I didn't return it, I don't believe in just returning things because you're unhappy with a smell, but I am disappointed with Yankee Candle for that. I wish descriptions were more realistic and believable. You can't know a smell until you buy the stupid thing, and that's twenty bucks down the drain

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: cldsk
review: It‚Äôs been awhile since I have splurged and spent the money on a Yankee Candle.  I love the smell of peach and mango, so I was excited when I saw this candle. I remembered going to the Yankee Candle stores and being overwhelmed with how strong/powerful/real their scents were. The candles from them I used to get always smelled great and filled the room.  I expected the same. Sadly after lighting this and letting it burn for over an hour, I never got even a hint of the scent in the room. The only time I could smell anything is when I smelled the solid  wax of the unlit candle. For the price of these candles it was truly disappointing.  I don‚Äôt think I will waste my money on another Yankee Candle again :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Forever Geralyn
review: This is the first purchase of Yankee candle that disappointed me. I love the fresh scent of lemons and was looking forward to enjoying this Sicilian Lemon variety. After burning this candle for days now,  I can't detect any noticeable scent. Even up close,  I'm getting no aroma from this candle. That being said,  it does have a good slow burn and as always, comes in a jar that I enjoy for it's size and being able to cap it when extinguishing it. It also arrived securely packaged in a Yankee Candle box which makes it ideal for gifting.  Unfortunately,  I can't recommend this particular scent.  Thank you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Nonnie
review: I have a number of Yankee Candles with wonderful holiday scents that I use from Oct thru Jan. This scent is light & perfect for every day. Yankee Candles last a long time. I usually burn then for about 2 hrs & my little home smells lively. If you are looking for a lighter scent, I do recommend you try Honey Clementine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Laura ‚ÄúChronicEverything‚Äù
review: I purchased this without smelling it. ‚Ä¢I don‚Äôt regret it. The name of the candle, Strawberry Lemon Ice is a good description of the scent. If you don‚Äôt like fruity you won‚Äôt like this. I am in the ‚Äúburns fruity for certain occasions and for myself perhaps 2 times in 2 weeks. The scent comes out, nicely, within 10 minutes or less of lighting it. I always burn my candles 1 hour per ‚Äú of the diameter of the jar, so the initial burn was 4 hours. No tunneling, quality 2 weeks. I don‚Äôt want to say the scent is ‚Äúoverpowering‚Äù as that word has a negative connotation. I light mine in my master bathroom, leave the door open so the bulk of the scent is in the bathroom and a lighter scent fills the connected bedroom, and I like it that way. Don‚Äôt regret, yet unsure if I‚Äôll buy again. Smell is so objective so you may adore this (or not) but I described it best I could.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Maggie Goldammer
review: This is my absolute favorite candle. I buy it every spring and always get compliments. It doesn't have to be a spring scent, but it's fresh and slightly sweet, though not too much. It doesn't smell artificial or sugary. Strong but not too strong. I never get sick of it. Will buy again and again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Babs
review: I love the aroma of pineapple, so when I had my bathroom re-done and the wood cabinets didn't have a pleasing aroma, I put this candle in one of them. It has been more than a year, and when I open the cabinet doors, the delicious smelling pineapple wafts throughout my entire bathroom. I had an older Yankee Candle with the same aroma and had put it in an even stronger smelling new cabinet, and it is still working. I don't know why they put "cilantro" smell on there, because there isn't a trace of the odor of cilantro (even though I love that scent, too). It's the fresh pineapple aroma, though, that makes my whole bathroom so pleasant.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Muriel H
review: Received the large Macintosh Apple candle today.The candle was very well packed,box inside of a box.I couldn't wait to light it up.Trimed the wick,lighted it up and waited and waited and waited some more .No  smell !! Got as close as possible to the lighted candle and caught a slight scent of apple.I am so disappointed!! Hope I have finally learned my lesson regarding ordering scented candles online!Just thought it being a yankee candle the quality would be better.Guess not! By the way this candle has been burning for two hours. NOTHING!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: J. E. Doyle Jr.
review: The candle burned better than some more recent Yankee Candles burning cleanly and leaving no wax residue on the sides. I did trim the wick at each Re-lighting however, as is good practice for a clean burning candle. The scent was disappointing providing relatively little lemon smell beyond the immediate location where it was burned, the kitchen, unlike some Yankee Candles I have purchased in the past. The longevity of this candle was good, lasting as long as was anticipated. This would make an ok gift, but better to buy one that you know is going to smell great as well as give a good lasting performance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Rick James Bish
review: We live in an RV and really expected this candle to at least fill the bedroom, which is a whopping 10 x 11 at best, with a nice scent of lemon, but it falls way short. The scent is only slightly apparent when you smell right above the candle. There are candles that are too strong, some that are just right, and this one that is a waste of money if you are buying for the scent. In most respects it performs like an unscented candle.  The glade scented candles give off significantly more frangrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: o
review: Love Yankee candles! The scent lasts long and they burn clean. This was not my first online purchase of a candle, I tried it out and found that the others arrived intact. This purchase however, arrived broken. It came in the same packaging: a box with pressed cardboard insert in the shape of the candle inside a larger box with packing plastic (air filled bags). Unfortunately the glass tumbler was broken, there were shards of glass floating around in the secondary box. The outer box was slightly damaged. It still smells awesome though. But I guess I have to go back to the brick and mortar stores for my candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Amazon Customer
review: When this candle arrived, I noticed fluid leaking throughout the wax. Looked like the glass jar had been refilled with a homemade wax. The jar broke so I had to put it in a different holder to burn it. The smell is great, but when burning, leaves black soot on EVERYTHING. That is not typical of Yankee Candles I've purchased. The pictures shown are from about an hour and a half of burn. I cleaned the glass and wall and burned it again to see the difference. Sent back the others.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: DevonColleen
review: I am not sure if these are the types of candles yankee sells on clearance because of defects. My candle came and  the wax inside of the candle was not visually pretty. Still it's a candle and that part melted away. The lable on the candle was also ripped off. I did buy this as a gift for my mom but had to keep it and buy a new one at our local drugstore who also sells candles and jewlery. Same scent just not pretty. If I was buying a defective candle, I shouldn't have had to pay more than what you would find in at the store for. I would just suggest buying it else where, but this scent has always been my favorite.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: inlovewithjesus
review: I don't like writing negative reviews, but I felt like I needed to write this one to help people!  So I read many positive reviews about this scent - that's why I bought it - that it had a true lemon scent.  However, when it arrived, I couldn't believe how strong the scent was - and this was BEFORE I even opened the glass lid!  You can smell the scent through the glass.  I opened the lid, and it was overwhelming.  I like a nice, strong scent but this was over the top!  I had to put it outside on the patio overnight because it was smelling up the entire house WITH THE LID ON!  Sadly, I had to return it.  Sorry I couldn't write a nicer review.  But maybe this will help someone who is thinking of buying this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Jane H
review: This candle has a nice scent to it. That's the good part. However, it is super strong, which is the bad part for me. I like a lightly scented candle. This candle is super scented, and even in a really big, open area, it is very strong. I couldn't let it burn for more than a few minutes. I think I will need to put it away and get it out when warmer weather comes and I can burn it out on the sunporch with all the sliding doors open to the screens. If you like a strong candle, you'll like this. If you are like me, and only like a light scent, take a pass on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Sunny417
review: This was a blind purchase and I'm glad I took the chance. I was worried it was going to smell like furniture polish, but it is a lovely fruity lemon scent almost like kids cereal. Very pleased!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Sheila H.
review: My candle arrived safely packaged and in a timely manner. I love Yankee candles as they burn well and have a great fragrance. This one is a little different. While it burns nicely with the two wicks, the smell of Honey and Clementine aren't really there. After burning in for three to five hours I can tell its more of a perfume type of smell over a natural citrus. It doesn't have a very good throw either as you need to be right up on it. Great candle but I'll try a different option for Orange/Citrus. Update- After burning for approximately 15- 20 hours it has gotten better. Better throw and scent. It just shouldn't take that long to be effective.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Ryan Odom
review: I would probably be more upset if I realized how ripped off I was but I was curious as to why this candle had hardly no scent when people have been ranting and raving about how good and strong they smell. I should've read the reviews beforehand but got it during the primeday lightning deals, but I'm pretty sure I bought a dud. Someone else reviewed this and mentioned not buying a candle again online. Too easy to get ripped off on something arguably subjective as smell. Not worth it to me. Buy a candle from a more reliable source.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Cathy
review: I love the candle, and have ordered it many times and it arrived fine, but I think the clamshell packaging is being made flimsier, and two in a row arrived with the clamshell broken.  First one the candle jar was crushed.  The replacement arrived today, and the glass was fine, but picture is of the clamshell.  The outside boxes were in perfect condition, so it wasn‚Äôt like the shipper threw itxaround.  I think the clamshells are being made cheaper and it is NOT working!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: lcb
review: Some candles are just way too strong but level of scent is perfect. I found myself not wanting to put it out at all. With many candles I am overwhelmed after an hour but I left this burning most of the day. I love the apple scent and I love the aroma strength. It is not crazy sweet smelling either. I ordered another IMMEDIATELY, because am going to burn through this one fast. Really nice candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Kristine A. Criscimagna
review: I have purchased these the last couple of years for my Daughter's Birthday. They are her absolute favorite and now I live them as well. Perfect for any room and they quickly fill the room with a beautiful scent that's not too overpowering and lasts a while. You really won't find a better price all year long. Great Deal !!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Lisa
review: The candle arrived on time and packaged perfectly. The scent is very fragrant no matter what time of year it will be a perfect addition to your space or a wonderful gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: quiltmaker
review: This candle does not have a lemon scent. I was expecting a candle when burning would give off the smell of lemons. Maybe  Sicillian lemons smells different. I don't know but this scent is not to my liking. I can't even describe the odor, it is sort of sweet but not fruity. At any rate if you're expecting the smell of lemons this is not what you want to buy. The jar is nice and the color is very pretty. It was packaged very well to prevent breakage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Ralph
review: This has a weird but clean lemon scent. When burning for long periods of time, it made me feel kind of nautious and hungry. Not a bad or a stinky smell... just a powerful lemon food/fruit smell, blended with fresh laundry sheets... so don't burn it on an empty stomach... didnt use it often and moved from room to room... so it lasted a long time in our home .. Good kitchen candle, not recommended for bedroom, office or hallway use. Would not gift...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: V.
review: Product delivery was great however fragrance is Far Below the Quality I have experienced from Yankee Candle in my Many years of purchasing Seems off to a bang  at first burns then 3 later  virtually No Fragrance At All! So disappointed!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Joanna P.
review: The media could not be loaded. The large Mango Peach Salsa candle I purchased was defective! It was not poured/mixed properly and has been bubbling/separating every time I light it up. I got another straight from Yankee Candle and it has the exact same issue!!! I have purchased dozens of Yankee Candles and this is the only scent that has had this problem.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Nora
review: I have seen reviews on Amazon stating items are fake and it finally happened to me. I have purchased Yankee Candles a hundred times and this has absolutely no smell whatsoever! Will be the last time purchasing a Yankee candle with Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Barbara Elyse
review: I've never been to Sicily or found any Sicilian Lemons in the produce department to know for sure how close the scent is to the real thing - but the scent was not anything like the fresh zesty scent of a lemon - sorta cloying sweet - this was one time when I wished the scent was not strong - thankfully it was not so strong to fill the house but not a scent I will purchase again !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: L Massie
review: love the scent and the first half of the candle burned fine ... But for some reason beyond that the wick was wicked ... I've often used Yankee Candles ..  most of them can be burned down to about an inch from the bottom before it goes wacky .. This one didn't last nearly as well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Z66 Avalanche
review: Not sure what happened with Yankee Candles, they were my favorite. I've bought several different ones, and the scent isn't as strong as it use to be. I cant remember when one burnt evenly. The only thing that seems to remain the same is the price. The smell is faint with this, and the strawberry lime is just the same. Really not worth writing a review on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Irene
review: I don't believe the Macintosh candle is the same as the ones from the store. This candle smells like chemical and seems fake. It's been sitting in my room for a long time and I will not be lighting it again. Will defnitely go into the trash. Just buy the candle in store and save the disappointment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Bora K.
review: When I first received it, I got it broken inside the box. However, when I informed Amazon about this fact, I was very satisfied that they sent me the new product again immediately. I personally love this scent. I'm using a few Yankee candles but I want to buy them again when I'm done.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Kamal Sharma
review: Happened to read the instructions that came with this candle. They recommend to keep it lit till the whole top melts. Doing that now, wick is staying nice and in place. Candle burns neatly. This particular scent works well in the kitchen to mask smells from cooking, those are great when you eat the food but must go before it is time to prepare the next meal. Stuff we have had to learn during the pandemic!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Nora‚ÄôsMom
review: I ordered the honey clementine. I lit the candle in my office/bedroom and let it burn for about an hour. Usually tanker candles spread through the whole house but I had to keep coming back to check if it was still lit because I couldn‚Äôt smell it. Even when you‚Äôre right on top of it you barely notice a scent at all. BUT I will say my fianc√© said ‚Äúyeah smells great‚Äù but you know how men are  lol

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Katie
review: I've been a Yankee Candle devotee for years and years. Maybe decades!  BUT finally this Sicilian Lemon candle has NO scent whatsoever! NONE.  My smeller seems fine, but wow. Nothing.  Candles these days are a real luxury for me and this one def disappointed.  Well, one out of how many over the years? Guess my odds are still good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Joe Morrow
review: Yankee candles are great. They last for a very long time (I would estimate around 100 hours) and there is lots of variety. Lemon is my favorite for everyday use, and this scent is my favorite lemon of all time. It's a little sweet, but not sickening sweet, and it's not the tangy lemon smell of kitchen soap or cleaner. It's perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: CheeryToes
review: I was really expecting this candle to have more of a cilantro scent, the idea of the candle is great, the reality is a heavily pineapple scented candle that makes me rather nauseous. I waited a year or two for the price to drop on this when it did I snapped it up - what a disappointment - I cannot recommend this scent. blech

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: fatima
review: its very average, rather than the fresh citrus-y scent i was looking for, it smells like lemon candy.  It also doesn't fill a room at all, even after burning it for several hours.  It burns well through, didn't have any issues with the wick.  Walmart candles for 3.99 are stronger, i would just go there. EDIT: two stars.  It burns terribly.  the wax melts at an angle so you have to constantly keep an eye on it. Absolutely not worth the money :/

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Chris M.
review: For the price I was expecting a nice scent and long lasting but got just the opposite. I have not smelled anything besides was as this candle quickly burns. I got a generic lemon scented candle from Food Lion that was smaller but lasted way longer and filled my room with a nice lemon scent. Will not buy any more candle from this brand and will see if I can find the supermarket candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: H. Hun
review: I buy this scent often and have loved it for years. My son and mother also love it. The color can be great at spring summer or fall but the smell is more spring and summer. I returned this one because the smell was great and strong and I was in early pregnancy and couldn't take it. It's not one of those scentless scented candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Jennifer Moseley
review: I love Yankee candles, but this scent is definitely not one of my favorites. It seems very similar to a previous scent I bought - pineapple cilantro. I was hoping for a clean, fresh lemon scent, but this smells more like sweet candy. If you‚Äôre wanting a clean, fresh scent, I think lemon lavender is a much better option.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Jill
review: I was excited about trying out this candle(lemon Sicilian)..I buy tons of candles...and after burning this downstairs in my livibgroom,I had to blow it out..The smell was like plastic w lemon..It was bad..I think I will burn it outdoors..but definately not inside..I wanted to give more stars..but I I can not on this one scent..sorry.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Adam F
review: I ordered the Lemon-Lavender scent and it smells great and is quite strong! The candle came packaged well so it wasnt broken and the candle had not melted from the summer heat. My only critique is how small the candle is (the small tumbler). Considering the candle cost about $13, i would have hoped that it would have been a bit bigger. Other than that, the candle is nice!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Shannon
review: This produce came on time. However, the box was falling apart and the candle is clearly very old. It is leaking red oil and is unusable. It ruined one of my shirts and leaked all over my white mantel. Wouldn't recommend unless newer candles are being sent now. Mine was clearly not good anymore.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: HectorC
review: Bought four Macintosh candles at 23-24 bucks a pop‚Ä¶ can‚Äôt smell the Macintosh‚Ä¶ I can smell the wick though. Daughter-in-law works at a site that has been receiving a whole lot of returns on the Yankee Candles for the same reason. Extremely disappointed‚Ä¶ Guess what I‚Äôll be doing?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Ranger
review: Have enjoyed these candles for many years. It was a nice surprise to see some of the scents here on Amazon for far less than retail at their stores. Of course, not all inventory was available but I found three that I like. Highly recommend purchasing these Yankee Candles on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: paulinespens
review: This smell of this candle is horrific. It isn't no where near a fruity, Happy smell. I lit the candle soon as I got it. I was so excited. Lemon is one of my favorite smells. It burned for a few hours as I did my own thing around the house. I realized I hasn't smelled lemon yet so I went to check the candle. Whatever you used for this candle please never use it again. The smell is like burnt hair. That's the best way to describe it. I won't even give this away. Worst candle ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Jennie McCracken
review: I hope the lemon and lavender scent stays on in their product line. I discovered this candle in the stores during the spring and this candle burns for hours, keeping me relaxed and focused while I am working from home or spending time alone to read a good book. I purchase two at a time on Amazon every couple of months and never regret it. I‚Äôve gotten almost 10 of these candles so far and will continue to buy this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Amazon Customer
review: Using this candle made me sick. It has some sort of toxic irritant in it. Within a day of burning it my sinuses were clogged & I started becoming sick. This was not normal. After airing out the house and recovering I tried the candle again and realized it was the source of the issue as I started becoming sick again. Ordered this & the carmel version to the same effect. Other options they have didn't do this to me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Macintosh
author: Rhabyn S. McCowan
review: Watermelon is my favorite food in the world, and this lovely candle makes me want one, or jolly rancher candy or something juicy and sweet. A quality watermelon candle is difficult to find.
