I highly recommend if you buy candles by these different sense shapes and sizes. Paul C

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Deborah
review: This review is for the Bahama Breeze lg jar candle. Not only is the fragrance for this candle almost non existent, it burns terrible. The wax never melts to the edge of the jar, it only pools in the center...I left it burning for 5 hrs to see if it would perform as it should and it failed. Now I have to remove wax in order to make use of the whole candle. Yankee Candles are way too expensive to have such a poor outcome. I'm going to try the Cheerful Giver candles because they have much better reviews.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Lisajc66
review: I just bought this to put in a gift basket for my sister-in-law who is doing a beach theme in her bathroom in her new apartment. I had no idea what this particular scent smelled like. I've bought several Yankee Candles before, but have never smelled this one so I had to go off the reviews and chance it, and I'm so glad I went with it!! It smells incredibly GOOD and goes with her beach theme!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze

review: I dont buy many candles and I have been experimenting on different brands to try to find my fav.  This isnt it.  The smell isnt there.  I've even had it going for nearly and hour and invited my friend and they said they couldnt tell the candle was there

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Teisha Travaglino
review: I wanted to write a current review on the Coconut Beach candle because there are very mixed reviews. So to be clear, this candle does have a nice mild scent. It‚Äôs just not strong. If you‚Äôre looking for a strong tropical smell to fill a room.. I recommend the Pineapple Cilantro. It‚Äôs very good also.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: inspire naturally
review: far better in fragrance than many but not too overly powering as to be obnoxious, ive always loved long burning candles, which i use after dinner once lights go down, my last was coconut vanilla , this new coconut beach delivers the same nice tropical scent i love and the yumminess of coconut . yankee candles are some of my favorites and i can always count on them to deliver plus i love the jar and the packaging prevents breakage big time which is a plus these days. thank you

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: M.
review: I've been buying Yankee candles for years and have always trusted the brand,however I am so disappointed in my recent purchase...I purchased 3 large jars and I can barely smell them, so I got scentless candles...I guess that's why they were 40 % off.... They're too heavy to return plus I took them out and threw away all the packaging ,fully trusting the Yankee Candle brand....I lit one anyway and it has absolutely no scent ....so there goes 50 dollars on nothing.....you're taking a chance if you buy the cheaper ones.....I should have bought just one to test it first but I thought I was getting a very a good deal so I got a few before they sold out......

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Karen B.
review: I love the big candles.  I have always had a big jar candle in our camper we dry camp and often you o my need a little bit of light that last 30 minutes if dark es while getting ready for bed...or to dine by candelight. This is perfect. It provides a pleasant smell in the evenings Ng before going to bed and gives us ample light. Also great for emergencies!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: joni
review: When I picked up the box I could hear the broken glass inside... Smells fabulous but need to find a new container for it because this one is broken... I feel it was broken before it shipped... The packing case was broken on the opposite side from were the glass was broken & the glass lid was completely turned around he opposite way... Very disappointed, I ordered one for my daughter hopefully it is not also damaged...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Mr Floaty.
review: I'd really like to rate this higher, based singularly on the scent, and the lasting aroma... but when the glass jar  cut me up when opening the inner packaging, I felt like I should share the experience. I did NOT contact the seller, and am currently using the candle in another container. I really wish it wasn't broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Bradley
review: I usually burn Storm Watch in the summer, but Sun & Sand has made itself a new home into my seasonal collections. Smells: Strong notes of the beach, sunscreen lotion, light citrus/musk..Love lighting this one while I play video games on cool summer nights with the window open, definitely makes me feel like I'm at the beach even though I'm far far away lol, brings back summer memories of going to the pool & swimming with family & friends when I was younger too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Amazon Customer
review: These came mostly melted. They were for reception tables. Had to set them in pan of water and remelt. Retrieve the wick and watch it reset and add the wick back in. Only 1 of the 4 was good to use. Made it work. It was October in KS so not hot on day they came. Still smelled good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: CustomerOne
review: These things are up to $30 now with sales around $16-20 vs finding sales for $6 just a few years back. This one smells decent if you sniff the jar but after being lit for 8+ hours in one sitting I still cant tell there is a scented candle in the room.  The freaking 2in dollar general one I had lit the day before it arrived filled the room. Low Quality & Double the cost. They have lost me forever, RIP Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: HJP
review: Candle was melted up into the cap and the wick was nowhere to be found, until I melted the candle completely down. What a mess! It‚Äôs not even hot here the last two days have been 50‚Äôs. No way this thing melted in transit. Other people have posted the same issue. They must have them stored on their sides. What a pain in the kazoo. Candle is ok. It definitely took some work to make it usable though. I wouldn‚Äôt buy from them again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Debra Greer
review: I was told it was a best seller.  Do not buy it.  I can barely smell anything at all.  I‚Äôm so disappointed:( It was 16.00$  Yankee candle .  I can‚Äôt believe it!  Walmart candles have more of a scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Landon S.
review: Nice candle. I like the scent when I can actually smell it. The candle lasts long sure but the scent is not very strong overall. I mean the scent is so faint you have to waft it to actually get the scent. Overall not a bad candle but unfortunately the lack of scent is what only gave it 4 stars.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Justine Gorski
review: Always liked Yankee candle for filling your home with great aromas. You would think for the price you'd get some scent from it, you have to be within a foot to smell anything, to bad there is hardly any scent anymore

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: D. Zandel
review: This candle scent reminds me of my visit to the Bahamas. It‚Äôs relaxing and beautiful, especially when a gentle breeze flows through the house. I don‚Äôt light candles, rather use a warmer to enjoy the scent without the flame. Yankee Candle has always been of highest quality, and I recommend any of their products.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Nurselife17
review: I was hoping to have a nice coconut smelling candle. You would expect high quality from this brand but I received a candle that barely gives off any scent.  I've burned it halfway down and still no real scent detected.  Do not recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Tom carson
review: Has no scent at all, I've been burning it for 3 hours and you can't smell anything. The only way you can smell the candle is if you put it directly under your nose. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Katherine
review: When I received my candle it was melted into the corner of the jar. I set it out in the sun to melt it further and dug out the wick. It still doesn‚Äôt actually light properly, but somehow manages to burn. It smells delicious and lasts. I do love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: mystery reader
review: This used to be my favorite fragrance.  I don't know why, but the company changed the aroma formulation from what it was to a very stinky odor.  Honestly, it smelled like jet fuel at the airport.  Perhaps I was sent a bad batch, but whoa, bad smell came from that jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Amazon Customer
review: Scent is great, good longevity, decent yankee candle quality. My only gripe is that this candle does not seem to smell as "strongly" or fill a room the way other yankee candles have in the past. Other reviewers have mentioned similar things and they're all true. I would still buy yankee candles in the future because they still represent decent value but just beware that the formula has definitely changed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Squeak
review: Unfortunately, another Yankee Candle that has zero scent throw. Very disappointed. Do not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: S. Averill
review: Yankee Candles are my favorite brand of candles. This particular scent is odd and is not 100% pleasant to me, however, I will be using it until it runs out. These candles last much longer that other brands (that you can get at grocery stores or other local chains). This brand is very giftable, but I would not recommend this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: D F
review: Scent is good and stronger than some other brands. I compare Yankee candle scent strength with bath and body works candle scent strength for those familiar with bath and body works. Other scented candles are so subtle, you don't know a candle is burning. You can definitely smell these and it's a nice scent, not overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Norma Searls
review: It was so nice to get my candle that wasn't broken to pieces, The carrier was very nice and didn't just throw it on my porch, the last one soon as you move the box from outside you could hear it all broke, thanks to whoever delivered it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Sunni
review: I received 2 Yankee candles this month that were perfectly packaged, both were melted to one side of the jar so we're not useable. I melted them back to liquid wax and replaced the wick upright again. A lot of work! I will only be buying them at the store from now on. Walmart has them for $16,88.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: TheRyan
review: We‚Äôve bought a bunch of these when they on sale for $15. Never again, we get duped every time by a good price but none of them have ever filled a room with scent like the ones from the store.  Don‚Äôt buy these from Amazon, you‚Äôll regret it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Mark
review: If you want to bring a scent of the beach to your living room or kitchen, this is the scent. I have bought three off of Amazon so far and have purchased five or six more from department stores. This is a great summer smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Emily Romero
review: Smells nice.  My first time buying a Yankee Candle.  Honestly I am not too impressed.  The scent is pretty.  However, it is not that strong.  I don't think it's much if  any better than the $5 Wal-Mart candles.  I might try a candle from an actual brick and mortar Yankee store sometime, but I will not order any more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Sarah A
review: This is the best ‚Äúbeach smelling‚Äù candle that exists! It literally smells like sitting on the beach on a hot summer day‚Ä¶ sun, sand, salty breezes and coppertone sunscreen‚Ä¶ like a vacation without leaving home! I love it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Desen Fulmer
review: This scent is my favorite of the Yankee candle collection...amazon prices are cheaper but the quality is still high.  This scent smells like suntan oil and makes me feel like it's summer all year long in my house.  It's mild but this one candle, can be smelled throughout the house.  Will forevermore buy Yankee candle from Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: lawanda green
review: My last candle I sent back it had no scent. The new candle scent was way stronger. I immediately could smell the scent from the unopened box. The aroma quickly filled my entire home and burns and smells beautiful. Thank you Yankee!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Snow
review: A lot of people keep saying that the candles are not strong enough and let me assure it's not true. Very powerful scent and long lasting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Trishalla Bell
review: It does not have a good cold scent throw... Also the hot  scent throw is completely different....it is one of them things up if you walk out the room for a couple of hours and don't come back and can you come in and you can smell it..so that is why I gave it a four stars because when you burn it it does smell good

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: M. Torres
review: Growing up on the beaches of Southern California, Sea & Ski was a familiar scent! This candle reminds me so much of it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: taylorbrooke
review: I really wanted to love this candle because it's a yankee candle and a summery, fruit, strawberry scent which is my favourite... but this candle barely has a smell, it's very subtle at least and I was hoping for strong. Dont know if it's old or what. Only gave 3 stars though because it does have a slow burn time and I like the jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Robert Smith
review: The bottom of the candle jar was not level. One side had thicker glass while the other side was much thinner. Thankfully this is not a gift. I would not burn the candle too low.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: A. F. Goldfadim
review: One of the best coconut candles I‚Äôve ever bought. But I‚Äôm giving it 4 stars because once the wick starts to burn down, the sides remain and I have to keep using a flat knife to press the sides down so it burns evenly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Becca
review: I love the smell of coconut, especially throughout my house because I live in Arizona. So the light, refreshing smell is my favorite. I don't think this candle is a fake Yankee candle but I do not love it. Yankee candles are usually great quality but I can barely smell this scent. Large size and lasts long, but I would not buy this same candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Richard
review: I still have yet to find a candle that compares to Yankees.  They burn completely down hardly ever any wax left on the glass and the scent permeates the entire house.  The only candle I would buy or gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: maranda marie
review: Yankee went way down people! It builds that tunnel that outs it invisible and dont burn all the wax. Also it dont smell at all yankee im ashamed! Buy glade candles they burn even and smell whole time! Im super bummed!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Lynda
review: My Mother. She adored them. She went on oxygen quite awile ago, there were no flames to be lit in the house,so no more candles. Sent this to my sisters in Mass to put on the fireplace and Light in her home.  She would have loved it  THANK YOU  Yankee

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: JP
review: I have purchased for years and I wonder why as the scent seems to have become hardly noticeable!  I tried many many with the same issue and wonder if perhaps they might be leftovers???

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Jesena
review: I gave this scent a chance and it is really nice and tropical. I would definitely buy it again, it's light and fruity and just enough of a scent to fill the room, but not overpower everything.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Hillary Tucker
review: This photo arrived half melted. I was able to fix it so that the candle could be used so it wasn‚Äôt a deal breaker. I was disappointed though. That said, once solved the candle lasted a long time. The scent wasn‚Äôt very strong though. I probably wouldn‚Äôt buy this particular scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: John Zokan
review: I thought this scent would have more of a mixed mellow smell, but this one smells very fruity. When you open the container it smells like you're opening a fruit roll-up and it's a little overpowering just for regular daily use. Other than that like other yankee candle it burned long and evenly. I like the brand overall, just not this specific one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: donna pacosa
review: I purchased this candle @ a Great Price & donated it to a tricky tray for our High School's band which is in January. I felt the Mediterranean scent would be great idea to burn & look forward to spring!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Amy
review: I love this scent, however, both candles I ordered have ZERO scent to them. So disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Nicki
review: I have had this candle burning for 24 hours. A friend came over and I asked, can you smell my candle? They said, no where is it? I am not happy at all. (We do not have covid)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Genie
review: I have been looking for a candle that smells like SPF (that might sound weird to you, but I don't care, I love the smell of SPF). I bought this candle because someone mentioned that it smelled like sunscreen, but after purchasing it and lighting it for several hours, I would like to report that this candle does not smell anything like sunscreen. There's nothing wrong with the scent, I'm sure people who are just looking for a light, summery fragrance will find it very pleasing. But, I was hoping for a smell that reminded me of sunscreen.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Kay Scott
review: I bought this candle as a gift for my daughter who loves going to the beach!  The fragrance reminds her of her happy place so that is a win. Good price also for a Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Kevin hughes
review: Not my 1st time buying this scent from yankee candle and im disappointed this time around. Its like they forgot to add the fragrance to the candle this time. My older candles with the same scent fill the whole house but these ones have zero scent to them. Extremely disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Ian I Fujiyama
review: ordered this as a birthday gift for myself.  The candle came in a box - that was put in another box.  Only the inside box had directions that said this side up, and the outside box was placed in the wrong orientation (likely because there were no directions on the outside of how to handle it).  The candle came melted on one side- it had re-solidified like that.  I'm currently trying to salvage it by melting the candle again in a pot of hot water.  I'm sure it would have been a lovely candle, but don't order in the summer like I did

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Desiree Mills
review: Very little to no scent. Surprising because when purchased in the store, I find yankee candles have the absolute best scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: The Mrs.
review: Well, it's smells like you are on a beach in mexico, or bahamas, sipping a girly drink under a cabana with the waves splashing. So in short, in smells like paradise.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: russell
review: Like most Yankee candles I've purchased, lasted not nearly long enough, smell faded away pretty quickly, maybe three days of use. Not concurrently. Just a disappointment with the candle I got.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Upset
review: I don't know about anybody else but it is definitely come to my attention that Yankee candles are no longer Yankee candles. They have little to no scent anymore. This last one I ordered had absolutely no scent. It is the last Yankee candle I will order or buy. I just bought a village candle in the flavor of strawberry. Now this is a great smelling candle, reminds me EXACTLY of the old Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: c a drys
review: I love Yankee Candles but this one does NOT have any scent to it. I usually buy Seashore Breeze and thought this would be similar but I am just burning an unscented candle, that is burning quickly. It is not like the usual ones. Don't waste your money on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: ARLINE TROEBER
review: I had received this scent as a gift last Christmas and I loved it. The scent filled the room. This candle did not for some reason. Very disappointed!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Catherine O
review: First one came broken. Second one was sent out right away. I think the one I have now may be a fake. It literally emits no scent, and I‚Äôve probably burned it for ten to twelve hours. Very unlike yankee, so I‚Äôm quite disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Kelly Eden
review: weak scent. The candle smells really nice. but you can only pick up the scent if your face is directly above the flame- it's a real shame. Otherwise, the wick burning time has great longevity. but I wouldn't but this again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: sally martin
review: Clicked on this by mistake when I really wanted the Mediterranean Breeze and tried it but must say this smell is not so nice! Nasty is all I should say...stick with Mediterranean. Stay clear of Bahama! Yeck!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Frankie H
review: As much as I like yankee, I wonder if this was a very old candle I don get the smell in my room like I was looking for. I have this sitting on a burner and it is very faint. Big waist of money. Would not recommend or buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Caroljean35
review: This does not smell at all like the candle purchased direct at the yankee candle store This literally had no sent and I have bought this exact scent before. So it‚Äôs for sure a knock off or a defect

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: JMB
review: I hated yankee candle discontinued Tahitian nights but glad I found it on Amazon. It was a bit pricy but got the exact candle with great scent. It‚Äôs also a long lasting burn time. I‚Äôve lit it every day for 3 weeks and still got half

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Ivan Detkov
review: I am sorry, but this candle was a huy disappointmentment

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: MamaBear
review: Apparently they don't make yankee candles like they used to, this one has no smell once burning. The wicks are so far down that once the candle melts the wick drowns and goes out. Not impressed for the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Beth
review: This candle was not a Yankee candle brand candle. It was cheap was, it smelled like my grandmother's perfume not pleasant and it didn't burn even but instead burned a hole into the candle straight down the wick leaving the majority of the candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Betty K.
review: This is my third time to light this candle. This far, the only scent I smell is burning wax‚Äînot pleasant nor what I want. Will be returning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Felicia Forrest
review: GARBAGE!!!! I just bought this and you can‚Äôt smell it unless you‚Äôre right next to it. It‚Äôs garbage. I was hoping to buy it in place of my bath and Bodyworks candles but don‚Äôt waste your time. Pay the money get the good stuff

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Rodney Marshall Jr.
review: The candle that I purchased arrived without a candle wick. Not sure how that slip through quality but Amazon quality has been slipping lately I've been a long-time customer but in the last month I've had a picture frame with a broken glass and now a candle with no Wick

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Jenny Y
review: The candle has a nice scent and seems to be lasting a while. I‚Äôve been lighting it almost daily for several hours for two weeks and I still have 3/4 of the candle/wick left.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Sandra Ford
review: Arrived shattered glass! Suggest caution opening got cut not expecting a box full of broken glass.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Kim
review: When I received this candle it was completely melted out of the box. The scent was OK but the wick was completely buried in melted wax so it was unusable. I will be returning for a full refund

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Draco
review: I guess this might be useful as a paperweight, but it releases absolutely no scent at all. I returned it and will not ever buy this brand again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: susiehere
review: Thank-you. I was looking for something for summer and on Prime Day, I thought what better than this scent. It truly is great and the smell is not over-bearing or not appealing. It is subtle and the candle‚Äôs color is pretty too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Bejewel
review: Haven‚Äôt purchased a Yankee Candle in awhile. Seems to me the scent used to be so much stronger. I can barely smell it at all. I purchased an Aromascape candle at the same time and what a difference. It is so much stronger. I‚Äôm no longer a fan of Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Lettie de Pina
review: I light it up as soon as it arrived, I was so excited! forget it, nothing, you only smell coconut if you stick ur nose up in the jar

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Laura courtney
review: This scent you cannot barely smell at all. The customer service was great and did replace it with another candle although that one barely had any scent as well

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Lauren
review: Loved this candle, was a good deal on sale. Second time I lit it the top of the glass broke when I put the top on after putting it out. How dangerous is that omg. Never had a yankee candle to this to me ever. Very Disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: GFS
review: This is the best summer fragrance from Yankee Candle! Recently alot of their scents are not strong or long lasting but this one still hits the mark!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Jadesky
review: Over priced.  No scent, just wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: sue
review: The candle looks nice but there really is no scent like I would‚Äôve expected from a Yankee candle. Disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: aca
review: Yankee still got it.  Compared to the other brand, I smell a tremendous difference.  My jar arrived fast in mint condition.  Thanks!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: schlemm
review: Bought these on Prime Day at a steep discount. The scent is great and reminds me of days on the beach...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: R and L
review: This is one of my favorite summer scent candles! The longevity is great too and often times Amazon is cheaper with faster shipping then the store itself.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Jenn
review: This is one of my favorite scented candles. It smells just like suntan lotion, which I love because it reminds me of the beach. It's not too strong or overpowering. Great price for a Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Maridyth N.
review: I love this scent! It truly reminds me of being at the beach.  This is a great gift for a friend or for yourself! Highly recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Pearl
review: The scent is really nice, not overwhelming but strong smell.  I will buy this again for myself or to gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Dcampbell
review: The candle came half full and melted at a slanted angle. I expected better when I purchased this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Kindle Customer
review: Very pleasing and warm fragrance.  Does not make my eyes burn and water as some other candles do.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Lisa Lee
review: I just did not like this scent it didn't have that wow factor. You know when something smells so damn good & you say WOW, that really smells good. Didn't remind me of Summer, the Bahamas or anything tropical.  It smelled more like a grapefruit missing something.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: C. Alcorn
review: Smells like urine when burning. When not burning, it smells fine. -Do not gift this candle. Urine scent -Do not light this candle. See above -Do enjoy it's color and opened aroma with the lid off.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Panman
review: Didn't know if I'd like this one or not so I bought it on the clearance rack. It's not a favourite. Glad I got it half off.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: marcog
review: Love love the scent of this candle. It‚Äôs very clean and fresh. It makes my house smell cleaner. The longevity it‚Äôs a little disappointing. I went through my first one really quick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Linda
review: LOVE ALL YANKEE CANDLES--** THEY ALL SMELL SOOOOOOO GOOD!!!  THIS ONE INCLUDED!!! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND-ANY-&- ALL!!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Gina
review: Barely a scent, did not burn evenly.  Yankee's quality has dropped dramatically. Was a Yankee fan for over 3 decades, but have noticed in the past decade, they're just not up to par.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Melissa
review: There was barely a scent and I had this in my half bathroom.  Would not purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Renee
review: I've been a Yankee Candle addict for well over 15 years, and this scent, "Home Sweet Home," is the only one I use year-round! This purchase was delivered a day early and is a REAL Yankee Candle, not fake (believe me, I would know immediately if they were). People have asked me why I always buy the Yankee Candle brand? Because they're more expensive than others. I explain to them that I have bought other "knockoffs" to save money before, only to end up getting exactly what I paid for...wasted wax without any scent at the last 1/3 to 1/4 of the jar üòí, so they didn't save me anything. I don't work for the company, but I am a stickler for being well informed, so I know why the Yankee Candles cost more than their competitors... See, other companies only use their scented wax at the top 3/4 or 1/2 of their candle products, the bottom is just colored wax with a hint of scent. This way, they are able to trick the average customer into buying them. Don't get me wrong, at first, they all have great "throw," however, as they burn down, their scent becomes much weaker. Some brands don't even use wicks long enough for their candles, causing them to fizzle out long before they should. Yankee Candle Company uses fully scented wax throughout the entire candle. They also have a high concentration of scented oils, to insure a strong throw of scent, from the first time you light it until it burns all the way down. *** P. S. Make sure you buy the REAL THING, not a cheap knockoff. I noticed that the complaints here are all about the "Cinnamon Sparkle" scent. Even though they're listed under the "Home Sweet Home" one. I ordered 2 of the "Home Sweet Home" scent here, and they're real Yankee Candle brand. If you get a fake one, like some of the other customers, report it to Amazon immediately! Amazon is just a distributor. They'll accept a return, even if your candle is burned to the wick, refund your money, then investigate to persecute the dirty posers!***

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Just sayin'..
review: I have had this scent for almost 20 years, give it take. The last one I had was bought about 5ish years ago and cycled seasonly with other Yankee Candles. It definitely always had a cinnamon smell but not like this. This one is almost satirical! This Home Sweet Home candle has such an exaggerated cinnamon smell, it burns the throat to smell it! You'll notice I made a point to let it be known I haven't bought a HSH Yankee candle in about 5 years. I did that incase Yankee has changed the formula to increase the Cinnamon. Or maybe it was a mistake buying on Amazon? Maybe it's a second? Or maybe I am just getting old and my olfactory glands are 'going' first? The only problem with the latter is the previous HSH candle I had was at it's wicks end and I was able to compare. So if it's my olfactory senses, they went haywire overnight. Yankee offers candles with Cinnamon in the name to let it be known cinnamon is what you're going to get. Wow, if they are more 'cinnamony' than this, it would double as a tear gas agent. Just imagine putting a Yankee cinnamon candle on a warmer during the holidays. One could clear out any family or friend visitors from sheer discomfort alone! This HSH is more than half way there. One could use this to politely clear any guests out of the home. It's just too much!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Teena
review: Please don‚Äôt by this scent. Home Sweet Home it is NOT.  It smells like an old man cologne. It just stinks!!!! I didn't return it because I lit it/ used. Recommend not to buy this candle scent unless you like old guy cologne smell. Lol

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: danielle kristjanson
review: This Yankee Candle smells amazing! It smells like a variety of warm spices and it has a hint of sweetness to it. It's not your typical fall scent so it can be used all year long, but it still puts me in the holiday spirit. I noticed it filled my entire bedroom with fragrance within only 20 minutes, which isn't typical for Yankee Candle nowadays. A lot of Yankee Candles are hit and miss in recent years with issues such as tunneling and no throw, but this candle was a hit! It's melting to the edges and smells lovely. This candle might have put my faith back in the brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: RSS
review: The scent is good if you like a really spicey aroma. I am not too happy about it but I hope the person I give it to likes the scent. Because it smells so spicey, I would recommend using it in a kitchen, breakfast room or dining room. I bought this to give to someone for a housewarming gift because the name of the candle is Home Sweet Home. I was very happy with the way this candle was packaged. It was wrapped very well in a shell of fitted cardboard and then boxed. It was delivered quickly and was completely intact, which is great because the candle is in a glass jar. I think this candle was too expensive, but I think all Yankee Candles are too expensive. I wish Yankee Candle would make more candle scents for housewarming gifts and name them accordingly.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: kellygirl925
review: This is one of my favorite selling candles from Yankee. The smell is wonderful and the candle last a long time. The price was a lot cheaper than at the Yankees store.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: SCEMB
review: Many years ago they were the best, but now, I'd rather use Colonial or Village, the smell is much more pronounced. Yankee has lost their edge, my opinion.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Kevin and Mari Cornish
review: I'm not sure what's going on with this candle. I've ordered this fragrance, Home Sweet Home, many times from Yankee Candle. The scent is always strong and pleasant and fills the entire house with fragrance.  This candle had no scent. It smells like it should when I take the lid off, but when I burn it- nothing. I purchased 2 of these and both have no fragrance when lit.  I won't purchase these from Amazon again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Chayse
review: Should‚Äôve listened to other reviews but I chose to give then a try bc we love this scent and couldn‚Äôt find a lot of alternatives especially not reasonably priced (if I recall correctly).  Arrived totally broken, couldn‚Äôt even unbox it due to amount of glass.  And of course we have forgotten to return it so will have to eat the cost.  Do yourself a favor and find a different seller because it‚Äôs clearly an issue on their end if this many people are bothering to inform others that it was broken via their review.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: BarryBonez
review: I hate it but I have to give it 5 stars because my mom likes it and it does what it promises. My entire house smells like the inside of a box of Red Hots candies. Other people complain about there being no scent, so maybe there is some sort of issue with consistency in these candles, but let me tell you, the one I have has my house absolutely reeking of spicy cinnamon. I dont really like the smell but the price was so cheap that I gave it a shot thinking 'it's probably not that strong of a smell'. Man was I wrong. So if you like the smell of Red Hots, give this a try, hopefully you dont get a dud like other people are complaining about.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Lori K
review: The two candles I bought are sitting in the exact spot I always put the candles I buy directly from Yankee. Even so, they burned down the middle like cheap candles.  I had to scrap the wax off the sides to fill in the cavern. That helped somewhat build the sides, but the wick is spent.  Huge waste of money. They smell great and look great until you start using them. Reviews on the Yankle Candle website show the same poor quality feedback. I contacted Yankee Xandke and was told the Amazon Store that's called Yankee Candke isn't Yankee Candle. So, no guarantees.  And the Amazon "Yankee Candle" won't reply.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Mom of 2
review: Honestly if you are not in the same room you can not smell anywhere else. Disappointing as i love this as a holiday scent. ****UPDATE. I ORIGINALLY BOUGHT 2 CANDLES. MY FIRST REVIEW WAS FOR THE FIRST ONE. TODAY I DECIDED TO TRY THE 2ND ONE BEFORE SENDING BACK AND IT SMELLS SO GOOD. MY WHOLE FAMILY COMMENTED ON IT. I HAVE NO IDEA WHY ONE CANDLE HAD POOR THROW AND ANOTHER SAME CANDLE HAD WONDERFUL THROW AND SMELL

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Bryan J. Mulholland
review: I love the scent of Home Sweet Home. It's perfect to get you in the holiday spirit.  However, my experience mirrors that of numerous other reviews: this candle is the weakest Yankee Candle I've ever smelled.  With every other Yankee Candle, after one is lit, I can smell it throughout the entire house.  With this one, the only way I can smell it is if I bend down over the candle and take a deep whiff while it's burning. I've never had a problem with Yankee Candle's QC before.  This leads me to believe that my candle is either counterfeit or several years old.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Lori in georgia
review: I never bought yankee candles because of the cost, This year for Christmas my husband wanted us to have them. I bought 3, 2 vannila and this cinnamon. The 2 Val. came in first I was so ready to light them and have my house smell like a cookie.. That didn't happen you could not smell them at all. When the cinnamon came in the glass jar was broken so i couldn't use it. They sent me another with no trouble but, when i got it it had no smell either... Very disapointed to pay that much and my 5 dollar walmart candles smelled better..

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Lyse M. Gunderson
review: It also seems that it will only last that long IF it isn't burned CONTINUOUSLY for that amount of time.  The candle needs to rest and reset for it to last that long. I'm not impressed by the scent, but then again, I much prefer earthy or floral scents over food or spice flavored scents.  So vanilla cupcake, cinnamon stick, cookie dough or other such nonsense is not my thing in a candle.  By far my favorite is Yankee's Balsam and Fir. Now that's a candle!  Lavender? YES.  This cinnamon stick is rather weak, just a meager hint of something old in the oven but is is cinnamon? hmmm. not sure.  Could be a baked potato

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: G. Avci
review: I don‚Äôt like food smell. I have an open concept kitchen and living room. So when I cook something smelly like roasted garlic or fried fish, the smell gets all over the place. This candle is magic! I light it up and in five minutes my kitchen smells amazing. Even my husband noticed the smell and enjoyed it. I definitely recommend it.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Ginger
review: I was truly hoping for Yankee candle quality. Not even halfway down through the candle the wicked disappeared. Generally, when you light a Yankee candle, it will easily, leave it‚Äôs more than aromatic scent. My downstairs is more than 1200 ft.¬≤, the whole first floor, attic, and the stairs going down to the basement are always inundated with the delightful smell. Sadly, it did not encompass this area in the least. It barely scented my 14x14 kitchen.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Kindle Customer
review: Very disappointed. I don't buy many Yankee candles because they are too expensive for my budget. I splurged on this one since it is Christmas season. I love the Christmas smell of balsam and the spicy scent of cloves. This candle has very little scent (had scent the first time I burned it but that has faded out) and what it has smells more like baby powder. Absolutely no clove scent at all and no balsam scent either. I paid almost $30 for this candle and it will it in the closet because it's pretty worthless as to making the house smell nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: HamiltonLane
review: This is what i think a house should smell like during the holidays. Its a very light, comforting smell. I use it when i have people over and its the 1st thing the mention coming in the door- smells like home. Its hard to decide the smell beyond that. Makes me think of spice cake and cinnamon, apple pie, and xmas. Hands down my fav scent from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Austin Grandma
review: In appearance, the candle is excellent. I have almost burned it to the bottom, and I see no sign that the wick is going to disappear, as some people have reported. Unfortunately, the most important characteristic of a scented candle is the scent, and it‚Äôs much less than I hoped. I purchased the ‚Äúsparkling cinnamon,‚Äú and I can only smell it when I‚Äôm within a few feet of the candle. If I leave the house, I will notice it when I come back in, but it‚Äôs faint. I would not purchase this candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Maria Hull
review: I had received this scent of candle 22 years ago as a gift‚Ä¶.. the smell is as stated ‚Äúhome sweet home‚Äù. 22 years later I‚Äôm still buying it. This is the first time I‚Äôve gotten it from Amazon, and was a bit hesitant. If you are, don‚Äôt be!!! It was packaged beautifully, and soundly. The quality is all YANKEE, and it fills the house will amazing smell!! Great candle. I‚Äôll definitely be buying more scents from Amazon in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Renee
review: As for Yankee Candles, excellent in all regards! I recommend for any reason! Sorry to say that (1) one of the (2) two candles I ordered were broken upon delivery. I heard the glass shards rattling in the (1) one box when I picked it up in the mail room. I am not going to ask for a refund/replacement this time, but will if it happens on the next. This is unusual for me to experience in all my 15 years of an Amazon cutomer.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: H.M
review: I was excited to get these candles at $11.99 but I see why they were so cheap now. I've always bought Yankee Candles but these aren't like any I have had in the past. There is no scent! You literally have to put your nose up to the candle while it's burning to smell anything. Usually Yankee Candles when burning will fill my entire home with the scent. I would not recommend these particular candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Robin Alwine
review: This apple-cinnamon scent actually permeates a large room, which I've found a little unusual for this brand.  This scent is crisp, reminiscent of fall and Thanksgiving.  Like all their large jar candles, it burns a for a long time. The wick creates a lot of smoke, though, and their prices have skyrocketed.  Fancy jars and colors don't make a good candle.  Good scent, longevity, and quality wicks do.  Not to mention, these include paraffin.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Teri Barker
review: I purchased this Yankee Sparkling Cinnamon Candle from Amazon and literally let it burn for 8 hours and there was absolutely ‚ÄôNO‚Äô scent at all!  I had previously purchased a Sparkling Cinnamon Candle from an actual Yankee Candle Store at our local Mall.  It was rich with cinnamon scent. I‚Äôve been told before there are cheaper versions and to only buy from the store... now I believe it!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Sunni
review: The candle arrived double-boxed, however the wax inside was broken and all on one side of the jar. I melted it down to liquid wax to make it useable. I will only buy candles from Walmart where I can inspect them first. Same price there, $16.88.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Amazon Customer
review: It's rare, but YC seems to have produced a bad batch. I've been buying this flavor for years, but this one smells wrong - only very faint cinnamon. I don't THINK it's my nose, as other candles from last year smell ok, but what do I know. And no, I'm not sick. Take it with a nose of salt.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Candace
review: dont buy candles are sent out in bags and come broken and a ball of melted wax I am going to return this hope no one gets cut all I can say big waste of time and money I cant gift it or use it thanks for my troubles prime time is becoming more problems i might just start going back to stores with this kind of help and service

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Annchapman
review: I have purchased Yankee candles for years and was very disappointed .I remember when sugar cookie candles had a very pleasant strong scent this candle had no more scent than if you had gone to a craft store and bought a cheap candle.. it was a waste of money.. I got more scent from my airwick plug in products... Yankee candle has gone downhill

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Schim
review: I wasn't sure I'd like this but it smells great! I've been burning it most evenings since I got it. Perfect fall scent. I'll definitely buy this one again. Update: In the process of buying 3 more every one that comes is smashed in its box.  Broken glass all over the place.  Yankee Candle packages them well so someone is really mistreating these boxes to have them all smashed up.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Elizabeth V
review: I ordered this Yankee candle because the company is known for its great scents that you can smell through your house. This scent when you smell the candle directly has a cinnamon scent, but when you light it, the candle only has the light smell that it‚Äôs burning without any of the scent. It‚Äôs not even worth lighting because who wants a slight burning smell in their house?

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Gary B. Sessa
review: It's been burning now for about two hours and I still don't get cinnamon wafting through the house. It smelled really good when I first opened it, but unless you are right over the candle, you wouldn't know it's burning. Big disappointment. I imagine the longevity is the same as the other Yankee candles; however, I do not recommend buying it since the scent is so weak.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Brooke1982
review: For a candle, it functions well. For a Yankee Candle, definitely not the quality I‚Äôm used to. The top looked like it had melted some but I didn‚Äôt order it during any extreme heat. I‚Äôve also burned the candle twice now and it doesn‚Äôt give off any smell, which is why I purchased it.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Tay
review: Due to COVID restrictions, I was unable to obtain a yahrtzeit candle on time for the anniversary of my mothers death. This seemed like a hefty candle and was deliverable in-time, so I went for it with the hopes that it would be large enough to burn in her memory for the length of the day. I was quite overjoyed when the candle burned for three days straight, and it smelled wonderful too. It may not have been a yahrtzeit, but I felt at peace nonetheless.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: IndyColo
review: The only brand I buy or gift. I burn it all the time.  Care and Longevity Hint: For the first burning only use for an hour.  After that snip the top of wick before lighting everytime. This will help keep the candle burning evenly. If it has two wicks as this candle does, make sure when you snip that the wicks are the same size. They always melt evenly with no wax build up on sides and no crater where the wicks are located. Love these Candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: SJ
review: I am not impressed of this candle. I got deceived for I thought it's good when lighting this candle. I regret not taking a picture how the candle looks like when you already have the candle burning because it made the entire glass black because of the flame. Also as I was trying to finish the candle, it didn't continue lighting because there's no wick left. More left over candles as it stopped lighting.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: New homeowners
review: We purchase scented candles to make our home feel more cozy.  At this time, we aren‚Äôt sharing many indoor spaces with others, so feeling comfortable is most important.  The candle scents will vary during the year.  This one reflects baking on a cold winter day and anticipated enjoyment of time with our friends and family so come.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Britt
review: I specifically ordered this because it was supposed to smell like real cinnamon. Sadly, it has more of a clove scented base. I got tired of buying cinnamon scented pine cones and I wanted something that lasted longer than they do. Unfortunately I'm just not a fan of the candle like I was hoping I would be. Seems to last awhile, but the scent is not close enough to genuine cinnamon for my liking.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: michaeldj5
review: This is absolutely the last time I will buy a Yankee Candle Sparkling Cinnamon candle. I am appalled at the lack of scent this thing puts out. The candle smells so nice when it's unlit. But, as soon as you start burning it, it produces virtually no scent whatsoever. My Bath & Body Works cinnamon-scented candle fills the room with scent. I'll stick with them from here on out. I wish I could return this pathetic candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Jen
review: I'm going with the other reviews of the sparkling cinnamon.  If it is authentic, it's definitely not up to standards of Yankee Candle.  It isn't burning evenly and has an "off" aroma.  My family never comments on my candle obsession, but each one has asked me to throw this one away.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Maria
review: It's FAKE!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!! We've been using Yankee candles for a decade now and this is the first time that we had a Yankee candle that doesn't have a scent/smell at all even for hours of burning. Another thing is it melts and easily. I'm definitely reporting this to Yankee Candle company.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: K-Del
review: I have been buying Yankee candles for years and have always liked them.  I almost always buy Cinnamon stick and when the large jar is done I order another. The candle I bought earlier this year has barely any scent, where it used to fill the entire level of the house with fragrance. I wasted $30 on this thing and wish I could return it. I will not be buying from Yankee anymore in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: lvd Zwaag
review: This is one of my favorite holiday/winter candles. Guests often comment about how my home smells when I have it burning. I have an open livingroom/diningroom/kitchen space and it can fragrant the space. It may be a bit strong if in a smaller space. I've always had a lot of success with my purchase of Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Scott
review: I've placed 4 separate orders on Amazon for 2 candles per order (over the last 2 weeks).  On 2 orders, I have gotten the wrong candles.  Who is doing QC on these orders?  The candles are nice, and they smell good, but when your order 2 of the same candle and get random candles in the box...that's a problem. The candle smells good, but 3 stars because the seller needs to do better.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: mda
review: I  ordered 4 Sparkling Cinnamon candles and upon arrival 2 had leaked wax out of the container and were a mess. One other candle has very little scent. When the box was delivered I picked it up immediately so it wasn't subject to hot weather and melting once it was delivered.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Wendy Tietz
review: I have bought this exact candle at Yankee Candle store and it smelled great. Buying this on Amazon, the best way I can describe the smell is paint thinner. I decided to go to Yankee to make sure my scenes weren't off and it smelled like it should have. Never buying candles unless its from the store.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Fran Claflin
review: Send this candle back

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: W. logan
review: I opened the boxes and the two candles sprayed red wax all over everything on my desk and the floor.  I have used Yankee Candles for years and never had this issue. Not happy with the mess.  I have recently purchased a few other scents and did not have this issue.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Jessica Dawn Campbell
review: I love Yankee candles, but just like everything there‚Äôs going to be some since you like less than others, home for the holidays is it my top choice. I was able to give this as a gift though and the person receiving it absolutely loved it. It all worked out and again it was packaged impeccably.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Manilisa
review: The Sparkling Cinnamon: Smells amazing, but a piece broke of easily as I was putting the lid on. Disappointed though because I could not give it as a gift - which is the reason I got it. The Balsam Cedar: I LOVE the smell so much! but I was sad when I opened it. It was all broken in pieces :( so I couldn‚Äôt give it as a gift either.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Sherrian Reece
review: I don't know what happen to Yankee Candle, but I bought this as a gift and also bought one for myself. I was so embraced to find there's no fragrance in mine. I've been embraced to ask about hers. I won't buy another one.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Denna
review: The description for these candles states that they are 2-wick medium tumblers that weigh 14.5 ounces. I ordered 3 of them thinking that it was a great price! Well, what I received is not what is described. They only weigh 7 ounces (half of those advertised) and there is only 1 wick. Be careful that you don't get bamboozled like I did.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: AF
review: Two arrived in the same package.  One was fine and the other in pieces.  It's actually the medium 2 wick tumbler but for some reason it's showing the jar which arrived in good condition.  When the jars arrived, they were packaged really well.  These came wrapped in bubble wrap in a flimsy paper envelope.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: kate
review: This has a pleasant scent that is strong enough to kill odors quickly.  I only buy 2 wick.  I don't like that if you don't pay attention 2 columns burn straight down with high sides.  Have bought many candles of this brand. I prefer this wider opening to the other jars.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Evefalling
review: The scent just isn't there.  It smelled great when I first got it, but as it burns,  it loses it scent.  Won't buy this one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: DAVID FERGUS
review: I BARELY smell this candle!!!! very disappointed i thought yankee candle made good strong smelling candles??? either its the scent the candle or both not worth it stick to BATH AND BODY WORKS THIS IS LIKE A LARGE CHEAP DOLLAR TREE CANDLE GARBAGE!!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: April Jones
review: I'm not usually a Yankee Candle customer, because they are a bit pricey... but this was on sale, half off - so I said YAY! The scent is nice and it burns for a long time... though you can't really smell the candle when you step away from it... I love a candle you can actually smell... but, for the price, it was a good buy!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Monica Dutton
review: This just showed up. It smells great because it is a melty mess out the top of the jar. The lid has been pushed off with the wax. Super disappointed this is how it arrived. Will be sending back for a new one.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: elle
review: I had this candle lit for about 30 minutes and could not smell a thing! Not sure if all Yankee candles are trending this way, but this particular one was beyond disappointing. Will be returning for sure as I ordered 2!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Cindy Kates
review: Loved this candle! The scent is fantastic if you want your house to smell like cinnamon, which I do. It lasted along time as well. Matter of fact, this would be a great gift for your candle lover as well. I would buy this again and again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: chips627
review: I have been purchasing Yankee Candles in their store and on Amazon for a long time and this is the first time I have been disappointed.  There is no scent at all.  Not even a whiff.  What a waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle was no big deal smell wise. What smell is question. I wanted my room to smell beautiful and basically this is just a red candle. Also the two wicks are not required it almost takes away from relaxing vibe as the seems to vibrant and strong.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Uboatman
review: These candles (I would assume all under the brand name of Yankee Candle) have far too much soot and debris while burning.  For the price; unacceptable.  Potentially an airborne contaminant.  Recommend consumers look for a product with less smoke, soot and debris.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: cwarriner
review: Yankee Candles are the best I have found, except for Illuminations, but I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre in business any more. Kitchen Spice is the perfect scent for the holidays. But... Amazon said this candle wouldn‚Äôt be available until January, so I left it in my cart and ordered one from Yankee Candle - at almost twice the price. Still waiting for that one to arrive.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Katie
review: This was amazing. When I opened my mailbox, the scent wafted it out towards me powerfully. Unfortunately, the candle jar had cracked. They sent me a new one immediately. And the smell is one of the best and most powerful out of all candles I have ever burnt.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Tiddywagon
review: I don't understand why some yankee candles are really powerful and others don't even permeate the room.  This one doesn't get very smelly when burned.  Womp.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: WhyteKnyte
review: Smells quite nice. It takes about an hour for the scent to really start spreading. Yankee candles usually last significantly longer than cheaper candles, which is a bonus. The scent is strong enough to be noticed upstairs while I burn it on the main level, but is not overbearing when sitting nearby. Product is as advertised.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: njlady
review: The fragrance in these candles is always great and the candles burn evenly.  IMO it's  much better to buy these than less expensive brands where you can hardly smell the fragrance when you open the jar.  Will always buy this brand of candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Irene L

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice

review: Sent this item as a gift but she received the wrong item. A small 1-wick candle. Unfortunately I was unable to exchange it because she didn‚Äôt know it was supposed to be a larger candle and used it. Annoying that I didn‚Äôt get my money‚Äôs worth. If you‚Äôre gifting this product send it to yourself first so you can make sure it‚Äôs correct.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Rexlyn Herrmann
review: I love Yankee Candles and this smells so great.  Great price and got this very quickly.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Sayeh
review: Nothing captures the sense of autumn in the countryside like this scent - has been my favorite for 2o years!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Peggy
review: We love this scent of Yankee Candles.  Have been purchasing it for several years.  The best price we've gotten it was on Amazon.  We will probably buy more from them.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Suzie
review: I love these and amazon keep me from having to go to the mall to get them, yay

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Amazon Customer
review: Kitchen Spice is our favorite Yankee Candle scent. It is fragrant and noticeable when lit. Definitely recommend this one. Go for the large jar- you won‚Äôt regret.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: McCumby Family
review: I have a sensitive nose and I feel this candle has an inferior scent to Bath and Body Works candles, but has a longer burn time. The scent is good, but weak.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Amazon Customer
review: I used to buy this brand and scent all the time.  1 candle would make my entire downstairs smell amazing.  They have gotten cheap with the oils.  I was burning 3-4 in my downstairs and the house barely had any scent.  Target or Bath and Body have stronger candles

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Glenda Hawthorne
review: Wonderful scent from this long-lasting Yankee Candle. You won't be disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: L. D.
review: This used to be my absolute favorite candle. I was so confused when I burned it and I could not smell it. I had burned a different brand of candle shortly before this one and it smelled wonderful. I've tried setting it on a table right next to my chair and I still can't smell it. Huge disappointment and waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: kevin walters
review: Like everything about this candle. Price, scent. Great purchase and I'm extremely happy.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Patrick
review: Completely misleading description:  Candle is 7oz, not 16oz. 1 wick, not 2. Yankee Candle is conflating different descriptions and it‚Äôs not in the buyers favor. Tiny candle for $16.46 :-( Just say no!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Katie O.
review: I bought half price on Amazon, this is my favorite scent. Candle had holes and air bubbles, clearly the reason for lower price.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Panman
review: Like spicy air and Yankee always fills the bill. The clearance center offers good buys on large candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: T.J. Menard-Johnson
review: My favorite scent from Yankee, the only candle I buy from them anymore unless they're having an excellent sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Anne Carr
review: The scent of this candle is fantastic......i could smell it even before I opened the package.  That's because is leaked gooey oily gunk out of the cocked lid.  Not sure how that happened since it arrived in a Yankee box with the jar protective insert, however the box appeared to have been previously opened and retaped.  May have been someone else's return.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Len
review: Girlfriend loves this candle with the light cinnamon scent and homey feel

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Mystical Lady
review: My favorite scent of Yankee candle.  Fast shipping and great prices

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Justin
review: It smells like cinnamon-flavored candy. Like big red chewing gum or fireballs or red hots. Unfortunately, I hate those candies.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Cindy
review: Very disappointed with the smell being extremely light. Normally when I have a yankee candle lit I can smell it in 2-3 rooms. This 1 you have to be standing next to it to smell it. Even hrs after it‚Äôs been burning. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Robin
review: I got this candle for my home office hoping the scent would be invigorating, as I have found lemon to be. I was very excited about its arrival to the point that I stalked its delivery progress like I would have a major electronic. Alas, I am super disappointed. The candle seems to burn well, and it probably burns long. However, it is sitting right next to my computer, and I cannot smell a thing, which is odd because I can smell scents as well as a dog. So, the search for an invigorating lemon candle continues.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Jules
review: SMELLS AMAZING! I haven‚Äôt even lit it yet and I could smell it outside of the packaging it came in. I‚Äôm so glad I ordered it! If you love citrus üçä smells buy this candle. I have a feeling I will be making repeat purchases for my ‚ÄúHoney Clementine‚Äùüéºüéºüéº. #inLOVEwithmycandle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Maria Robin Estes
review: I ordered 2 of these candles which were sold by the same company. They were shipped and arrived on different days. I‚Äôm still trying to understand why. Both candles were shipped poorly. The 1st had the top tapped as if done by an elementary student and thrown in a box. The 2nd appeared to have been taped, but somehow the top became detached and it was shipped in an envelope. What I noticed upon opening the envelope was lack of fragrance. I cleaned away the tape and decided to light the candle and burn for a couple of hours. I was extremely dissatisfied. There was a very faint fragrance and the candle began to burn straight down the center. I‚Äôve purchased this candle in the past. I know how beautiful the fragrance is or should be and these candles last for a long time. The candle that I‚Äôve been using in my bathroom was purchased in November 2019 and while I don‚Äôt burn it every day. It is still very fragrant and after a year still has quite a bit of burn time left. My Plan was to gift one of these candles to a friend for her Birthday but due to the tacky wrapping, it simply is not presentable!! Poor quality and presentation for the Cost. This was a very bad investment!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Robin
review: I got this candle for my home office hoping the scent would be invigorating, as I have found lemon to be. I was very excited about its arrival to the point that I stalked its delivery progress like I would have a major electronic. Alas, I am super disappointed. The candle seems to burn well, and it probably burns long. However, it is sitting right next to my computer, and I cannot smell a thing, which is odd because I can smell scents as well as a dog. So, the search for an invigorating lemon candle continues.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Jules
review: SMELLS AMAZING! I haven‚Äôt even lit it yet and I could smell it outside of the packaging it came in. I‚Äôm so glad I ordered it! If you love citrus üçä smells buy this candle. I have a feeling I will be making repeat purchases for my ‚ÄúHoney Clementine‚Äùüéºüéºüéº. #inLOVEwithmycandle
