product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Janet
review: Balsam and Cedar from Yankee Candle is one of my favorite, most nostalgic scents. I work from home and like to have a candle going while I work. I purchased the 2 wick tumbler and have been using it every day for the past few weeks. I have been impressed with the burn, throw, and longevity of the candle. The candle was packaged nicely and safely and arrived unharmed. I have no complaints!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Indigo
review: I ordered candles from Bath and Body Works but they were taking too long to get here. So I ordered this to give the house that Holiday smell. This candle has terrible scent throw. If you sniff the candle it has a scent but when you light it....nothing. And before you blame it on Covid, the Bath and Body Works candles came and 1 candle makes the whole downstairs smell heavenly! 0/10 would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Keith Jones
review: After our real Tree died two weeks after going up again for the 2nd year in a row, we ditched the real tree and picked up an artificial one. The downside is missing the scent of evergreen in the house... Well this candle eliminates the downside. The Balsam and Cedar Yankee Candle gives us that pine scent we were missing with an artificial tree.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Willie
review: Not at all what they used to be! I remember when these candles would fill the house. These barely fill a decent size room now! I bought 2 of the balsam and cedar to get into the holiday season. Ones in the living room and one is in a bathroom. Neither room gets any scent/smell. Even when you put your nose to the candles you can barely smell anything. I'll stick with Wood Wick!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Susie Brown
review: I bought this candle to burn at Christmas with my family. Wonderful! Smells SO good and burns cleanly with no soot. I feel that the candle could have lasted longer; however, I did use it a lot, so there‚Äôs that.  It‚Äôs a taller candle, so you‚Äôll want to get some long fireplace matches to light the double wicks as the candle starts to burn down.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Gamer Gal
review: I have purchased Yankee Candles in the past and have enjoyed many of the fragrances. THIS one however, called Balsam & Cedar is not good. To me, it smells like a mix between Pine Sol cleaner and wax. It reminds me of a hospital floor after just being mopped. I will still buy Yankee Candles with different scents but never this one again - wow.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: James D Rice
review: I like the smell a great deal. I've always been partial to cedar and they got the scent just right. However the wicks in the candle aren't quite long enough, which makes it a little tricky to light without burning my fingers on the match, and also causes the melting wax to cause the flame to sputter. It lasts about half an hour before the flame has nearly burned out. On the other hand there's a great deal of wonderfully scented candle and I expect it to last a couple months, even burning a few hours a day. If balsam and cedar is your thing then this is probably worth the price tag.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Karrie S
review: I have bought Yankee Candles before and really liked them.  I am wondering about this 2 wick version.  First of all, it arrived with a large part of the candle shrunk away from the glass.  Very unattractive and one like this would never be put on the shelf in the store.  The fragrance is not very strong.  You can only smell it if you are close by.  That is not the room filling scent I recall.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Gentle Reader
review: Really disappointed with the fragrance.  Gone is the fresh pine smell.  This is more chemically and fake. It might be fine for some, but not at all what I enjoy.  I won't buy this candle again, regardless of the well known name.  I'm committing that to memory, so I don't make this mistake next year at Christmas. :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Neen*8
review: I got the balsam one but the scent isnt exactly foresty but more perfume-like which kinda irritates my nose a little. After burning it for a while, I just cant stand the smell. It's a great price for the quantity but I'm not sure if this is the best balsam/cedar scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: C. Rich
review: These candles smoke and have about a foot of throw. I‚Äôm grateful it wasn‚Äôt expensive.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Liquid Lab Fx
review: Yankee used to be the KING of candles. Now they just aren't.  Barley any scent. Burn pretty inconsistent. Overpriced. And No this is Covid related based on CNN. Or MSNBC. Bottom line there quality has gone way down.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Chicken Wing
review: Ordered these for my holiday table.  They arrived perfect and smell so good.  I loved saving so much money since I purchased from Amazon instead of the actual store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Amazon Customer
review: I have always purchased B&BW candles. This was my 1st Yankee Candle and I must say it lived up to the hype. I burned it several days during the holiday season and it could be smelled all over my house every time. It burned evenly and it burned down to the bottom of the jar. I got my money's worth. I definitely will buy Yankee Candles again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: William Thompson
review: This candle is i think the best one we have ever gotten. We burned it right before Thanksgiving and Christmas!!! It smells like a Christmas tree and it makes it feel like Christmas already! I highly recommend this candle if you like the smell of Christmas trees.üéÑüòÉ

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Shannon
review: Great smell, similar to my favorite Christmas tree type, noble fir. We have an artificial tree now, so I miss the smell and bought this to burn during the season. This candle LASTS way longer than others I've tried. I've probably burned it for 30+ hours and there's still half or so left!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: MJ
review: I was sent an old expired candle, it was so old the rubber on the lid was a gross brownish yellow, there's no scent left, the wicks won't stay lit, really terrible, it's too bad that a company would do that to their customers.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: jamie
review: I guess growing up in the forest has my nose finely tuned because this thing smells like the worst cheapest pine toilet bowl cleaner. Yuck

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Conor B.
review: The scent is potent and allows me to pretend it's Christmas all-year-round. I'd plop this candle as my top candle on my candle ranking list. There are certainly specific boutique scents that are glorious but this scent always delivers in a bold and satisfying way.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Barbara Retherford
review: This candle smells great & would make a really nice gift for someone special. Lovely Christmas candle or anytime candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Radio Cure
review: We love these! This year we actually got both this one and Yankee Candle's cinnamon one and alternated each night during Christmastide. The twin wicks do get a little more difficult to light as the candles burn lower but the burn time itself is quite long. And, yes, an excellent gift idea!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Steve E.
review: I love balsam candles, especially the one from Bath & Body Works, but this Yankee variety doesn't put off much of a scent and it constantly pools up with liquefied wax, making the wicks burn very low and inefficiently.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Elizabeth A. Hodges
review: Yankee Candle is a great company with candles that have long-lasting fragrances. Prices are reasonable when ordered from Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: krystaljo
review: I'm used to strongly scented Yankee candles, but for some reason, this one didn't seem to emit much scent at all. I have the exact same candle in a jar with a heavy glass lid that I purchased 2 years ago, and that one infuses our house with way more smell. Not sure what's changed with this one, but I'm a little disappointed. Happy I got it on sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Lori Jubenville
review: Can't even smell this candle. I get Yankee Candles all the time and I don't understand why this one has no scent. It's Pine and can't smell it. üò≠ the smell would fill up my living room now you can't even smell it unless you put your nose right up to it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: John Hicks
review: I purchase this candle to give us the smell of a real Christmas tree and it did not disappoint!  Not too strong (I have allergies and asthma and many candles bother me).  It was just right.  Very lovely smell.  Highly recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Renee R.
review: I wanted my home to smell like a real Christmas Tree and this was delivered. Love love love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Karen T
review: One of my favorite scents is evergreen, so I‚Äôm picky. This candle meets my approval. Smells like Christmas.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Dan McDonald
review: Surprisingly, what I like most about this candle is that it makes the room smell good and woodsy, even when not lit.  Like a long lasting air freshener!  (Tip:  Take it out of the glass - it will make the room smell better)

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: TLC
review: I like the smell. Notable is its lingetivity, it burns evenly, and would also make a nice gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Michael J Foster
review: WONDERFUL & LONG-LASTING BUT ** ESPECIALLY ** REMINDS  ME  OF  THE BALSAM  CHRISTMAS TREES OF  MY  YOUTH ... ( 75-YEARS-AGO !!! ) ===============

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: J. Baird
review: This is my favorite winter candle, reminds me of when I was young my mom used to burn these. Last very long and provide a nice strong scent. Perfect for christmas time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Ruthlas
review: My house always smells invigorating and the double wick keeps the candle burning evenly. I wish they weren‚Äôt so expensive or had a multiple offer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: John Parker
review: This candles scent is awesome.  I've  never gotten a bad candle from Yankee Candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Lyric Jones
review: Last long and smells great

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Conor
review: One of my favorite scents by Yankee Candle! Arrived quickly, burns nicely, and the scent is strong enough to fill my house but not so strong that it is irritating. Will definitely be buying again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: amy gregory
review: The is a great scent and a great product, does not come packaged or presents well as a gift. Ended up keeping this one for myself.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Mrsfamilyfirst
review: Great buy smells like a fresh Christmas tree

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Jo A. Miller
review: Packaging was really nice.  Aroma smells just like the woods.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Magic
review: Love this 2 wick candle smells great and burns slow. Gifted a few of these for Christmas after I bought one for my use. They loved the candle too!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Suz
review: Always a good candle to buy. I'm never disappointed burns great,  the scent is mild and last a long time. It's is great to use if your lights go out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: christine
review: this candel has no smell i burned this twice 2 hours each time and i could not smell anything

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: kate
review: Most candles have a weak scent.  Yankee Candles quickly fill more than one room with the scent.  The 2 wick candles are especially good.  They are worth the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Assaf
review: Smells nice, not strong enough in my opinion

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: J. Dunn
review: Burned for hours and it gave off virtually no scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Kathy Casey
review: First time I've given a Yankee less than 5 stars but when these wicks gave up the ghost, I still had 2 inches of candle left.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Cheryl
review: I have asthma and copd and it did not bother me at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Laurel Bide
review: Love it. Want it. Buying another one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Natasha
review: It‚Äôs good, the scent is a little off from what I was expecting though, it is a little sweet. I‚Äôve used it many times and isn‚Äôt even halfway gone. Would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Kristin
review: I liked the scent.  It filled a room and was a wonderful winter holiday fragrance.  The delivery was timely.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Leroy
review: Smells of burning wax‚Ä¶ aka no scent whatsoever‚Ä¶

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Jenn
review: Smells amazing but unfortunately arrived broken due to carrier even though packaging seems sufficient. Will have to repurchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Lulu
review: The scent was great especially with the tree that was in the living room. I have it a star less because it didn't last as long as I had expected it to. One month was too short for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Evan Smith
review: got halfway through the candle and then i heard a pop and the glass jar the candle is on cracked all the way down the side... i blew it out and let it cool off, and relit the candle a few days later and 10 min in it popped again and the cracks got bigger. I'm not going to risk injury for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Christopher pompei
review: Last long smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Teresa M.
review: I am very disappointed especially for the price of these candles that you couldn‚Äôt smell the scent at all

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Amazon Customer
review: This is a favorite of mine.  I have noticed this candle is a different wax than the other jars with glass tops/lids.  It makes the scent more pronounced and I love it!!  Best price I have found too!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Amazon Customer
review: If you place your nose right above the candle, you will find a very fragrant aroma.  I would have anticipated that the fragrance would have filled the room.  Unfortunately, that was not the case.  Amazon was very nice and refunded my money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: New Leaf
review: I just lit my Yankee candle for the first time today. What a pleasant fragrance!  It's the best yet.  I will order again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: One-Fabulous-Find
review: Hubby loves this scent. These cover cooking odors well and quickly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: mrs. keller
review: very disappointed !!! has no smell at all!  how is that possible?  did it sit in a hot warehouse so long that the scent is gone?

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: That Guy
review: Great holiday scent.  Lasts quite a while even with 'always on' kinda use.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Multijeweled
review: So disappointed. Burned for hours and could barely smell the scent. Waste of money. Back to Bath and Body candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Timothy

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: D and T
review: Would be great for a large home.  Almost overwhelming for a smaller home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Renee
review: Great price!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Ana
review: Arrived overseas safely and its everything I expected

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: cassandra
review: First product arrived melted with no visible wicks. I immediately went to return them but decided shipping them back was a barrier and pain in my butt - so I decided to keep them. Had to melt the wax to even find the dang wicks. üôÑ But this wax is off big time. I‚Äôve bought from yankee a bunch from my local mall, so I feel familiar with the products‚Ä¶. And these candles aren‚Äôt it. The wax is like a dollar store candle. I do not think these are actual yankee candles. I would skip this purchase. I‚Äôve been buying village candles from Amazon and they‚Äôve smelt better, and felt cleaner.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Coloratura Kiki
review: I like candles, especially on dark winter evenings, and even in Southern California, it gets chilly in the evenings, and of course our winter nights are long. I bought two of these large candles: Balsam and Cedar and Red Apple Wreath. (Wish I'd gotten Christmas Cookie.) To me, the Balsam and Cedar is the stronger smelling, but it smells a little more like soap than like a forest or a Christmas tree! The Red Apple Wreath has a lovely scent, but it would have been nice if the scent were a little stronger. The candles do last quite a long time, and thankfully, they burn clean. No nasty dark marks on ceilings or walls. That is a very important point to me. I like the containers, but these candles are so large that you really need a barbecue lighter to light them once they burn down low. Overall, very nice candles that would have been perfect five stars had the scent been up to par, but it just wasn't. This is especially true of my favorite of the two, the Red Apple Wreath. It's so difficult to find a really good scented candle today, and, sadly, these don't really rise to the occasion. Almost, but not quite. I will definitely use them, but I'm disappointed in the lack of a stronger scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath

review: I‚Äôm annoyed it was shipped like this and don‚Äôt feel like going  through the process of returning it. üò´

So we replaced it, just received it today, glass jar again shattered. Couldn't figure out why the driver even delivered it considering you can hear the shattered glass in the box. :*(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Jen
review: This smells delicious. Very Christmas-y. It‚Äôs honestly my favorite candle, except for the fact that the price will jump all over the place, from 14.99-16.99 all the way up to 30 dollars or more. I use Amazon because it is supposed to be affordable. We are in a pandemic right now, and, this will sound crazy but this candle is very therapeutic to me. I would buy one or two a week if they were more affordable. I‚Äôve relied on Amazon heavily throughout this pandemic, and I know that I‚Äôm not owed anything, but you guys could afford to stop the price gouging on not only necessities, but also the small things that make people happy. Thank you and I hope you will submit this review.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath

review: Turns out  that red apple wreath is not a scent I love and it gave me a headache. It also popped tiny red wax blobs all over my butcher block counter top and stained it red.

review: Perfect autumn/winter candle. I burned for about 5 hours last night and maybe only a cm of wax is gone from the top, this will definitely last a long time. Made my home smell wonderful!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Robert
review: Tried to sleep with this in my bed but it burned my hair off.  Now I need a hair transplant.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: nunyo
review: Yankee Candle's Large Red Apple and Wreath candle arrived by international shipping with melted red wax all over the jar lid and on the outside of the jar.  I have it in a medium-sized room and practically no scent noticeable even when I put my face directly over the burning candle.  Many air bubbles appear to permeate the wax in the candle.  On a different note, YC Cherries on Snow candle arrived a few days before by domestic shipping and it is great.  Fills the room with a nice aroma even with a short burn time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: R Dwayne Stevenson
review: Nice size candle, pretty, and smells like Christmas!  No complaints--Recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Michelle
review: I bought this candle since my mother loved apples and we just lost her unexpectedly. I took a picture and sent it to my brothers. I looked at the picture again and noticed a glare made a cross with the cinnamon sticks. It was a nice sign from her. Scent is subtle yet very nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Saw
review: great holiday cent candle came well packed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: .david chad helms
review: Love these candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: L. L.
review: For decades I purchased this candle above all others, then about 7 years ago I discovered the scent had less and less, or very little throw of scent, if any scent at all..I've burned several large candles in a small room at once and hours later, nothing but a smoking candle. (Yes, I cut wicks to size) .I heard the original owner sold the company, so after looking it up...I'll purchase from the owners sons shop of WONDERFUL candles, and not waste money anymore on Yankee candles. I'm very disappointed in what a Corporation buying this once great candle has done.The current owners should TALK to whoever is making your candles now, and tell them to put scent back in them, or they'll keep declining at this rate and so will your business.People do catch on eventually if you cut costs.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Enzo Matric
review: Smell wonderful but came with no wick and bad looking candle, this is ordered in oct not that hot, it should not look like that, just horrible, made yankee candle brand looks bad. No qulaity control at Amazon warehouse? Waste of time. Package looks fine shipped out defective product. Amazon gave me a refund so gave 2 stars

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Spazoo
review: This is my favorite candle/scent, it has been for years.  I usually buy them at BB&B but saw them  on Amazon so restocked my supply here.  These have NO SMELL!!!! I've burned them in big space and in little space, just to check, but they give off a faint scent  and only if you are standing right above them. I'm not sure if Yankee messed up or if these are knockoffs but what a disappointment, especially since I bought 4.  Color me sad. :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: L. L.
review: For decades I purchased this candle above all others, then about 7 years ago I discovered the scent had less and less, or very little throw of scent, if any scent at all..I've burned several large candles in a small room at once and hours later, nothing but a smoking candle. (Yes, I cut wicks to size) .I heard the original owner sold the company, so after looking it up...I'll purchase from the owners sons shop of WONDERFUL candles, and not waste money anymore on Yankee candles.
