product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: L. L.
review: After decades of buying Yankee Candles I have noticed a steady decline in scent. Now I have 4 large jars in one room. They have all been burning for two hours, and when I go into the room, I can't detect ANY SCENT AT ALL! I realized recently a corporation purchased Yankee Candles, from the original owner, and he died. Again, I see the results of what happens when a greedy corporation buys anything good. They ruin it, and perhaps cut back or use a cheaper essential oil. Whatever they're doing, it's a shame. This decline has gone on for years, and I have had it! Why must corporation buy great companies and ruin what was once the best candle on the market?  From now on, I will purchase candles elsewhere, from another company..Perhaps the original sons new Candle company will return to create the original great scented candles. Maybe corporations will learn, they can only short change decades long customers for so long before they ruin their investment and lose more customers for good. Shame on corporate greed ruining a once great candle company. FOUR candles and two hours in one room, and NOTHING??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: John
review: The reviews on this are definitely overstated. The whole ‚Äúthis smells like a man who built a cabin‚Äù are  off.  It smells more like Chris Hemsworth took a dump in the woods after a cheat day and then sprayed it with the essence of Mark Wahlbergs ball-sweat on a crisp Spring morning. But yeah we‚Äôll call it ‚Äúmountain lodge‚Äù

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Niagara,NY
review: I only buy Yankee Candles and usually from their local candle store in our area. However, due to the Covid Pandemic I decided to order on line via Amazon. I enjoy a woodsy candle scent during the winter months and my favorite was Cozy Cabin, that is discontinued. I ordered Velvet Woods for the holidays and it was absolutely satisfying and put me in a relaxing mood. This soy based candle melted evenly and the double wicks didn't fray. I bought Mountain Lodge at the same time, to try it too because it was a reasonable price. Sadly, the scent is hardly noticeable and the wick frays terribly. It may be due the difference in the soy verses just wax. I don't know if I just got a badly mixed candle but I'm very disappointed in this Mountain Lodge scent. Plus, the poor quality wick frays as it burns, shining an unequal glow. I may purchase the Mountain Lodge candle scent from a different seller just to compare the two. If you order this candle, I hope you have better luck.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Shelby
review: My grandma ordered this for me as a gift for my birthday. I was super excited because Mountain Lodge is my absolute favorite scent from Yankee candle. I received the candle today, and immediately smelled it. It smelled lightly like my fond memories of mountain lodge, but I thought ‚Äúoh, it‚Äôll definitely be stronger when I light it‚Äù. That was my first mistake. Everyone knows most Yankee candles punch you in the nose when you smell them for the first time. My candle has been lit for about two hours now, and I smell absolutely nothing. I‚Äôm disappointed, to say the least. I know this isn‚Äôt something you should expect from Yankee candle, because I‚Äôve had this before and it was AMAZING. My house smelled so good! But this one I just ordered? Major let down. That‚Äôll teach me from ordering them off Amazon vs going to the store and getting it directly. I wish I could return it, honestly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Michelle
review: I don‚Äôt really know what went wrong here, but it‚Äôs wrong - very wrong. Surely Amazon wouldn‚Äôt be sending bootlegged products under the guise of the real product, right? I purchased what was supposed to be a Yankee candle as a gift for a dear friend who, for years, has admired the silver birch scent. I knew that he longed for one of his own but wouldn‚Äôt spend the money on himself, so I got him one for his birthday. I‚Äôm not sure what kind of 2020 monstrosity this is, but in order to get a real (fake?) candle sent, the recipient will have to go out of his way to drop off. With COVID -19 hot in our area right now, the recipient said he will be happy to just smell the wax since he can‚Äôt burn the candle. He doesn‚Äôt get many presents and is just grateful for what he does get. (Don‚Äôt worry - I will make sure he gets a functioning candle.) As a side note, the silver birch scent of real Yankee candles is fantastic.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Nikkole.NA.
review: I know this candle has other reviews talking about it arriving melted beyond use to buyers,  but I still bought it thinking and hopeful that it could be a fluke thing. Well....it isn't. The Mountain Lodge candle arrived in the same box as another candle I bought (different brand) and long and behold the Yankee candle (like the reviews said) arrived half melted. I was one of the lucky ones though as I was still able to light the wick, however it isn't burning evenly now.  Very disappointed considering the price I paid for this candle., I've ordered MANY candles online (including Yankee) and have never had candles arrived melted. The candle it self smells absolutely great! A wonderful clean woodsy scent that doesn't have a over powering smell of pine like a lot of "outdoorsy" scented candles tend to have. It makes me reminisce about my stay in the mountains this past summer.  It also has a good throw but isn't super strong. I would definitely buy the candle again, maybe just not from Amazon? I'd give the candle scent and throw 5 stars but unfortunately until Yankee or Amazon fixes the melting issue it has to remain a 2 star product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: reader
review: Also bought Silver Birch, Warm Luxe Cashmere and Balsam Cedar., large 2 wick size.  I buy them for the winter because I like to burn several candles to create a cozy environment. They all arrived safely and were well packaged.. They all burn well. So why the 1 star rating?? All of them except Midsummer's Night have NO THROW. I mean NONE, even with 3 candles burning at the same time. I am sitting about 2 ft away from the 3 burning candles, and there IS NO SMELL. And, no, I do not have Covid. Midsummer's Night was a least faint, but that is it. I spent over $150 and expected SOME scent. Nope, only if You put your nose right over the unlighted candle.  What a disappointment and I will look at other manufactures.  I do not know who makes stronger smelling candles, but it is not this company.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Nat
review: The candle smells a bit more strongly of cologne than I'd expected. That's not necessarily bad, although I haven't lit it yet so I don't know what it smells like when it burns. As you can see from my photos the whole candle melted before it even got to me, so I can't actually find the wick to light the candle anyway. Maybe it's my fault for ordering a candle in the summer time, but I guess the combination of heat from transit and the candle actually being packaged on its side means it's very possible someone else might receive a candle like mine (messy and unusable). I might try to leave it out in my car for a day to see if I can get it melted back into the jar, but there's no telling if I'll be able to find the wick even if that works. If Yankee candle could make sure their candles shipped vertically instead of horizontally, this would likely not happen. Idk how much control they have over that but even a "this side up" message on their box might be helpful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: harleychick
review: And by woodsy, I am referring to that crisp clean smell from nature, what autumn air might smell like among pine trees in the woods.  Its just a nice, clean men's soap-type smell that is very intoxication. When burning, the smell fills the room and the whole house very nicely. Other Yankee Candle scents to compare to: Not direct comparisons, but just the realm of scents is what I'm trying to say- But if you like Mountain Lake, Midsummer Night, or any other cologne-man type smell, you will probably enjoy this.  In fact, I really like that it is a "toned down" version of a man's cologne. Hope this helps!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Freiherr Diefendorf
review: My wife is an old woman at heart. She likes to get cozy, she likes to wear cozy clothes, and she likes cozy scents. Fall and winter are her favorite times of year because she can get cozy drink hot tea and watch Hallmark movies as we decorate the house with the kids. She bought this overpriced candle from Yankee candle and it smells like an old woman's house. It's not very cozy for me or for her and we're both a little disappointed. Some people might find this smell and nostalgic like gain laundry detergent. I don't. it was also disappointing to see the exact same candle for sale at Walmart for 1/3 of the price. I don't often go to Walmart and I didn't even know they carried Yankee candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kindle Customer
review: To say I'm bitterly disappointed is an understatement. I bought this candle after reading the reviews and was convinced I'd finally found what I'd been searching for. I paid a lot for this candle and am now stuck with nothing but a flame. THERE IS NO SCENT AT ALL. NOTHING. NADA.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: TRAILWALKER3000
review: I read a report recently that Yankee Candle company‚Äôs response to the negative Amazon reviews regarding their candles was that people likely had Covid and lost their sense of smell. But I can tell you for certain I do not have Covid my sense of smell and taste or fantastic just like they were before Covid. I bought four Yankee candles this one has no scent. Let me clarify, the scent is incredibly subdued. The Midsummer nights dream has a powerful sent, too much in fact. The balsam and fir has a nice scent but rather low on the volume.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Smart Shopper
review: I ordered the Silver Birch as a stocking stuffer. The smell was amazing! Jar was very pretty. Sometimes when you buy these candles from discount retail stores they don‚Äôt smell as strongly. That wasn‚Äôt the case with this one. Also, the 3 wick candles burn so fast but Yankee Candles last a long time. Would def purchase again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Bona
review: The scent is really nice, especially for this time of year. No problem with scent. The size is good for a candle lover as the large size is lasting a while. The only problem I have with this candle is the wick. I trim the wick before I light it, but I haven't quite reached that happy medium of trimming the wick just right. Too much and it's hard to light candle unless you tilt it, too little and black smoke gets on your ceiling and walls. All in all I like the candle but as much as I like this large size, I would buy two smaller ones the next time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kate
review: As a female, I also tend to like some of the 'masculine' scents (woodsy/earthy) but Silver Birch smells like a male's cologne, not anything reminiscent of the outdoors. If you want your home to smell like a male's cologne counter from a department store, this may be for you. It isn't for me. An otherwise good burning candle though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: EPB
review: I bought a Patchouli Yankee Candle as I love earthly aromas, specially in incense but want to get away from incense due to the smoke. This Yankee Candle brand gave me hopes given its price (hoping, I'd get what I paid for as this is no cheap candle) but it smells like any other yankee candle smells like: That oily aroma used in bathroom pucks, not necessarily a bad aroma but one I'm just not interested, especially as it reminds me of urinals. The aroma is also incredibly weak. I definitely DO NOT recommend it

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: A. J. Morin
review: I‚Äôm a long time Yankee candle junkie and I love this scent I‚Äôve bought it for years!! And this large jar literally smells like absolutely nothing!!! You can stand right on top of it and burn your nose hairs off and you still can‚Äôt smell a thing!! I‚Äôm absolute shocked that Yankee candle sent me such a crap candle. I was trying to make my home smell like Christmas and instead it just smells like the pizza I reheated!üòû and no I don‚Äôt have Covid.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Beadchaser
review: ordered without reading reviews. oops. If you seek a candle with scent similar to patchouli essential oil, this is not that candle. Blessedly, the scent is minimal. Unfortunately there's also an undertone of cinnamon, which sucks if cinnamon scent is one of your allergy triggers.. WTF Yankee Candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: K_Thed4ord
review: I bought this after that one review blew up hoping this would smell like a hot man. I love men‚Äôs cologne and the mountains so I figured this wouldn‚Äôt be disappointing either way. But it straight up doesn‚Äôt have a scent at all. I bought another one from a different seller to make sure this wasn‚Äôt just a dud and neither of them smell like anything at all. Very disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: lizardwitch
review: I feel bad saying that there isn't much smell to a scented candle because you never know if it's just the candle you received is that way or the whole batch.  I've burned this a couple times and same result, hardly any scent.  It sounded like this would be perfect for what I wanted :(  The jarred candle it's self is nice & has lid, heavy glass..would be a great gift if had scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anthony Cucinotta
review: I purchased this candle specifically for the Patchouli scent. The candle had a good patchouli scent when I removed the jar cover. I‚Äôve burned the candle several times now and it has zero Patchouli scent when lit. This candle was top dollar at $25+. Do not waste your money on this product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: K_Thed4ord
review: I am extremely dissapointed in this candle. All the reviews led me to believe this was a man in a bottle but in reality this candle has... no scent at all. It doesn't smell bad or anything it just doesn't really have a scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Lady Reed
review: If you're like me and have been dreaming about the Mountain Lodge Yankee candle ever since you read that positively ethereal description of it on Tumblr by clarabeau from five years ago..... Well. It smells exactly the way you always imagined. It's not too heavy or heady of a scent; just clean, pure mountainy goodness. Go. Live your dream. Buy it. You won't be disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Josh
review: My ex called this the ‚Äúboyfriend candle‚Äù Apparently it smells how every man should smell. It really isn‚Äôt that fantastic‚Äî it smells good yeah but when lit it can barely make a tiny bedroom smell like the candle, it‚Äôs very light of a smell. If she‚Äôs worth it, then pretend it smells amazing and get it for her like I did. I still have the candle. :/

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: barbara
review: This was accurately compared to a man‚Äî-it‚Äôs so subtle it‚Äôs like it‚Äôs hardly there at all.  You know, ur husband is there but he might as well not be cuz it makes no difference either way.  I kept putting my face in the candle to smell it and hardly any scent.  Forget about scenting a room.  I even closed the door to see what happened.  I‚Äôm happy I started with a small jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Michele Kagan
review: There‚Äôs no way this is patchouli. When I first took the lid off and smelled it, it smelled like a cinnamon Christmas scent which I abhor. I‚Äôm sending this back. I burn a candle everyday and I usually can tolerate scent that‚Äôs off putting but this makes my eyes water and smells like Christmas. This is not patchouli.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Britta H
review: Smells amazing! Be ready to roll your eyes into the back of your head from the pure luxuries Yankee Candle smell. Seriously mind blowing! Relax and enjoy. I burn mine during yoga.  Like you have your own burly lumber jack sitting next you. Ummm ummmm good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: TM
review: I absolutely LOVE this scent, and every time I've bought one directly from Yankee Candle, I've had no issues. Thought I'd buy one from Amazon and while the scent is accurate, there is absolutely zero throw... and for what you're paying for... it's massively disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mom of 2
review: I love this scent but the candle tunneled horribly. I tried the foil method and even used a topper. Ended up having to just put it on a candle warmer. Im so disgusted.  Last Yankee candle i bought burned beautifully. This one awful. Waste of money.  2 stars because scent is great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: This has a great smell but the strong is not as strong as some of my other Yankee candles so I am not sure if it is old or what. It makes me think it is older and has been on a shelf for a couple of years. I will order directly from the manufacturer instead of by seller on Amazon unless I want a scent that has been discontinued.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: J. Lopez
review: I bought this candle with very little to no expectations and was very satisfied with my purchase.  I haven't burned the candle yet but the smell of the candle right out the jar is amazing.  I'll update this review once we burn this candle for a few hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: CE
review: The candle itself came in true Yankee style, however it is a bit expensive. I could not find it in stores. The smell is great but once the candle has burned half down the smell goes a way a bit. The top of the candle is great, it is magnetic or at least to stand a VUSE battery on

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Connie L Brown
review: Usually Yankee candle is my Go choice for candles. But this patchouli candle left me underwhelmed. Hardly any smell at all and it burned completely down in 2 days. Usually they last a long time and have a great fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Wright
review: Weird all these reviews say it smells like a man but in reality it smells like medicine. If you like your man smelling like that than ok but nothing special ..just average but won't buy again.  Kinda funny cause I asked someone what they thought it smelt like and they said doo..do.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: J. Larralde
review: I love the scent of patchouli and was so happy when I found out that Yankee Candle had one with this scent that I ordered it immediately. I bought it to light in my bedroom after work. It quickly filled my bedroom with its scent. It smells so good! I will be ordering another two candles of this same scent soon in the near future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kathryn M.
review: Not sure if the makers of this candle actually know what patchouli smells like, because it certainly is NOT in this candle!!  I'm a girl of the 60/70s & believe me I know what patchouli smells like, & this candle is WORTHLESS!!!  I am sorry I paid the whopping $18 for this mini 3.5" candle.  RIP OFF!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Waldo Pepper
review: A candle I previously purchased and enjoyed was currently unavailable, so knowing Yankee candle's reputation thought I'd give this candle a try.  Looks great, packaged well, unlit smell noticeable, after lighting not much going on. Enter the room my old patchouli candle would fil the room with a beautiful scent, this candle doesn't.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Pamela
review: I have never gotten a Yankee Candle I didn't love until now. After reading raving reviews describing this candles wonderful scent, I bought one. Unfortunately, there's no scent at all coming from this candle. Not when I took off the lid for the first time, not when I lit it, not while it burns.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anezthy
review: Most unscented Yankee Candle ever. $28.00 for wax in a jar. I am surprised being it a Yankee Candle product that it would have some fragrance. I don‚Äôt understand it. Whats more it had some good reviews. Buyer Beware!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Sara M.
review: Can't comment on the smell of this candle.  I love Yankee candles but this one just smelled of old wax.  No scent.  Must have been sitting open for a long time somewhere before it was sold.  Awful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: plcooke
review: These are my favorite candles. I have two in the living room, one in our master bedroom, and one in the kitchen. They have an amazing scent and the color matches the color scheme of our home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kimber Turner
review: This product has ZERO SMELL!! I purchased yankee candles in the past and have loved every single one-UNTIL THIS ONE. I‚Äôm not kidding, I have tried using it in smaller rooms to see if maybe the first few rooms were too open or drafty to project the aroma but even my tiny little bathroom after burning the candle for hours had ZERO SMELL!! I‚Äôm very disappointed with this candle. Don‚Äôt buy this fragrance. Keep looking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: KellyKel
review: My sister loves this candle. When I received the box, I was pleasantly surprised by the size and the quality of the candle. I would definitely buy this candle for future gift purchases!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Avid Reader
review: Honestly disappointed. Yankee Candle usually puts out excellently scented products, but this smells like neither mountains or lodges. It lasts a while, but the scent leaves much to be desired.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: KE Wyrick
review: I love this scent.  It lasts so long even after blowing it out.  I am most excited about catching it on a lightning deal here on Amazon.  My favorite scent, delivered to my door, at the best price ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Noelle
review: This candle smells more in the clean side with a hint of men‚Äôs deodorant scent, would buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: M.Christian
review: This is my favorite Yankee candle scent. It usually only comes out for the holidays, I was so happy and excited to find it here. This candle should be a men's cologne it smells amazing!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Julie Ann
review: I‚Äôd avoid this candle if you‚Äôre looking for a candle that has a scent. The only time I can smell it is if I‚Äôm maybe two inches away from it as it‚Äôs burning. I can see why this was cheaper than the rest.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: I purchased this candle for the scent.  It has no scent.  Not even a little bit.  I've never known a Yankee Candle to disappoint in this way.  Yankee Candles are very expensive, and I'm unlikely to purchase one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Rhabyn S. McCowan
review: I thought I already reviewed this candle. Probably years ago. Anyway, I'm starting to favor it slightly more than Midsummer's Night, my typical boyfriend favorite. Mountain Lodge is a little sweeter, softer. Too bad it's not as common.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Meg
review: This fragrance is great!  It's an earthy, almost cologne sort of smell, but, it's not overpowering. It's perfect for women and men.  I ordered a few of these. One arrived broken and within 2 days I had a replacement!  You cannot beat that sort of service. !!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle smell fantastic and burns for a long time.  About 3/4 of the way down the wicks began to burn at different speeds and one got ahead and began to drown the second wick in wax.  I had to keep dumping it out which is annoying and about the time I missed a draining it buried the second wick.  Now the remaining wick has burned to the end and I've given up many hours of candle I paid for.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Miss Sharon
review: I meant to order the VILLAGE CANDLE MOUNTAIN RETREAT...I accidentally ordered the YANKEE CANDLE MOUNTAIN LODGE instead.  As far, as I'm concerned the Village Candles far exceed the Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Me Smith
review: My wife loves the smell of birch trees. Sadly this gift did not smell like birch trees.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: CMJ
review: Nice scent with good throw. Not like the old school YK which was straight up patchouli. This is more like the old YK Halloween candle...patchouli with some spices and cloves thrown in. I  miss the original but this is still a nice warm scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kev Tustin
review: Bought this for my sister and I liked it so much I bought one.  Yankee needs to make more and keep this in stock !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: Received one with bad melting, even on single insulated box and glass broke to pieces in my hand while trying to pick out of box...cannot return due to injuries from broken glass and a other has a big ball of wax and no visible wick, so not going to try to return due to fear of getting cut again if glass breaks. Will use 3 out of 5 but one of the 3 even has melting wax in and around jar lid. Please replace 2 candles, I cannot return the damaged 2, and please insure the inside box is upright and padded and outside box has fragile and top marked up, this side up, only!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Tmart
review: Best candle scent out there. Brings a soothing tingle to my nose everytime I light it up. I am in my room...or a mountain lodge?! I have no idea. Also can be used to set the mood for funky time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Stephanie Vandervoort
review: This is by far my FAVORITE CANDLE EVER!!! For the cost, the scent, and the candle over all!!!! This is no# 1!!!!  I have tried bath and body candles, Yankee, and wood wick. To name a few.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mary L. Brown
review: The candle was somewhat disappointing for a Yankee Candle. I expected a much more intense Patchouli fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: MrMojoRisin2438
review: Nearly odorless. The faintest scent of men's aftershave. Ugly doo doo brown color. Big disappointment. Bravo to commissioned reviews that sold it as the smell of a hot guy in a candle. Convinced me into being ripped off.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: A strong, slightly sweet scent, dark, musky-earthy aroma profile.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Love Gadgets
review: I had a Patchouli from the Yankee Candle store with a a diffent label.  That one had a GREAT throw of the smell.  Cannot smell anyting from this one.  I should have read the reviews better.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: valerie
review: How utterly disappointing. I have original patchouli votives from a decade ago that are more fragrant than these jars. After burning for an hour there was zero scent in the air. Wish I would‚Äôve taken the previous reviews more seriously.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Laverne R. Swanson
review: As always, Yankee Candle is a pleasure, a fragrant offering, so to speak!  Pricey but always worth the cost! Quality!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: michelle t.
review: Smells SUPER good in the jar, but the scent doesn't carry while burning. I'm often overwhelmed by scent while burning candles, but I forgot I even had this one burning-because I couldn't smell it at all!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Konen
review: Liked this scent a lot, not too overpowering but enough to where you can enjoy it

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Eric Otfinoski
review: I love Yankee Candles and usually their products are great, but this one has almost no scent. What is the point of spending $20 on an expensive candle when you can't even smell the scent if you put your face close to the flame when it's lit???

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: me
review: I've bought this candle before and this was a re-purchase because of how much I love the product. Only downside is that a certain point the wick will completely burn out and you will end up with like a cm of unmelted wax. Great scent though! Packaging for arrival was also really well taken care of.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anne
review: I love Yankee Candle.. I ordered 2 silver birch candles and got 2 cinnamon candles.. which is ok because I like cinnamon, but it wasn‚Äôt what I ordered. The boxes were labeled silver birch.. oh well Christmas is right around the corner.. not going to return..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: G. Brunelli
review: We also buy white birch firewood , I guess we just love the smell ?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Clc1298
review: Just as expected! Exactly as it is supposed to be and in perfect condition! I love this candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mary Hall
review: Do not order candles from Amazon. I did have concerns this would come melted. And I was right. Obviously no air in transport just a humid ride. I would only order in the winter. And this is highly scented like cologne.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Timothy Condon
review: I don‚Äôt know if I got a dud, but this candle did not produce a significant aroma unless your nose was was inches away from the flame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Greg Herrmann
review: I kind of went out on a whim purchasing the Silver Birch scent, but I ended up loving it a lot! It has scents of the balsam fir smell, but with a muskier cologne smell on top of it. I really enjoy it and the candle came perfectly packaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Frugel Shopper
review: Love the smell.  Definitely more of a Cigar/S[ports room type of smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jennifer C
review: Doesn't seem like a real Gold Canyon candle because of all the bubbles in the bottom, the thickness of the wick that knots up and smokes, the lack of strong scent in the air and how fast it burns. Not that impressed for the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Hanasaki F W
review: It smells good but I was expecting a stronger scent. Plus, I let it go for three hours the first time, but the pool was still too small. The tunnel just got deeper each time it burnt.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Daniel A K
review: I don't often review my purchases ....In general I really like Yankee candles...And I like the smell of patchouli...I let the candle burn for a couple of hours and could  not smell it....I ask my dinner guest if she could smell it...Same thing...No smell...This patchouli candle has no scent...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Gale C Adams
review: I've always loved the pleasant clean scent of Patchouli. Not over powering and is a great scent all year round.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Roberta
review: I love patchouli and was excited to find this as a Yankee Candle. I have other Yankees that I‚Äôve had for years and still smell good. What a disappointment!!!  It just smells like wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Ros
review: I've bought this candle 4 or 5 times been great. This candle has 0 scent. Nothing... no I don't have rona either. Disappointing!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jodi Gibson
review: If you like the smell of Patchouli, you will love the scent of this Yankee candle.  You must like the scent though, it's potent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kendall
review: Arrived just as described and cheaper than retail

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: Most of their candles have a strong fragrance... i smell nothing with this one I actually don't know if I will keep.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: ECB
review: The candle was smashed when I arrived........a second was smashed when it arrived too........so I will be getting a refund.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: DJ
review: Purchased as a gift.  She dug it the most. Get your stink on....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Chris del Valle
review: Boom. This is the perfect fall to winter transition candle. It smells nice, not too strong.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Virginia Beach Shopper
review: Yankee is normally so fragrant it fills the entire room and I was so looking forward to the Patchouli scent. Unfortunately, this was a big disappointment.  It isn‚Äôt fragrant at all. Even when you get very close you can only barely detect a scent. My family agrees/flop

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Paul Rose
review: Overall a nice candle, I like Yankee candles.  the low rating is only and specifically for the scent, which was ok, but certainly not patchouli.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Melissa Cunningham
review: Big disappointment. No smell at all. Waste of money. Don't buy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: tamaraa147
review: Love this scent and how long the candle burns for

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Steven Day
review: First one came broken. Was replaced immediately. Does not smell anything like Patchouli. Not a bad scent but not what it should smell like.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: koln47
review: Great scent but over priced

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Judy K.
review: I have had Mountain Lodge yankee candles before but this one had no scent. Perhaps old stock?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Barbara W.
review: I'm not sure if it's the fulfillment center this particular fragrance is shipped from, but the initial and replacement orders were both received melted.  But the other candles in the same order were fine.  Not sure what the issue is.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch

author: Amanda Dempsey
review: I have purchased multiple of the cables. They remind me of of mother who past away. This was the magnolia was her favorite flower they always remindeds me of her and is VERY sentimentality to me. The last candle few cables had major problems with it's appearance, and this was the 3rd one it has happened to. I tried to be calm and figured it was a mistake but after this 3rd one I am very disappointed. I don't know what happen but it became discolored and weird looking then lost its set its fragrance. I would like a replacement for the 3 candles for the inconvenience. I spent almost $80 and very upset that I was unable to smell and reminisce thinking of my mama that has past away from breast cancer. It's all I have let of her with these candles and the smell that brings be back to her memory. I hope this can be resolved. Thank you, Amanda Dempsey

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Lori Waran
review: Not strong scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: nancy nicoletti
review: Great scent, great price looks great

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Bridget Anne

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Amazon Customer
review: Did not have a fragrance like I wanted. Very faint smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Jordan
review: The scent is very strong. It helps me relax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Ana RamosGonzalez
review: It's exactly as pictured and came very well packaged. Love it, will purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: isaidso
review: OH. MY. GOD!!!!! I highly recommend that you DO NOT BUY this candle! It is NOT the best damn candle scent you will ever smell in your life! It will NOT bowl you over with its room-filling, DELECTABLE fragrance! You will NOT find yourself inhaling deeply just to breathe more of its scrumptious, juicy, perfectly feminine, fruity-floral deliciousness!!! You won't be wishing that you had this fragrance in a perfume! You won't find yourself FLOATING around your home with your nose in the air, like a cartoon character hypnotically entranced by the wafting scent of sweet, tropical fruits resting on a bed of fresh flowers. And you CERTAINLY won't be RUNNING back here to order another one (or five) of these totally UNamazing candles because you WON'T want one in every room! I hope I've been totally clear. Because I absolutely DON'T have an agenda here, to ensure that there'll be more of these candles available for ME!!! :-D

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses

review: OH. MY. GOD!!!!! I highly recommend that you DO NOT BUY this candle! It is NOT the best damn candle scent you will ever smell in your life! It will NOT bowl you over with its room-filling, DELECTABLE fragrance! You will NOT find yourself inhaling deeply just to breathe more of its scrumptious, juicy, perfectly feminine, fruity-floral deliciousness!!! You won't be wishing that you had this fragrance in a perfume! You won't find yourself FLOATING around your home with your nose in the air, like a cartoon character hypnotically entranced by the wafting scent of sweet, tropical fruits resting on a bed of fresh flowers. And you CERTAINLY won't be RUNNING back here to order another one (or five) of these totally UNamazing candles because you WON'T want one in every room! I hope I've been totally clear. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Rebo Quintana
review: I have bought and used several of these candles in different fragrances, including: Lilac blossoms, Midnight Jasmine, Midsummer‚Äôs Night, Pink Sands, and Silver Birch. I have four dogs and one enormous great room, which includes the kitchen, dining area, entry way, living area, and the dogs‚Äô niche where their beds are. So I am always battling the smell to keep the house smelling nice. Overall, I would give this brand of candles 5 stars. Four out of the five fragrances I‚Äôve tried were pleasant smelling, had a strong odor that would fill the large room, and a long life. They were packaged very well (inside their own box) and burn evenly. Here are my ratings for the scents: Lilac: Five stars. Very strong smell. Sweet and flowery. I love lilac but it was a bit much for my taste for the main part of the house. Jasmine: Five Stars (more if I could!). Wonderful scent. Flowery but not over powering. Mellow. Lots of compliments on this one and asking where I got it, etc. Can be hard to find, too. Recommended. Midsummer‚Äôs Night. Five Stars. Pleasant, ‚Äúsoapy‚Äù smell. Reminds me of what the bathroom smells like after a shower. I loved this scent, but it is nicer for a bathroom than a main room IMO. Recommended. Pink Sands. Two Stars. Very ‚Äúpink‚Äù smelling. Reminded me of bubblegum. Scent was very weak. Could barely smell it at all. Wish I had returned it. Not recommended. Silver Birch. Five Stars. Very ‚Äúwoodsy.‚Äù Makes me think of fall/winter. Very pleasant smell for a main room. Recommended. I definitely recommend these candles overall, especially the four scenes above. The Pink Sands candle was such a dud I had to take off a star, but really these are good candles and worth the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ladyhawk14
review: All yankee candles have lost what made them number one decades ago... their scent. I can burn them in a small room and barely smell what ever scent their supposed to be. Finally got a wif of this one bending down to blow it out. Its such a shame how consumers are duped and used by companies who get famous then reduce their product quality. You can see how much less the scent oils are used in these candles through the glass. Don‚Äôt know why I spend money on Yankee candles anymore?!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: C. Marie-Peterson
review: I swear, I am never paying more than $5 for a jar candle again. A $1.49 unscented Virgin of Guadalupe candle from the supermarket will work just as well as this *thirty-dollar* candle in the bathroom. And it will smell just as much like roses! Well, okay, once I caught a slight whiff of roses when the Yankee Candle was lit today, but the price per whiff is outrageous. I can soak off the labels of candles from the supermarket and save a bundle.  (Shorties votives actually *do* smell like roses, but I'm having a hard time justifying the expense of their jar candles.)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Eureka
review: Yankee Candle has always been my favorite company. For obvious reasons. Lol. My two all time favorite scents are Blooming Jasmine and this Lily one. Not only did they smell amazing, they were the two strongest scents in my opinion. Over the past 3-4 years the scents have diminished. I had this candle burning a couple hours. There was a very faint smell and the wick kept blowing off black smoke. It was horrible. A shame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jacqueline
review: Love the scent. But unable to use as you can see in pictures. This is my second order and they arrived worse than the first time. It melted all the way to the top and must‚Äôve dried. There‚Äôs no wick to light candle. And not to mention that when I open the box the liquid from candle got all over my hands and even stained my carpet. And I was carefully since the box itself had stains and was leaking. Horrible packaging.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: aspring
review: I bought the pink sands scent - it literally smells like starburst candy, kindof like the strawberry and watermelon flavors mixed together - definitely a very unique and pleasant scent. The smell is not terribly strong but also not necessarily weak, I imagine this would be a good choice for someone who likes fruity smells that aren't too overpowering. I gave this candle four stars instead of five because I was expecting a different (and admittedly stronger) smell but otherwise It is really a great candle. Just remember to always trim the wick before using it again because the wick starts to form black bulbs that fall off if you have the candle on after a while and you don't want these falling into the wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Carrie Lenander
review: When we lost my mom her personal touch was lost, My dad asked me if I knew what candles mom liked. Yankee was always a fave. I sent two of the lilac candles to Dad. He said the house was feeling right again. Thank you for helping my family heal and remember at the same time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Nekomancer
review: I have been using candles for years. This is the only one that ever made me feel ill if I left it on for more than hour in a room that is about 11 by 12 feet. I am willing to admit its possible I could have some allergy I never knew about from something they used in the candle making process. However. My very expensive coway air purifier that detects noxious smells and turns up accordingly has never been affected by any candles, even when i tried putting them literally a foot away it only turns up when I light or put them out. But this candle made it go off every time. Even then I wouldnt give them such a low star rating. Just thought it worth mentioning because people might not realize the candle is making them feel nauseous if that is the case. The reason I am writint this is because the candle was listed at beinf 35+ hours. And while I dont time it. I did not that my 10 hour candle lasted a lot longer than this thing did. Keep in mind these are mostly oppinions. Not actual facts if you want to be technical. The candle itself smelled very nice I thought. But for the price they charge, and given my experience? I can say I personally will never even bother buying such an overhyped object that basically amounts to a some wax, an essential oil and a wick. As well as whatever dyes or chemicals they used to make it so delightfully colorfull.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: mimipkb
review: Not only do they not  hand it to me, they don't even ring the door bell so I know to  look for it.  They put it on the ground which makes it hard for me to pick up.  Then they lie on the  report and say they handed to me.  I don't like that.  This time, they put it in a wagon that I can't even see from my front door without going outside.  That is a far cry from  "handed to the customer!"  I am handicapped and  just going out the front  door is difficult.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: AmazonAddict
review: This is an honest non paid for non free item given review. Fresh Cut Roses is hands down my most favourite yankee candle scent ever! I normally buy the large jars but since the COVID stuff is going on, I couldn't afford the large jar. Next time, I will wait and spring for the large jar because this small tumbler does not do the scent justice. Even though we only place it in an average sized bathroom. The large jar that is placed in my bathroom will throw the scent in the bathroom and spew out into our entire master bedroom sized room very well and very strong! But this small tumbler barely fills just our bathroom. I assumed it would still saturate the bathroom but it did not. It was very weak. Maybe this yankee candle scent only works well in a larger jar than smaller jar. It did arrive with the wick not centered. It was a pain in the ass. We had to push the un-melted wax side down after each burn to even it out. But it still burned uneven and made more of a mess than tranquility. We contacted yankee candle directly and they did respond fast and did reimburse us, which was nice and surprising since some companies just say oh well too bad. That was the best part of this small tumbler experience. If you like yankee candle or have a favourite yankee candle scent. Get the largest jar for the best scent throw. This small tumbler just doesn't measure up to the large jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Christian
review: This brand has been around for so long. I remember it being THE candle to get years ago at the peak of its popularity, and honestly many products have come and gone and this one is holding up to its high reputation. It continues to be timeless.  The scent of Midnight Jasmine is perfect for those who just enjoy a light scent without being overwhelmed by strong smell. The candle itself lasts longer than any fancy candle I've ever bought. I love that you can remove the label so easily, since I normally like candles to just look simple/clean for decor reasons. Definitely worth it. If this review helped you in any way please make sure to click on helpful so I know. Feel free to ask any questions!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: XOAngel
review: Actually SUPER disappointed with these candles. Yankee candles have always been my favorite. I‚Äôve always been able to count on them to keep my home smelling fresh and clean. The lavender vanilla is one of my favorite scents because it‚Äôs such a relaxing scent. I bought two because I burn through them so quickly and I NEITHER of these candles give off a scent at all... $40 wasted. : ( Not sure I‚Äôll ever buy a yankee candle from here again. At least I know I what I can expect from the store or website itself.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Cher
review: This is my first time ordering a Yankee Candle. Read all the hype on this brand. Watched a couple of YouTubes; was impressed. I was juusst about to buy another brand which was going to cost me $15 for only 6 ounces (should have stuck with that choice). However, I found some Yankee Candles at a good price. Received my "Pink Sands" candle fast! (happy/excited) But what a BIG disappointment! Absolutely "No scent" from my candle? And No, I don't have Covid (lol) Usually you can smell at least a slight scent during the unboxing stage. Even when removing the lid, still no scent? That should have been a hint. However, I thought "maybe" I needed to burn it to smell it. Still nothing? Placed it in a small bathroom with the door closed for about 15 min, still no scent? Tested on two other people ~ same result. Is it possible I got a "DUD"? Maybe it is old?  I don't need an expensive emergency "power outage" candle. What a waste of money! Unsatisfied Customer here for sure! Even though it said it was new on the listing, It "seems" like it was maybe a return? And I'm sure if it was, it was due to the same problem. Unfortunately, you can only return the candle in new or unused condition. All the favorite Yankee Candle scents that YouTubers put in their top/favorite lists like, "Pomegranate Cider" or "Pumpkin Wreath" are recently listed for double compared to what I paid. My candle "Pink Sands" was one of the lowest priced Yankee Candles I came across. Now I know why....I gave a rating of at least two stars. 1 for fast shipping and 1 for no broken glass.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: AngelinaMaria
review: I can‚Äôt take a photo because it didn‚Äôt last long enough. Kind of disappointed with Yankee. This used to be my favorite, but the quality & longevity isn‚Äôt worth the price anymore. The scent is great- if you have your nose glued to the jar. Otherwise, I didn‚Äôt find it emitted much of anything (even in a tiny, studio apartment). I only had it burning for 2-3 hours on occasion, but it didn‚Äôt last more than a month. And, the wick wasn‚Äôt strong enough to keep a decent flame... started to stifle with pooling wax that also dissipated so quickly the entire thing didn‚Äôt last. I would feel bad giving this as a gift. As nice as it seems- it isn‚Äôt worth it and kind of a waste of money. Their candles used to be WAY better in scent & longevity. That isn‚Äôt the case anymore, and I can‚Äôt justify buying another after this one didn‚Äôt last more than 30 days leaving little scent to enjoy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Tashah B.
review: My candle was ordered via overnight shipping (hey, I couldn‚Äôt sleep and decided that I really needed it.) I chose Lilac instead of my usual lavender scented anything. The package was two days late (Amazon‚Äôs fault) and I was disgruntled when it finally arrived. But let me tell you‚Ä¶this candle smells SO GOOD. Other reviews have said that the brand has gone down in quality of scent but I can‚Äôt imagine this candle smelling any better. Fills the room, strong but not overpowering, I feel like I‚Äôm frolicking through a field of flowers. Definitely worth the hassle it took to get it. I‚Äôm looking forward to trying lavender sometime soon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Cheryl
review: The Beach Walk Yankee candle has a heavenly , cool, clean scent of a summer at the lake.  I live one street behind Lake Michigan, and whenever I am outside on a breezy day , and can smell the beach.  It  is a relaxing and comfortable feeling.  That's how I would describe the interior of my home when the I go out, come  in , and inhale the scent of this candle.  I would rate it a solid five stars, except that my particular candle has a split wick, and every time I light it, it flickers and smokes continuously.  No matter how many times I cut the wick back, it  ultimately splits again and again, and smokes again and again.  I cannot  enjoy it for more than 10 minutes or so, before I have to snuff it out.  Mine was a glitch.  I will buy it again all summer long because this was a one time defect, and it wonderful.  Cheryl

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Marcus
review: Apparently my candle didn't get the memo.  The item's description of "Refreshing salt water and sea musk warmed with sunny notes of tangerine and orange blossom capture sunset strolls at the beach" is *farrrrr* from what I experienced.  I don't pick up any of those scents, in fact, it smells very flowery/perfumy.  Rather than "taking a stroll on the beach", I feel like I'm taking a stroll through my grandma's house.  What a huge letdown, never again will I buy this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: SavvyBuyer
review: I'm very confused, I normally buy Yankee Candles at TJ Maxx or HomeGoods and they have a much stronger scent! In fact I have this exact candle in a larger size that smells way better! It's like this candle wax is old and it gives off absolutely no scent whatsoever! I should have known better and saved my money. First time I ever ordered a candle like this online that I have bought in a store, I will never do it again. You think it has a great smell until you burn it and you realize it doesn't have a smell hardly at all! Like it's old or something. Unfortunately, you can't return it once you've lit the thing so I guess I won't be buying Yankee Candles online again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Hannah Thomason
review: AMAZING! I got this for my mom as a mothers day gift. She went on to tell me that when she went to the yankee candle factory last year in MA (we live in PA, yes candles are that big of a deal lol) where she dropped 500$. She told me about all the different candles she got, many which I am familiar with. I've smelled alot of nice candles in my life, but this candle is so nice. The scent is light but not in a way that you can't smell it. Light as in not in your face or very strong smelling. It really does smell like fresh cut roses. I told her this candle would last way longer than real roses and she loved it. I like it so much im ordering one for myself.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: M. Sturgis
review: This candle can‚Äôt possibly be a Yankee candle as I have been purchasing them for over 20 years and all scents were wonderful, you could smell them. This particular Yankee candle ‚ÄúLilac Blossom,‚Äù has little to no scent. The wax is not creamy and after the candle has cooled and solidifies after burning, the top of the candle have has bumps and or bubbles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Winnie
review: I've been buying this candle on and off since 2019, but my last two purchases of this candle, the scent is barely there and underwhelming. Idk what's going on, but I haven't had an adequately perfumed candle in a while. But when you get a non-dud, the smell is so calming and it lasts for a very long time. Good luck

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Deborah
review: I love my yankee candle. I have sinus problems so finding a candle I can smell is difficult. I lift the lids in the stores & if I can‚Äôt smell it I won‚Äôt buy it. Yankee candles have always had a great scent. I had a woman come over once when I had the lid off the jar as she came up my stairs she said ‚ÄúThank Heaven , Scented candles‚Äù The previous place she went smelled like cats and dogs. I knew that person and she always has a very clean house. I had a cat myself but she couldn‚Äôt smell any cat smells. I keep a clean litter box because I cannot live with the smell. It gets cleaned after every use and taken outside to the trash . The other lady taught me that so I know her litter was clean. The candles make a huge difference.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: xDebx
review: What a disappointment. Pink Sands sounds exactly like a fragrance I would like.  I eagerly pulled off the lid to take a whiff and "nothing".  Perhaps I just can't smell it, so I tried again....."nothing".  OK, so maybe I have to burn it for awhile to really smell it, again......"nothing".  Have never had this happen before.  I buy a lot of candles, usually, in a store where I can smell them in advance.  But, during covid, thought I would buy some online and the price of pink sands on amazon was a good deal.  Perhaps this candle is so old that it just doesn't smell any more or perhaps it never did have much of a scent when it had one.  But, for certain, there is no fragrance now.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Mona Davidson
review: I absolutely LOVE the scent from this candle. We have so enjoyed all of the Yankee Candles we've purchased, but this scent truly reminds you of walking along a beach...and when you're in the desert of Coachella Valley, a walk on the beach in 120 degree heat is a very nice thought. This is the second one we've purchased, and love it soooooo much.  Perfect for summer when you're longing to get to the beach.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Chris B
review: This scent is one I had never tried before.  Both candles gave me problems from the moment I lit them.  All wicks are trimmed daily but this morning, with about 2-3" of wax left, they set off both my smoke alarms and I had just lit them!  I use Yankee Candle exclusively but these are going in the trash.  I will rethink further purchases and certainly never again will I purchase this particular scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: molly astin
review: I use to buy Yankee candles 40 years ago, and I remember lighting one candle in a room, and the smell would fill up the whole house. Guests always noticed, and my favorite was Midsummer's night. As the years went by, I noticed a marked decrease in the quality of the candles, although I would still buy them, hoping it was just my perception. This candle has a zillion positive reviews and I don't know why. It doesn't have any throw, it sells cheap, and there's nothing remarkable about it at all. Ounce per ounce, you should invest in Nest brand candles;  they are luxury candles, but nothing compares unless you want to pay several hundred dollars. The smells are complex yet pleasing, and there's something for everyone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ginger
review: This has the reminiscent smell of previously bought Yankee candles. It filled the entire first floor of my home, 1200 ft.¬≤ with scent. And it smells heavenly. No skimp this time on Scent. It took 20 hours to burn half of it. So, it has lost some on longevity. Let's See how Long it takes to finish them up! Will return! They smelled great, but unfortunately some of the candles that I ordered had short wicks. Not even halfway through the candle the wick just disappeared. It happened in about 50% of the purchases. I believe I bought nine candles. Don't hold me to that but somewhere around that figure. But it was definitely at least half of the purchases were defective. The lilac smelled great, but some of the other sents that I bought were barely odoriferous! (Could barely smell them)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Bargnhtress
review: Horrible!!!  I have been buying a lot of Yankee Candles from Amazon lately because of the deals they have been having.  I bought over a dozen in the last month here but have been buying them for over 30 years.  This one just about made me gag!  It smells like rotten burnt coconut shells!  Gross!!!  I gave it a good try but will be returning it.  I love most of the others but this one is like burning rotten garbage in the back of a smoothie shop!  It smells like they let tropical fruit rot and then juiced them and added it to the wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Tino
review: Honestly I‚Äôm not sure how this candle has the ratings it does. This thing smells so weak that I thought I may have lost my scent to covid. My apartment is a revolving door, and everyone said the same thing: ‚Äúit doesn‚Äôt smell like anything.‚Äù Believe me, I asked! I cannot believe a near $20 candle can be this pathetic! Yankee candle? WTF! DO NOT BUY THIS CANDLE! The scent in itself somewhat smells nice like if you were to chop up the wax and snort it, because that‚Äôs the only way you‚Äôll ever get a whiff of this PATHETIC candle! Seriously don‚Äôt be mislead! Look elsewhere.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Legs820
review: I am a candle and/or wax melt freak and needed something new and 'Spring-ish."  I like the scent but I am not WOWED like some of the other; but that is me and not the candle.  What I really like about it is I don't have to burn it for very long- (let's say an hour) and the scent stays for a day or longer which is rare.  It is a little strong actually; so I usually have it in a different room to her than the one I am in at the time.  Overall; I like it. WIll I buy this scent again?  Maybe but as I said that's me and not the candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Marina
review: I was skeptical after reading some of the reviews about the Yankee Candles not being authentic on Amazon, but figured I would try it since it was on sale. I liked this particular scent (Pink Sands). It did take a long time to burn, which is something I appreciate since candles are so expensive. If you like the scent and prefer something more mild in terms of potency, I would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: JPB
review: I have this candle on scheduled regular delivery.  The last batch had very minimal fragrance.  No, it has nothing to do with sense of smell being affected by covid.  I bought a different brand scented candle from the store in place of this purchase. It's scented and the aroma was just perfect.  I can smell it and it emitted a wonderful scent. I had several people try smelling the Yankee candle.  Each and everyone said there was hardly any aroma.  Please stop making excuses.  Someone.dropped the ball and covid was just an easy excuse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Serpico16
review: As stated, the wife got me hooked on fragrant candles.  Lived half of my life without an opinion either way, don't know how I ever managed. Must admit, this Lilac Blossom scent is simply excellent.  A definite favorite of ours. Yankee Candle (JAR TYPE) are a favorite of ours.  Price is right too. We like aromatic candles that last.  Some are very expensive and yet, I have to put my beak practically into the flame in order to recognize a hint of an aroma.  Big League Taboo for this 52 yr old kids beak, as I blister easily not to mention the discolored tip which is generally black or in a shade thereof. Not to mention it simply does nothing for my looks. But not with these Large Jar Yankee Candles with so much aroma. My beak is safe at last. Thank you Yankee Candle.  My beak thanks you too.  ;)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Webster
review: I bought several candles and made the mistake of buying some with just a "lid " as opposed to this kind, which is a secure "tumbler style" lid, that seals in the scent both before and after you burn the candle. The ones with the "lid" that just "sit on top " of the candle "  caused the candles to arrive with absolutely NO SCENT AT ALL.  So please be careful, and order this style .  I wasted a lot of $ on my Yankee Candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amazon Reviewer
review: From the description, I thought pink sands would be very sea breeze and beachy, but my first thought when smelling it was cotton candy perfume. My boyfriend says it smells like sweet bubblegum. BUT, please don't take that the wrong way because both of us think it smells delicious. I don't love overly sweet scents and this doesn't smell like straight up candy, rather a balanced fragrance of nostalgia, clean air, and--well--candy. I will buy again, but this candle will last a long time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: CeeCee
review: This vwill FOREVER be my favorite YANKEE candle scent. It smells as if u are in your favorite place, even if you can't actually get there. I don't understand how people say it has no scent...or it has too much scent...or it smells too much like flowers.and my personal favorite so far.,"IT SMELLS LIKE SAND"....WTH REALLY?¬ø?¬ø? ANYWAY..... I will always be purchasing more than one at a time.  I do wish I could find the COTTON CANDY SCENT. I was only lucky enough to find ONE COTTON CANDY CANDLE..ONE TIME.  You should definitely try PINK SANDS!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: M
review: I purchased this candle days ago and it has no scent at all!!! I just contacted customer service to get a refund and return the item but the associates didn't help. They will "contact" me in 24hrs by email regarding this issue. No questions about the item and truly no assistance at all. Yankee candles have a strong scent and this thing has none. Only the bottle with the name stating is a real Yankee candle which is definitely not!!!!! Scammer whoever sells this crap!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kimberly S.
review: I love Yankee candle‚Äôs. This one has a very nice lite sent. It will not overwhelm you or overtake your home. I really like having this one in the bathroom when I take my bubble baths. Such a relaxing addition. The first candle I purchased the glass was cracked. I informed customer service and a second candle was at my back door the next day. You really can‚Äôt go wrong with Yankee candle‚Äôs. Such good quality and such amazing customer service. I highly recommend them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Mr. Hand
review: There is no way these are real Yankee candles. I got a Pink Sands Yankee candle for Christmas, and I loved it so much that I ordered 3 more on Amazon. The real one would literally permeate my entire home with the scent of a jolly rancher, and these have zero smell and burn down much too quickly. I thought I would save some money by purchasing on Amazon, but the joke was on me because I realized if you buy 3 large jars on the Yankee candle site, you get them for $18 each, which is pretty much what I paid for the 3 useless candles on Amazon. So disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: JnyKnyKly
review: Had high hopes for Meadow Showers, I thought it would be cute to burn for St. Patty's day. But I kept asking my husband what smelled like cigarette smoke or wet cardboard boxes?! We finally realized it was the candle! It made our entire 1st floor STINK! Always risky buying a candle online but avoid this one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: christinajr
review: i generally buy white barn three wick candles but i saw this was on sale and decides to try pink sands bc i was curious. this candle was cheap bc the smell is so faint that unless you‚Äôre literally standing over it you smell nothing. it also burns very quickly. Save your money and buy the higher quality white barn candles. These was a complete waste of money and time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: GreenGal
review: It lights easily and stays lit, which some candles weirdly enough don't do. The scent is exactly like a freshly cut rose. There are understated green notes exactly like the smell of rose stems to the scent along with the rose petal scent. My father is very particular to any scents which seem "artificial". He liked this. The scent quickly permeated the room. It burns slowly but effectively. These candles will burn for a very long time. Recommended, 100%

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ginny L.
review: Perhaps the candle I got was an anomaly but the scent, thought true to lilac, is so strong that I can only have it lit for about 30 minutes before it has blanketed the house with an overwhelming scent. I guess it will last longer this way but it is inconvenient and unexpected.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Hayley
review: I love candles, especially jasmine scented ones, so I was really excited to receive this one and I had heard good things about Yankee Candles. However, I'm not sure what happened as it arrived looking like this. My best guess is it melted in transit and hardened all messed up. I'm currently melting it down on the stove in hopes of fixing it. I had also bought a different candle from Chesapeake Bay Candles that arrived perfectly fine. I will have to try out Chesapeake's jasmine candles in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: L. Rush
review: I ordered three of these because of the amazing price. I LOVE yankee pink sands. However, if this is a real Yankee candle, it has to be very old. It hardly has a scent at all. I‚Äôm sending two of them back and maybe the one I burned if they‚Äôll take it. So disappointed. I guess you get what you pay for. Giving an extra star for the fast shipping

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jennifer B
review: I usually love Yankee Candle but this one almost $30 it smells like nothing which is very unusual because they're known for a very nice smelling candle but I had already lit it and let it burn so couldn't return highly dissatisfied more sad than anyting cuz I love this scent not this particular Jar..but had been a Fan for years..that's what I get 4 not smelling it 1st. Like I usually do at Y.C. store in my Mall ):

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Starr
review: This is my favorite candle scent from Yankee and I was excited to find it on here since all of Yankees‚Äô locations are closed now. I was taken aback by the price, since $30 is a lot for a candle, but I bought them anyway because I know I‚Äôd never be able to find them elsewhere. I come back to Amazon a week later only to see the price has dropped by $11 back down to the reasonable store price. I will be returning the ones I bought and will no longer purchase from this seller. I don‚Äôt like feeling I‚Äôve been taken advantage of.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Reading When You Are
review: Strong scents give me migraines so I usually don‚Äôt burn candles or use essential oils in my home. I bought small jars of these rose scented candles for my son‚Äôs preschool teachers for Valentine‚Äôs Day last year and thought they smelled really nice. So I got this one for myself to try. It smells amazing and isn‚Äôt too strong and over powering (no headaches at all) but you can still smell it too. I had it burning during a family birthday party recently and several people asked what it was cause they really liked it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jessica Kepley
review: I am so glad I found the candles on here this is one of my favorite scents from Yankee candle.  I ended up ordering 2 just because they were prices so well and they smell so good in my house.  So far after using them a couple of times they look as though they have never been used.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: JS
review: I bought the Gardenia scent  - both the newer and older versions of these candles: the older version I bought on Ebay.  This newer candle has a slightly stronger scent than the older candle I also bought.  It's a lovely, creamy light scent.  It might smell stronger if the candle were in a closed, airless room but the room I keep it in has an open window so the scent is not that strong which is a shame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Michele F
review: I grew up with fresh lilac bushes and have always enjoyed Yankee Candles (my favorites are Macintosh apple and Vanilla cupcake). I bought this expecting the same level of fragrance. While it does have a strong scent (which is why I buy the two wick candles), it doesn't smell anything like fresh lilac, rather it smells like an old lady's bathroom soap. Won't be purchasing this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Linda Lee Fisher
review: I received the two candles yesterday.  The Village Candle was perfect, packaged well in a larger box with plastic bubbles.  The Yankee Candle was sent in a small box just large enough to hold it tightly,  The candle was melted, and had poured into the cap, leaked out into the box.....what a mess, and a waste of $25.  I will try to melt it and retrieve the wick, because I don't have a printer for the postage return, and I'm not going out to mail it during this COVID thing.  Very unhappy with this product/purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: MDN
review: The wicked burns kind of big, the aroma is pretty strong for a small area of about 200 square feet.  Really strong for a bathroom.  It does not help neutralize strong odors, it overpowers them for a while, but it dissipates relatively fast.  It lasts about 1 hour.  I don't particularly like the scent, it smells like a department store, but it works fine.  I would buy again if liked the scent better.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: PepPep2
review: I'm relatively picky about rose-scented goods and usually want something that is as "natural-scented" as possible. This candle exceeds my expectation and really does smell like fresh cut roses. It's not overpowering and smells clean and easy. The size is also pretty big so this candle should last a very long time as well. The seller also delivered the item with a lot of care and arrived the next day after ordering via Prime. Awesome!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Tamara Galindo
review: If you look back I ordered several candles and all came in perfect condition. however this one was broken and can hear the glass in the box.  It was packaged good, no dents on the box so I can only thing that it was dropped by someone prior to me receiving.  I kept this candle since the glass that was broken was at the top and candle could still be used. On a positive note...the candle smell wonderful and scent does carry a long way. Thank you, Tamara Galindo

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: T B
review: I was disappointed with this candle. I went to Yankee Candle because they have a great fragrance. This isn‚Äôt true with this one. After blowing out the candle black smoke billows off the wick for a while. I bought a candle that has no smell. Should have bought a glade candle. So disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Erika
review: I recently got into candles, so I bought this online. I was lucky it arrived in good conditions compared to other reviewers. The scent was strong (in a good way) the first time I lighted it up, but diminished a bit after the following days of lighting it up. I had problems with the wick, but after cutting it a few times, it worked great. Candle lasted a few days, so in that sense, it was definitely worth the money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Katie - MI
review: This candle has the best scent. It reminds me a lot of White Shoulders perfume by Elizabeth Arden, which is my favorite perfume. It completely fills a room with its soft sweet floral aroma. It burns for a long time, and easily competes with other more expensive candles on the market. I'm glad I bought this and will definitely repurchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kari Patton
review: I have always loved yankee candles but this one is disappointing. Lavender/Vanilla but can‚Äôt smell it at all. The glass jar seems to have some sort of white cloudy film covering the inside, tried washing it off but still isn‚Äôt a clear glass like my other candles. Hopefully the scent is better as it burns down some. I hate having to return items, it‚Äôs a hassle. Will have to stick to buying in store/in person for future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amazon Customer
