review: I have gardenias growing at my house, along the rear lanai.  They smell amazing when in bloom.  My lady friend always comments on how good they smell.  I thought I would buy this White Gardenia scented Yankee Candle as a gift for her.  While this candle has a pleasant smell It doesnt smell like real gardenias at all really.  To me it smells more like a clean laundry scented air freshener or something...  I likely will just end up buying real potted gardenias for her and probably return this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: DK
review: I purchased this candle.  The first time it showed up broken and melted and it has been really hot.  The company promptly sent me another candle.  Upon receiving the 2nd candle it was also broken and melted due to the heat!  So the company had me return the second candle and I did.  Then I got most of my money back.  Not the companies fault, I would buy from them again just not in the HEAT of the summer for a candle that melts.  The packaging was also good on the product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Lori
review: This candle does not look like the photo‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs a very dark purple. Also the smell is off, not that lovely lavender/vanilla scent. I can‚Äôt even describe the smell. I would not recommend this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jeff F.
review: I bought it as part of my wife's Christmas this past year but when she opened the candle it seemed to be made incorrectly or had gotten hot and melted. I took the photos attached on 12/30 and put the candle in a cabinet and forgot about it until I went to clean the cabinet on Sunday,3/14. I didn't realize I checked the order today and found that I had 30 days to get a refund or replacement. Amazon customer service told me I could send it back but I would be charged a restocking fee, couldn't tell me how much the fee would be so after 34 minutes on the phone I called it quits. Good luck restocking that one if I would have sent it in. I'm a bit disappointed with Amazon as I've been a good customer for a number of years and figured they would do more. Ultimately my fault for forgetting about it. Twenty-three bucks down the tubes. Maybe I can put it in hot water and it will reform properly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: T Rav
review: Looks crusty on top and color is not consistent. Bought for a gift but I would be embarrassed to give it looking like this. When I order from Amazon I don‚Äôt expect to receive seconds but it seems to be a thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kenya Alexander
review: This scent is horrible wait a minute what scent? I purchased another scent by Yankee last week that really had my room smelling nice so I took a chance with the honey lavender thinking I would be satisfied well I was wrong. You can‚Äôt smell it when it‚Äôs lit. It‚Äôs been burning for 30 minutes now. I will never purchase again. I‚Äôm very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Luka
review: I LOVEEE pink sands, it smells unlike any scent I've ever found.... it's slightly fruity, sort of smells like a pie, but has a warm, sort of sandalwood scent... I always treat myself to this candle every year, there's nothing like it! Also, the color of the candle itself is a super cute, pale pink. Great as a gift as well, everyone I know has loved it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: GARY TOMPOROWSKI
review: No smell. No wonder it was on sale.  I would like my money back or send me another candle to try.  Scented candle should have some smell. Open the top without lighting and there is a faint smell but once lit I get nothing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: WarriorMom22
review: My daughter absolutely loves the smell of Yankee Candle Pink Sands! It has a strong throw that I find a little overwhelming in an area like a small bathroom, but it doesn't bother my daughter one bit. The scent incorporates citrus, fruity, floral, woodsy, and musk all in one. My daughter has loved this scent for over 2 years, and still isn't tired of it. I got her another one for Christmas. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: JD
review: It smelled like lilac at first, but then it started to smell more like hay. So if you like that smell, great. Plus these candles smoke a ton when you put them out, even more than this double wick candle we have. For all the hype about these candles, we just thought they'd be better. Not terrible, but not great either.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Dick. J
review: I usually just attempt to find the best deal on YC large jars that I can as I mostly enjoy the warm glow of a candle and am not all that particular about scent. HOWEVER, this one smells VERY floral. Not bad if you enjoy that scent but I don't care for it. It's strong. Of course after a few lights it will fade so not overly bothered but doubt I'll be buying this one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Patty
review: I bought the gardenia and the jasmine, two powerful scents in nature although, sadly, not in these candles. I made scented candles myself back in the 70s. When we cleaned out my parents house in 2008 the candles I had given them maintained an intense fragrance so really there is no excuse for this insipid offering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: k-flo
review: I'm kidding. Kind of. Jasmin is probably my favorite scent ever, I was really excited to find this Yankee Candle super discounted on Prime Day. It smells amazing and has become my go-to at the end of a long day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Rich
review: Yankee Candle Lilac Blossoms is my wife's favorite candle fragrance.  Unfortunately, the wax in this candle is old, it doesn't burn evenly and it has very little fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: emily
review: This smell is amazing ..got this for my brother's wife.  She told me it was ok and she could find someone to give it to.. last present she ever gets from me lol . Yes this is giftable to people that appreciate receiving gifts.  Definitely learned my lesson about being nice and spending money on people I don't really like.  Merry Christmas Biatch haha

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Michel Grotstein
review: Love Yankee candles BUT this one came damaged. Fortunately I had an empty Yankee candle jar handy and a spare wick on hand so rather than return it I remelted the candle and poured it into the new jar. I didn‚Äôt want to waste what was otherwise a perfectly good candle. Word to the packers: please do better when packing glass items.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amazon Customer
review: a lot of the reviews are saying it's not good/fake/came broken but I ordered two large jar lilac candles and they were wrapped HELLA safely and smell amazingggg if u want to get it, get it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: T. Stacy
review: This candle is outstanding and will make the perfect gift for anyone who loves candles. The sent is strong and last long after its put out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jessica Dawn Campbell
review: Pink Sands has always been my favorite scent of Yankee candles, it‚Äôs so convenient to be able to order my favorite candle ~ my signature scent and have it delivered every two months or however frequent you want to receive it! Very happy with my purchase! One more thing‚Ä¶ It was packaged impeccably!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: MAC
review: This is the awfulest smelling candle I have ever purchased.  It smells like weeds or grass burning.  I just can't describe it.  No where near the smell of lavender.  Made my whole downstairs stink.  Lavender should smell beautiful and relaxing, not smell awful like burning grass.  Don't waste your money on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Carole Koudsi
review: Hi! This is one of my very favorite YC fragrances. It was packaged safely and arrived quickly. It looks and smells exactly like the Lilac Blossoms candle I expected. Spring is coming; so this will definitely help to get me in the mood! Order with confidence! Whenever I can, I will certainly order again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Tammy Brown
review: I had ordered 2 of these one was good however the second on the jar was chipped and had a very large crack so sadly it ended up being a waste of money, soothe candle itself I have nothing bad to say however there packaging is not great so the one that was good was very expencive because one was a full waste, I would not order one again not worth the risk

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Hummingbird Fan
review: This is one of my FAVORITE scents that Yankee Candle has during Fall/Halloween time. This year I had to buy it from Amazon, because Yankee didn‚Äôt release it for Halloween. I was told they just weren‚Äôt going to this year. Well they must have gotten the hint that people weren‚Äôt happy, cause they did a month later and on sale. But I had gotten mine from here so‚Ä¶but I‚Äôm still very happy I get them!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: dls670
review: I enjoy the scent of this candle, Pink Sands.  It is not overwhelming but it is not so subtle that it‚Äôs undetectable. I‚Äôve only burned the candle a couple of times but for several hours each time and longevity appears to be average for a Yankee candle. I would not  hesitate to give as a gift.  Price was very reasonable.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: M K.
review: I love the pink sands scent and have purchased plug ins but this has no scent.  I have to get right up to it to even get a hint of the scent.  I wanted my whole house to smell of it.  Feeling like I've been scammed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Austin
review: No Smell. Yankee‚Äôs quality control has been atrocious in the past few years. 75% of the way through this candle and I have yet to smell it. Pink Sands and Lilac Blossom are the only 2 I‚Äôve bought that haven‚Äôt had at least 1 have no smell at all. Buy Woodwick instead. More expensive but at least you get a scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ceme
review: This is my forever favorite candle. I have them all over my home. Love the large size, give me a 3 wick one Yankee, please. I burn for an hour or two a few nights a week. I love it!! Very calming. I store my unused jars open in my dresser drawer with my shawls, t-shirts and sweaters.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: James S
review: Enchanted Moon is a nice scent.  It is an older candle and they lose some scent.  Still, it does smell good and provides a perfect light for Halloween.  When you buy for half the price. You‚Äôre getting an older product.  If you want the freshest best throw, buy direct for full price.  Wax packaged well and candle was perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Mario c.
review: As of my review, the large tumbler was $16 from Amazon, about 1/2 the price Yankee candle charges via website or store. Amazing value for the price, I got several for myself and mother's day gifts. My only issue is the smell isn't as strong as some other candles from Yankee, but it is very pleasant. They may be older stock since the labels have since changed, but they arrived in Yankee candle boxes and are beautiful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Miss Diva
review: I thought if I got an expensive Yankee candle I would have my room smelling better it did not I took it to the kitchen thinking if I light it in there it would smell different it did not I took it to a small bathroom and you sit in there to see if I can get some kind of smell out of it I did not I will not purchase This again and waste my money

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: S. Magliocco
review: I ordered this candle because it‚Äôs advertised as rose scented.  Instead it smells like home made caramel that somehow went badly.  Kind of a combination of feet and caramel.  I fully expected this to smell like my grandmother‚Äôs bathroom - I mean before grandpop got in there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: J. W.
review: Beach walk is my favorite scent in the Yankee Candle lineup. It has a bright scent profile with floral undertones that you can‚Äôt quite put your finger on. It is aptly named, too - the scent makes me think of a cozy beachfront house with the windows open on a cool day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kat
review: This Lilac Blossom candle smells absolutely AMAZING!!! The soft delicate scent of lilacs fills the whole room but it's not over powering. This is by far my favorite candle from Yankee Candle. This is my second purchase of this particular candle. The burning time is very long also. Highly recommend as a gift for Mother's Date!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Beatrice
review: At first I didn't like the smell as it smelled a bit cheap but after a few days it became pleasant ! It would make a great gift or make any room cozy. I don't light it, only open the lid and that's good enough for me. A bit expensive but I think it'll last many years as i don't plan on lighting it anytime soon

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Lisa from Oregon
review: I hope this is a legit one, as it came with no label. I got it, because I have a beach theme in my house, and thought the label would even look cute, when I was burning it. But now no label. It smells ok, but the candle doesn't totally look right either. The other one I ordered, looks fine and with a label.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ronda wilkinson
review: I have ordered candles from Amazon before. The last few times I‚Äôve had nothing but problems.  As you can see it‚Äôs defective to the point I cannot light it.  I‚Äôve had cracked jars, melted candles , no wick.  I‚Äôm really disappointed.  And I‚Äôm walking on crutches so it‚Äôs not easy to return things over and over to Koles or UPS.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Elizabeth Crawford
review: Candles a little expensive than I like to see but that‚Äôs just the brand, only issue I had was it came melted on the top. Had to submit for a second one, but Amazon was great it replacing it quickly the timing just missed the birthday party. My mother in law was still happy since it‚Äôs her favorite scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Melvin Monteiro
review: The aroma is of jasmine but cloyingly sweet. It unbearable to light the candle for more than a few minutes. If you are good with the artificial jasmine aroma, go for it . I would prefer if they would tone it now and get the actual essence of jasmine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: shay
review: When I first unboxed it all I could smell was the candle, but when I lit up and had it on for awhile the smell wasn't as strong as I thought and it didn't fill my room. I have a tiny room too. The smell stood mostly in the area  I left it at.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: TravelBob
review: Yankee Candles always live up to the hype in my experiences.  I bought the lilac scented candle and it smells great!  It is a large size, in an attractive and substantial jar, and has an attractive design on its label.  If I wanted to give someone a candle, I think a Yankee Candle would be a winner.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kelly Owens
review: Wow, I'm shocked. I have been buying the equivalent, off-brand.. Tuscany and Village candles, and I just purchased my first yankee candle in ages... and wow they are horrible compared to the other two. The scent is well enough, but it burns 3 times as fast, literally! I'll never buy a Yankee candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Martha A. Gertz
review: Lavender is my favorite scent for my bathrooms. They smell like bath soap and are not overpowering. This scent is impossible to find at the Yankee candle stores although the clerks tell me everyone e asks for them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: jessica
review: Feels like a knock off. Doesn‚Äôt fill the room, barely smell it, burns really fast. Think it‚Äôs a fake.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: devin
review: They smell so good ... I burn them every night for about 4 hours I would say and they lasted me about 3 weeks so that's awesome...Disclaimer .. Make Sure To Get Long Matches if you don't have them than a long peice of spaghetti works.... Just a little hack for ya .. Enjoy them ... I did

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Brooks
review: This candle arrives today with whole top broken due to it being shipped in a flimsy recycled cardboard clamshell with no padding. Candle is fine, so I decided that it was easier to burn it down to below the sharp broken edges that it was to return it during Covid. So here we are. Good candle, strong scent. But glass needs padding, which I‚Äôm sure a candle manufacturer knows well,

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Gia Crowner
review: These candles smell amazing!! I could smell the pink sand through the box and I instantly fell in love. Definitely worth the money! There were delivered together in a Amazon box and each candle was separated in to its own yankee candle box. I‚Äôm giving it to me sister for Christmas so it‚Äôs nice that each candle is individually packaged with its own protection.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ross Robinson
review: Very good lovely scent but when there was maybe 3/4 of an inch left of the candle, I lit it and it sent off the hallway fire alarms of my apartment complex but not my own apartment fire alarm. I guess strong smell of plastic indicated it should've been thrown out slightly before then.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amazon Customer
review: My concern when purchasing stuff like this through Amazon is always authenticity. This was one of my fave Yankee Candle scents so I can confirm it is authentic. It's so lovely. Obviously scent is personal to everyone so that's all I can confirm :) Package arrived intact, safe and sound.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ruth I. Thomas
review: Well, we all know how expensive these guys can be, but some scents are worth it to me.  I wait with bated breath for Hearts and Roses to return, but am not optimistic about it.  This one, Enchanted Moon, will disappear, too, I am sure.  So I was glad to see this available at least a little while longer.  Sigh.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Angela
review: ‚ÄúBeach Walk‚Äù fragrance? Ha! I surely did not smell sand, or an ocean fragrance. My deodorant has more of a fragrance than this candle. These are definitely not TRUE Yankee Candles. These are definitely knock offs. Fakes. Save your money. I‚Äôm clearly disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Donna Covell
review: Yankee Candles are my favorite but there is not a store near me.  I was very happy to know that Amazon sold them in my favorite scent, lavender.  These are the only candles I use as they are safe and lasts a long time.  Variety of scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kevin
review: I purchased this candle after Target stopped selling their lilac candles (which I was extremely distraught over). I don‚Äôt usually buy Yankee Candles because I think they are overpriced but this was one definitely worth it! I just purchased a second because my first is getting a little low after several months of owning it. Both of my jars cakes with weird bubbles in them, which would make the aesthetics a little less appealing when gift giving. But, in my opinion, a candle is a candle as long as it can burn and smell good. Will continue to make this my #1 lilac candle brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Justin
review: All these people writing false reviews about yankee candles not smelling should be banned from reviewing. I have always and always will love these candles. Yes there are a few scents that are a bit to feminine for my taste but even they smell delectable. Yankee candle you get a 110% from me. I just wish I could afford them more often than I can.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Claire
review: yankee has always been hit or miss with me--this one burns very dirty--I keep the wicks trimmed, and still black soot all over the glass as it burns. Cannot smell it at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: S. Natole
review: My first Yankee Candle and I'm impressed! Even burning as long as you trim wick consistently and burn to edges.  Lilac is my favorite scent and this smells so natural and not at all artificial.  Will last me a long time and I'll definitely buy another and try more scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Li P
review: I don't know why so many reviewrs said that the scent was great because both tumblers, rose and lavendar/vanilla did not have a scent before lighting and no scent after lighting. I uesd to buy ONLY Yankee Candles because I thought I was guaranteed a beautifully strong scent but not in the tumbler size for some unknown reason

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: GLaSalla
review: As soon as you open the top of the jar it smells like I just got a dozen roses it is amazing seriously it came quickly I was perfectly boxed and I am enjoying every minute of it I highly recommend it I will definitely re-order this again for the fifth time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Michigan Girl
review: I love Yankee Candles. This scent is definitely one of my favorites. Light and calming, this scent features vanilla undertones with berry, citrus, and melon top notes. It smells exactly like a tropical vacation on a pink sand beach! I enjoy this scent in my home (especially during the winter).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: mwang
review: The scent of this candle is incredibly horrible unfortunately. It smells like a piercing stinging strong floral scent that invades your nostrils. A shame because I loved the candle itself and seems to have long burn time, very weighty. But I would avoid this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: E H Brogan
review: I have burned this candle twice and I can tell it‚Äôs going to last forever! A great bargain, I‚Äôm so tired of candles you have to selectively burn if you want them to last a while. I like to use this at night when I‚Äôm getting ready for bed/before sleep as some pleasant aromatherapy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Pumpkin
review: I got the jasmine scent and I smelled l it immediately after I opened the box it was shipped in, so it‚Äôs quite strong! I wanted a strong candle so it‚Äôs perfect for me, but if you want a mild scent the jasmine one is not for you. It‚Äôs slow burning and the wick is great quality. I love it, and would buy it again for myself or as a gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Discerning Customer
review: This glass jar candle smells great! Unfortunately the glass jar arrived broken making it unusable. It is shipped to you at your risk. So good luck! It will be a great smelling and pleasant candle if it arrives in good condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Nicole K
review: Not sure what I thought "wedding day" would smell like but this smells like a cheap dollar store candle. Nothing special about it. I plan on returning and making my own label to put on a more pleasant smelling candle that cost less

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Muse
review: Mine came melted sideways with the wick completely covered so I had to bake it and fish out the wick. Wish they shipped it facing up so that wouldn't happen but it's always packed laying sideways. Not sure if it melted in their warehouse or during shipping but I left it in the sun to try to melt it back into shape and it didn't work so I resorted to the oven. Kind of wasteful to burn it just to fix it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Sean Bennett
review: I find the Yankee Candle brand to be hit and miss. This is by far my favorite scent from the company. This candle is strong yet floral and not overpowering. The candles price on Amazon can't be beat. This candle is long lasting in burn time and scent.  Grab a match and light up this great candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: xwprnss
review: This candle smells like a cheap bar of soap. Like the kinda bar of soap you find at the dollar tree that nobody ever buys. It‚Äôs god awful, I tried to convince myself that maybe I was being extra but my 10 year old niece walked in and said ‚Äúeww something smells like nasty flowers‚Äù and children don‚Äôt lie so I had to throw the candle away. I gave it two stars because the size is great but that‚Äôs about it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Lanna Akil
review: Purchased the Midnight Jasmine. I fell in love with the smell at the Yankee Store as it reminded of me of the streets in Syria covered in Jasmine flowers. Will be gifting this to all my friends and family who want to a reminder of the smells back home. This lasts such a long time and I will continue to purchase it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: AnnapolisGal
review: I don't get it. Pink Sands smells nothing like the beach/ocean -- at least not the candle I received. This smells like....bananas. Ripe bananas. I tried to like this -- I kept trying to think it smelled like a Banana Daquiri, but nope. It just smells like bananas that have been sitting on the counter for a bit too long. Yuck.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: ShesArtDealerChic
review: Love this scent!!! It's literally the next best thing to having your home filled with bunches of real fresh cut roses!!! Easily an all time favorite candle!!! ‚Ä¢ Beautiful Scent ‚Ä¢ Great Throw ‚Ä¢ Pools Evenly ‚Ä¢ Long Lasting Slow Burn

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Rachel RBH
review: I read the reviews and decided to buy this candle because people were saying that it smells like The Bahamas White Sand Beaches ! It DOESN‚ÄôT! It smells like a whole bunch of NOTHING!!!!!! I let it burn for a whole day and could not smell anything ! NADA! So disappointed! I will go back and buy my Lilac Blossoms!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kacie M
review: I absolutely love this candle! I use to have lilac trees at my previous home that were my absolute favorite because they smelt so lovely and this candle smells just like them. Having this candle smells so wonderful and makes me so nostalgic. The other positive thing I would like to mention is how wonderfully they are packaged! I have bought three yankee candles off Amazon now and each one is packaged with great care! I 100% recommend!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Meg Stegbauer
review: The first time I found this Lilac candle I was taken back to when I was a child walking to school in Michigan and the smell of the lilacs! I was so excited I bought it and just bought several more. I love this fragrance. It's light, but strong enough to fill the air with the smell of lilacs.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: C. L. Cunningham
review: I like this candle for its pretty color reminiscent of the inside of a seashell and for its scent which is balanced and not overpowering (not too floral, not too citrus, not too spicy, not too musky). I find it pleasant and relaxing. This is a repeat purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Nathan
review: The candle smells great you would expect it to send a strong aroma all throughout the house? but it is surprisingly weak! I could hardly smell it at all! I have had Dollar Store candles smell strongerüëé

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jenny
review: Where's the scent?  We ordered the Gardenia but you can't smell it. Yankee candles use to be premium candles, but no more. Proof positive that price isn't always an indicator of good quality.  Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Evefalling
review: Love the scent, it doesn't fade as candle burns.  Nice light slightly floral scent, . Burned down nicely, with scent strong the entire time. It does have a bit of zest to the smell that is invigorating,  yet calming also.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kindle Customer
review: I love this scent which is why I purchased it and purchased an additional one for a gift for Mother's day. When I opened the box, it smelled amazing. However, I am assuming it is old and that is why the price is so low. I lit the candle and there is no smell. I burned it halfway down, which resulted in hours of burning, and I still did not smell anything. I am honestly disappointed. I ended up just purchasing a new one at Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Lydia R Rogers
review: I love the scent of Pink Sands, it is the best! Hope they never discontinue this scent. It last a long time,  you don‚Äôt have to burn the candle a long time. Just let it pool after lighting then blow candle out. The scent last a long time‚Ä¶

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Adam
review: The candle smells lovely but both of the candles I received were broken!! The first one was broken and they sent out another one that was also broken. I ordered it as a gift for someone but I‚Äôm glad I had it delivered to me first, good thing. That would not have been a very good gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Katerinski
review: No teak smell. Very floral. Like artificial rose scent. Has a smell I cant place, like playdoh and potpourri maybe. Not at all what I thought it would be. Might be good if you like flowery smells, pass on it if you like earth, musk, and spice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: J and D
review: Terrible scent. I love Yankee candle Lilac but this one smells horrible. It's nothing like the others i have bought. It doesn't even smell like my other one from Yankee of the same sent from before. Chemical stink. Not at all what i had come to expect from this company or this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Sangeeta Shekhawat
review: Scent Too strong and not pleasant. The wick produces a lot of smoke.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: christina Lehrkamp
review: It might have been a fluke on this candle but I couldn't keep it lit it sparked tried a warmer it just popped candle wax everywhere. But I've always loved this brand. Has great scent like I said probably a fluke

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Victoria
review: Great candle! I got a great deal on this and was way cheaper than a Yankee candle that size! good smell and great quality

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Mrinalini Upadhya
review: The candle came broken the first time. I got a replacement and I never thought I will write this review but I think this is the only Yankee candle smell that I don't like at all. It smells like any regular super scented soap.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Mark A. Bauer
review: Disappointed in the scent. Used it in my office at home, a small space so expected more scent, less smoke. It set off my smoke alarm with the office door open. I noticed the wick burns with a larger than usual flame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ken S
review: The quality of this candle is exceptional. I love the scent as well!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: tracy woods
review: It smells good but it smells nothing like lilacs. Put in a few extra dollars and buy the Lilac from B&B. If you really want the Lilac smell this is not going to smell like lilacs. Remember when Yankee Candles were supposed to be the best!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Summerands06
review: I love that they come so well packaged. You can save it and send one at another time. As always the smell was great. A present for my bestie every year and she just lives it. Great value for the money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Tony Buccieri
review: Never ordered a YC before and wanted to see what all the hub bub was about....disappointed the scent was so weak and the candle did not last very long. My $9 Better Homes & Gardens candles have stronger scents and last alot longer....oh well c'est la vie...not gonna buy another YC again, not worth it imo

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: P. P. Pino
review: The fragrance from this Pink Sand candle causes my wife to cringe. It has a permanent place at our home‚Ä¶OUTSIDE. Take a pass on this purchase, unless you can actually sample this odor before purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kyle Stegman
review: This was on Oprahs best list and it is fantastic.  The scent is wonderful and it fills the whole house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: lori7521
review: This was the first time purchasing the Beach Walk scent.  I really love it!  It‚Äôs a nice clean fragrance and has a great throw. This candle definitely reminds me of the beach. The downside is that; my husband liked it too.  He stole it and brought it to his office!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: BandD
review: This candle is my very favorite - the scent if wonderful, clean and refreshing!  I am so glad Amazon had these, and at a good price, since the stores are almost non-existent in our area.  Will order more!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Honest Raven
review: Packaging is awesome. Scent is beautiful! Price was spot on! It‚Äôs not ‚Äúsoapy‚Äù smelling at all!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amanda7365
review: Someone recommended this scented candle to me.  I am usually into the more natural scents, like vanilla and eucalyptus, mint, etc. This candle is more of a candy scent- kind of like a starburst or something, but it's not overpowering. I actually quite enjoy it and it seems like it has a long long burn life. Great purchase!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: TravisDaDrunk
review: I thought this candle would last like a day, it's been 4 and it's only half way done. The scent is nice and chill, not over powering like the other one I purchased that, I can barely stand for more than 3 minutes. This is a great scented candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: susan
review: Reminds me every day of the lilac tree we had in our front yard when I was a child.  Normally not a fan of flower scents but this scent is spot-on.  I have it on reorder every 2 months.  Love it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: CzarZelinsky
review: Like their other candles, this one has impressive longevity. Unlike their other candles, this one does not smell good at all. I'll be sticking with their cupcake scented candles from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Margo
review: In the past, I bought Yankee candles and always very fragrant also while lit. You can only smell this one when you first take the lid off not while burning. Won't spend money on a Yankee candle ever again. I suppose their quality went down hill over the years or I got a bum one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Lake Gal
review: Opened shipping box and broken glass fell all over. Unable to use candle. Sending a replacement within ten days, so hopefully that one will arrive undamaged.  I have bought this scent before and enjoyed it very much, so was disappointed that this one arrived broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Only Kristina
review: Am so sad! I was really looking forward to this and its sideways melted and no wick..... so I only got wax in a glass..... guess the ac wasn't working in the truck it was brought in. I dont know how else to explain this almost 2inches clean off the glass omg!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Chad
review: I like more potent candles. This one hardly smells and the scent it does have is not lilac‚Ä¶

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Noelle228
review: Updated with replacement candle: Very disappointing.  Burned for the recommended time and does not burn evenly. The scent is wonderful but it came without a visible wick . Had to return it and request a replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Grynnie
review: I ordered two different Yankee Candles of the same size. They arrived in two different sized boxes with packing that was supposed to prevent breakage. The whole top lip was broken into many pieces. Most of the breakage was above the wax line so I kept it since I had another container that I could sit it in to burn.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: MGM
review: I had this for a few days (without lighting) and my whole downstairs smelled great.  Light it, more great.  If you love lilacs.. this is for you!  (Came right on time - I bought 2).. Waiting patiently for spring.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Nickie K
review: I love the scent of Bayberry best, but the Pink Sands has a glow to it that makes it more visually appealing.  The scent is muted, the longevity is very good provided the wick gets trimmed before each lighting, the price is better than most, and it would make a fine gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Zsa Zsa
review: Too bad I bought this thinking it would smell amazing but I was sooo wrong..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Terri
review: Once again, I received my Yankee Candle and am very disappointed!  I don't understand why there is no scent.  I am used to the candle being very strong in EVERY scent I bought!  Even if I go to the Yankee Candle store, it is the same thing.  I miss the old Yankee Candle scents!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: K. Creamer
review: Candle released black film all over my newly redone master bathroom. Trimmed candle wick as directed but candle still. Coated walls and even toilet seat! I purchased 2 of these candles and I have never had a problem with Yankee Candle before.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amazon Customer
review: Well I‚Äôm sorry to say it was broke when received. I heard the broken glass as I picked it up. I ordered along with another one which came delivered yesterday it was perfect.  But really I can understand with the volume of packages that are being delivered today ! The scent is great .... I‚Äôll try again when this crisis is over ..... Thank you and STAY SAFE TO ALL THE WORKERS !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Kato Kate
review: Love the candle so I ordered two. UPS left a totally open plastic bag on my porch with only 1 candle inside. I immediately called Amazon and they can‚Äôt replace missing items!!! Totally unexpected policy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Elaine E.
review: Woohoo!!! I absolutely am a pink sands gal. This scent though is lovely. I light it downstairs and it smells great throughout both upstairs and downstairs. Also instead of 29.50 I paid 16.99 oh yes. I completely recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: April
review: 100% real Yankee candle! These candles are the absolute best. None came broken and the smell is exactly as if I‚Äôd bought it from a Yankee candle dealer. I will continue to buy more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Paul R
review: Not a fan of the lilac scent nor the 2 wick tumbler candle. The scent was nothing like a lilac nor other Yankee Candle‚Äôs I have bought. The 2 wick tumbler seemed to burn very fast. I‚Äôll stick with the jars.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Katelyn Liberty
review: This is my favorite spring/ summer candle. Seriously the best scent! Yankee candle is worth the money too because I light it every day for the reccomend 3-4 hours at a time, the scent fills my entire kitchen and 1 large jar lasts about a month.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Stubby
review: I purchased two of these candles and they were absolutely wonderful! I should have known that Amazon had everything, but I am thrilled that I found them  and I would continue to purchase more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: David
review: Ok so I blind bought this candle... Turns out I hate the smell of lilac. Besides that, candle burned evenly and had a very strong scent throw for the short time I had it lit before realizing I hated the scent. Scent is VERY strong. If you like lilac, go crazy man, not my cup of tea.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ashwin Shrestha
review: Yankee candle does last a long time and smell does not fade. But this smell was not for me - still recommend if you like the smell. Hard to tell if smell is good over the internet haha

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jeanette Emmert
review: The smell of the roses in this candle are absolutely amazing. We gave this as a gift, and the recipient was so excited to get it because it is her favorite scent. Lovely

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: nallely arias
review: I love this scent I hVe 3 dogs in the house and they make stuff stink sometimes this candel drowns out the smell of my 3 dogs its good and not too strong lasted 2 weeks had it burning a long time every day though it smells like a garden of flowers love love love deff recommend for a gift ‚ù§

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Antonio J. Oliva
review: Yankee Candle's  Large Jar Candle in the Lilac Blossoms is a light aroma that does not overwhelm your senses. In the large size, I accept it to last a long time.  Spring is in the air.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Cristina D.
review: I love the smell of roses but this candle was disappointing.  Not only did it not provide a beautiful rose aroma but the wick ended up not burning as long as it should have.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: John L. Cyr
review: Much to my horror, I found that the candle was leaving soot behind in every part of the house. I received a quote to remove the soot. $20,000! Someone please tell Jeff that the quality of his merchandise is going down, down down. As for the moon, I'd like to give this candle a free trip to the moon at the end of my foot.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Upset
review: Yankee candles are not the same anymore. They used to smell amazing and flow through your whole house, now you're lucky if you can smell a large candle burning in a 5x5 bathroom. I will not be buying Yankee candles ever again because the last two that I purchased had no smell whatsoever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: J. K. Vega
review: I was really looking forward to using this candle. I guess sitting in a HOT Delivery Truck not a good idea. The candle must have been laying on it's side because the wax was melted to the top of the candle lid. The wick isn't even visible.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: WolfMother
review: Candles seem to have been stored well; packaging all paper materials. Love love love Yankee Lavender scent. Haven't been able to find on Yankee site, so thank you Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: MakenzieSargent
review: It smells like literal rose petal and I don't mean the metaphorical one or the prefume-ish smells it gave me a headache. But if you want the inside to smell like dirt or outside this is for you. It's not the candles fault I didn't like it though. I just expected something different.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jason Nussbaum
review: Candle isn't even halfway burned and the wick won't stay lit anymore. Absolute joke of a product. Won't ever buy another commercially made candle again. Etsy here I come.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: NANCE
review: My candle arrived in 1 piece.  The scent is not as fragrant as I expected.  What was really disappointing was the color.  On the website the picture shows the candle as a vibrant lavender color.  My candle was much more muted.  Since I got it at a great price, I am not going to return it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: nully6n
review: This doesn‚Äôt have a very good lavender scent. It doesn‚Äôt smell like lavender

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Christie Garcia
review: Only thing I didn‚Äôt like got price you can‚Äôt get the wick cut like you do in the store‚Äôs it makes difference however you can buy ur own cutter from Yankee candle store‚Äôs!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Sue-Ann Dunlop
review: I love the smell of beautiful lilac flowers.  If you like lilacs, you won't like this!  It had an extremely strong, harsh perfume odor that was very irritating.  So irritating that when I held it up to open and smell it, I recoiled and accidentally dropped and smashed the glass container.  What a waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: DeAnne
review: This arrived in Colombia broken.  I explained and was told by Yankee Candle to return.  It was shattered glass and I had tossed it.  They replaced but charged me for the new item PLUS $7 shipping (original order was free shipping) so no more Yankee Candle orders for me!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Roni B
review: I LOVE YANKEE CANDLES!  The scent is always strong enough to fill a room and they last as stated.  Especially like the jar candle so you can snuff it out just by putting the lid back on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: MAWUTZ
review: Great smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Maria Bradham
review: I love yankee candles , my house is filled with candles, I NEVER experience any problems with them until now.  I was ready to light my gorgeous lavender candle and guess what no WICK.  I tried to dig a little, but there is no WICK PLEASE send me a replacement ASAP

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: CJ
review: The item they sent me was already used. Wick was already burned and wax showed signs of having already been melted. Scent is very strong. Was going to be a gift but not going to give anybody something that's obviously already been used!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: JoJo
review: This candle has hardly no scent. It's a ridiculously priced candle that I can buy a long lasting candle in a dollar store for a dollar. Never again will I buy a Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: CatLady
review: I love the scent of lilac‚Äôs & this candle did not disappoint. I will definitely be purchasing more in the future!!  Strongly recommend for other lilac lovers.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: kccbkdna
review: The first candle was used. The lavender scent is very light and barely detectable. Very disappointed. I also ordered a vanilla candle 2 weeks ago. It still hasn‚Äôt arrived. .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Jeff
review: It is a nice candle and lasts a decent amount of time, but I was expecting a lighter scent than what it has. Some might like it, but it's too strong for me - almost a sweet smell. I definitely would not use it in a small room. The smell would be overwhelming. I would use it in larger spaces only.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Tom M.

author: Mrs P
review: I used to love Yankee Candles and bought them regularly because of their wonderful scent. I could smell them all over my house when I burned one.  However, over the past couple of years they have changed their formula and you can barely smell anything.  Regrettably, this was the case with this candle.  Unless you're standing right next to it you will not be able to discern any measurably throw in your area.  Not worth the money and I will, sadly, not buy any of their candles again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Wild Orchid Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Roy G. Biv

product_title: Yankee Candle Wild Orchid Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Mellie
review: I'm living at our beach condo this summer, and I burn this candle every day. It's so beachy, and is a little reminiscent of a nice-smelling suntan lotion from days of yore. Used to be that this scent was one of Yankee Candle's stronger ones. Now that most YC's have lost their strong scent (and some of them seem to have no scent at all), at least you can smell this one. But it is very light, so it's great for people like my sister who don't tolerate strongly scented candles. If I could buy the old version though, the more strongly scented one, I would! This one has the same scent, just not as strong. Also, I like that the two-wick tumbler is an option. Used to be it was only the one-wick large jar, the classic Yankee Candle. The two-wick tumbler has a more even burn, and you don't have to burn it for four full hours, as you do with the large one-wick jar, to maintain the integrity of the wax. And no worries about tunneling. So I buy the tumbler version. If I knew I wanted to be at home and burn it for four hours at a time, I'd buy the classic jar version. It lasts longer. PS - I did buy one the jar version of this candle recently, and the scent isn't any stronger than the tumbler version. So the reduced scent of Yankee Candles doesn't seem to have to do with which version you buy large jar or large tumbler. But the smaller of their candles do not seem to have as much scent throw, so I always buy the large ones.

product_title: Yankee Candle Wild Orchid Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: C. Koehring
review: No complaints.  I will say I tried several cheaper varieties and did not like the others, so it is worth the extra money if you love the true sent of Jasmine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Wild Orchid Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Rhabyn S. McCowan
review: This one is my favorite out of the 3 I recently ordered. It smells like a mixture of cotton candy and ocean breeze. I think the name is pretty on point. I ordered a small one because I didn't want to waste my money on a large candle I might not like...and I wish I had ordered the large one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Wild Orchid Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Earl Peck
review: I love, love, love this candle.  I have a candle warmer, which evenly heats the candle and releases the fragrance.  It is similar to a real floral scent, not a chemical floral  smell.  Would purchase again.

I can always use the glass again for something else after I am finished with the candle.

The lid pops off and becomes a foot for the jar to sit on. As a cat owner, I very much found this feature to be handy in preventing my little jerks from knocking it off of the table.

author: Lisa Storhaug
review: This candle has a great scent. Unfortunately i think the candles are defective. I have some  experience in the making of candles and know the wick is very important. That its the right weight, length, and material. To burn properly. This second candle I received has the same problems as the first one. The wick burns down so close to the surface of the wax there is no flame and it basically is just smouldering. i‚Äôm returning this candle to Amazon and asking for a refund.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Bibbitzmom
review: Smells like the beach. As a.child of the 70's my go-to beach scent always included coconut. That's what sunscreen smelled like. Due to an injury, I missed out on my beach vacation. This candle didn't make up for that, but it really smells like coconut. It burns evenly, which is a big deal for a candle that I will red-light over and over.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Florida Beach Babe
review: I love this cute darling little jar. The scent of the Coconut Beach is heavenly. Will buy more for Christmas gifts! And I'll repurpose the jar for candies and or Christmas drinks!  Definitely I love this purchase!

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: J.Adams
review: I actually ordered a Yankee Candle Signature Large Tumbler Candle with two-wicks in the scent Black Tea and Lemon. Instead, I received a Yankee Candle Scentlight, which is fine. It's a much more expensive product and there's no risk of fire with this essential oil diffuser. The Yankee Candle Scentlight Essential Oil Diffuser Set comes with a diffuser that lights up and an essential oil cartridge. The diffuser can be plugged in or used with batteries. .There's a convenient timer on the diffuser that allows for 5 hours per day use and lasts up to 30 days. In my opinion, that's great cartridge life! This Scentlight Essential Oil Diffuser would make a terrific gift for anyone, but especially for a college student, someone just moving into their own place, or a thoughtful housewarming gift! Because the Yankee Candle Scentlight uses cartridges, you'll get indefinite use out of one diffuser! You also won't have the concerns you'd normally have with burning candles. I'm sending this Scentlight diffuser to college with our son this fall. He said he'd love to have it and I'm sure it'll make living in a dorm room more acceptable! Recommended!

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Susie Williams
review: I didn't receive the product I ordered, but instead am reviewing this Scentlight, which is a flameless candle that's operated with a fan. Products like these have come a long way over the years and this is a good-looking diffuser that I don't mind keeping out (some of them are so ugly and/or cheesy and don't mix well with my decor). It also works really well! My diffuser came with a Clean Cotton fragrance refill, but when that's gone, I could purchase any other refills I wanted. Luckily, I do love Clean Cotton! I currently have this in my kitchen to test it out, but will probably move it to a bedroom since clean cotton isn't the best kitchen fragrance! However, it is very strong and despite the fact I have a large kitchen that opens up into a dining room and office, it's almost too much for me and I fear it will be way too much for a small bedroom. I do think it's better to have it too strong rather than not strong enough... It just means I usually have to turn it off long before the 5 hour timer is up. I haven't even turned it on in a few days and can still smell it when I walk by it. I love the little glow it gives off.  It automatically makes a space feel more special. Overall, this is a great product that works really well and will fit in nicely with most decor!

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Amazon Customer
review: As you can see from my photos, what I received was not the tumbler candle. I received a "Scent Light" fragrance warmer. It is a battery powered(4 AA batteries, not included) warmer that uses little scent pods(1 included). Even though it wasn't what I had ordered, I really like it. It's pretty when it's not on and even prettier when it is on. The scent pod smelled really strong and I was worried that it would be overpowering and give me a headache but in the warmer the scent is lighter. It has a good "throw" and will scent a rather large space but it's not a heavy or just "too much." I wish it had a plug in or USB option but being battery powered means you can put it just about anywhere and not worry about whether there's an outlet nearby. There is a timer feature that allows you to set it to be on for 5hrs and then shut off and then come on again automatically at the same time the following day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: August Chianese
review: Instead of the Black tea and lemon candle, they sent me a Scent Light which is a kind of diffuser which Yankee sells refills for. Mine came with Clean Cotton. Actually very happy because this thing works wonders! Put it in the corner of the room and let it go and the whole room gets a nice bit of fragrance to it that isn't too much but remains noticeable enough. It has been running a few hours a day now for over a month and its still going, so I think that's a good sign. Plus the device itself is nice looking. Its like a silver cannister design with a wood-like bottom, plus it has a light inside that pokes through little transparent spots in the silver coating. Very contemporary looking, could match with just about any decor. If you do think about getting one, I highly recommend them. I'll be getting refills for mine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Bookwyrm
review: I'm another one who thought she was getting the candle and received a Scentlight instead. I will say that the scentlight is an effective and attractive way to scent the home. It has a nice subtle pattern and doubles as a nightlight. It can be plugged in or powered by batteries and has a timer that will make it diffuse the oil for 5 hours at the same time each day so you don't have to turn it on manually. However, the "cotton" scent is very strong - so strong that I didn't even have to turn the diffuser on for the scent to fill the room. It mostly smells of laundry detergent - not exactly what I was looking for.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Where the Sidewalk Ends
review: Like many other reviewers I received the wrong item. Not sure if everyone will have this happen or of it was just a fluke. I also received the Yankee Candle diffuser. It's really nice, but I will say I'm a little bummed I didn't get to see what the black tea fragrance smells like! I love black tea, so a candle in the fragrance would be so perfect for me. Instead I got a diffuser with a clean cotton type fragrance. It works great for the bathroom, providing a night light and fresh scent throughout the day. There's a setting for having it run all the time, or 6 hours. I use the 6 hour one and it works great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Moonglow ColorKid
review: I too ordered the Yankee Candle in Black Tea and Lemon, and I would have really liked to have tried it, but instead I received a diffuser type product that requires batteries and uses scent refills.  I do not care for these types of products as disposable pods and batteries are both repeated consumption products and I prefer to use things that at least veer in the direction of sustainability rather than away from it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: S. Sadler
review: I like the idea of this "Scentlight" candle but I would have preferred a realistic flickering to the light instead of just a nightlight type glow. The fragrance is pretty strong for my small space. I only run it for 15 minutes or so at a time. I'm not a big fan of the clean cotton scent anymore either. I would have preferred the large tumbler candle instead with the Black tea and Lemon scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Anonymous Reviewer
review: Do not hesitate.  Arrived fast & my sister,  who is stressed out in the Pandemic, loves it.  Highly recommend it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Amadeus B. Klein
review: So this one is good yankee candle quality and the scent is good but you seem to be paying more for it here than from other sources by a pretty significant margin... BAsed on that I have to give this one just 3 stars for poor value overall. Just my thoughts, AK

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Rosie
review: I was supposed to get a large black tea and lemon candle but received an entirely different item. This was a battery-operated fan technology fragrance. No battery included. I don't typically use these types of stuff and was not planning to purchase the scented inserts.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: marmar
review: I got a scent light defuser  instead of the black tea candle. I got to say the light defuser is great, it has strong scent. It‚Äôs battery operated. Has 3 settings On, Off and 5 hours. I just hope amazing starts carrying the refills.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Gunnar Vogtmann
review: We really love the scent. Gives the whole area a feel of serenity and it‚Äôs flickering glow is just hypnotic to watch. Definitely a scent we will want to get again and again. Very nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle

review: I received a battery powered fan scented candle ScentLight, Clean Cotton scent. Not even the scent I ordered. It is nice, just not what I ordered. Also not a scent I like at all.

review: I have been burning this candle every holiday season for years. It never disappoints. Both sweet and refreshing in the kitchen.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle

author: MReader
review: Since inflation is in full swing I couldn‚Äôt afford one of Yankee‚Äôs larger candles anyone so I thought I‚Äôd get a smaller one. Honestly I‚Äôm embarrassed to give this as a gift so I just kept it. It‚Äôs very tiny and it lasted one use. The scent is great though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Kim
review: I absolutely LOVE the scent of this product.  Well worth the money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Tina
review: Perfect size and scent right use in my bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Iced Berry Lemonade Signature Large Tumbler Candle
author: Shey
review: no breaks during shipping yay! packaging and overall look of the container are cute and well made. smell it and lemony and tangy aromas fill you- I wish the same pungent smell filled the room when lit. while it is bolder than the other samples received- it isn't as bold as other fragrances from the brand and competitors. several lights later and I haven't made a dent in the candle yet so kudos there. if you like a light lively scent, good buy but im a bold, aromatic candle kinda gal.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sparkling Snow
author: Karen
review: Very nice as a gift. Or for your self. Has a really nice scent. Lovely for the holidays or any time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Magical Frosted Forest
author: philip mader
review: love these candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: dustrho
review: Ordered five of these candles and four of them came this way as shown in the pictures I have attached to this review. It seems to me that these may have been subjected to extreme high heat conditions since they are so warped in shape within the glass container. No way am I able to find the wick within this wax, so I am forced to return these back to Amazon. Since this came from the Yankee company I was really expecting these to be exactly as you find them in the store, but I would wrong with that thought. Even though these seem to be a good deal especially with them being on sale the way they are, I will not buy these anymore through Amazon. I‚Äôve already asked to have a full refund on the four defective candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: dustrho
review: Ordered five of these candles and four of them came this way as shown in the pictures I have attached to this review. It seems to me that these may have been subjected to extreme high heat conditions since they are so warped in shape within the glass container.
