product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Christopher Wells
review: The scent is good, it lasts pretty long, and it makes a great gift. My only problem is the price. It is a little pricey, but overall good candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jean-Pierre Kirkland
review: These candles are so easy to accommodate - no dripping wax, re-sealable to maintain the aroma and easy to move from one location to another.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Non-fiction Addiction
review: Lovely scent of oranges and honey in a large jar (22oz) with a single wick. I‚Äôve enjoyed this variety before. Great packaging and value for a long lasting candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: LionHeart
review: I love this, it's smells so light and fresh. True spring and summer candle. Arrived in one piece, was cheaper than Walmart and burns great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Alexis
review: This candle does the opposite of grow on you tbh. It kinda makes me nauseous now and I really don't like burning it anymore. But it is nice and strong!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: This was slightly disappointing in how little it smells like actual orange. It smells more like artificial orange candy, or an orange drink like Tang.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Tracy Good
review: The Macintosh  apple has a classic, fresh scent. Not too overpowering. Yankee candles last way longer than any I‚Äôve tried in the past. The price on amazon was more affordable than the stores.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jolyne
review: My favorite fragrance! Yankee candle does not disappoint with lasting quality fragrances. I‚Äôm a loyal fan. Sometimes though my orders have come broken , but they have been good about replacements

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought these on a sale for $10.  They came individually boxed and perfect for gift giving. Love the lemon scent.  Burn great.  A+

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: kayrn brumley
review: Smells wonderful...just like every Yankee I've bought before. I will add that I've never had covid, so my sense of smell is still 100%. Love your products!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Lantana Al
review: This candle looks nice... I like the yellow color... but I am quite disappointed in the smell. I'm not a fan of this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love Yankee candles & this was a great find on Amazon.  The scent of lemons is really nice, plus the price was awesome as well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jessica S.
review: The cilantro part threw me off at first but after reading comments,  I figured I'd give it a try. It smells so good. There's nothing cilantro smelling, to me anyway. Def glad I tried it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: SC
review: If your looking for a strong fresh lemon scented candle this is not for you. If you want some weird citrus chemical crap then hey hey good things have come your way. üëéüèª

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: jj
review: I had this candle burning for several hours and could not pick up on the scent. This scent has always been a favorite of mine, so that was disappointing!  I'm not sure if just got a dud; however, going off my experience --I would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sue
review: I don't mean to be a smart-a$$, but the candle smelled like mangoes and peaches- a wonderful scent! I've had mixed results with how evenly and completely my Yankee candles have burned, but this one was great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sara Slick
review: Came in perfect condition and packaged very well. Shipped quickly with no issues. Smells nice and burns like a yankee. Would buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Cher
review: I really like Yankee Candles for the quality.  This scent is very light but smells good.  If you are wanting a fill the room scent this is not for you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Matt Brown
review: You can‚Äôt go wrong with Yankee Candles and lemon for the warm weather. I really love this clean scent. Great for a gift. Their candles seem to last longer than they print on the label.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ginny L.
review: I enjoy Yankee Candles and this is no exception. Long burning. Smells wonderful. Extinguishes when you put the lid back on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Minidonut
review: Pictures shown what I received. The wax spilled off one side and it covered the candle wick. I had to melt the wax around the wick for a while in order for it to light. It can not be gifted anymore, but I do like the scent. It's smell of citrus scent and last long in my kitchen. I love all the Yankee candles; especially this scent in my kitchen. It keeps my kitchen smell fresh and odor-free

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: jason ryan
review: I like the smell, I had this candle before and had to get another one. It was more than I wanted to pay for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Trever
review: Honey Clementine smells exactly like a teenage girls room Edit: I take back what I said, once you start burning the candle is actually smells pretty good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: SMB
review: This is one of my favorite scents from Yankee Candle.  Makes you think that you're apple picking on a sunny fall day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: J. Wright
review: with a blindfold on I‚Äôd probably guess every other fruit besides pear. Smells more like vanilla than anything else, & it‚Äôs that artificial vanilla smell. disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Michelangelo
review: wish I didn't have to blast it with a torch lighter to get the sides to melt evenly, not a big deal, it's kind of fun, but probably not the best trait for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Nance
review: Nice candles for everyday use

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: cara smith
review: The candle smells great and takes a long time to run out however it was very frustrating for me since when i opened the candle box i noticed the candle was melted on one side and it melted to where all the wax was on the right side with the candle laying on its side. That is the reason im giving this 2v stars because i had to remelt it just to get to the wick to burn it and it was really hard to open.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Dan
review: Faithful Yankee candle buyer for years, haven‚Äôt bought one in awhile and the Macintosh is one of my favs. This one didn‚Äôt hold up to previous Yankee candles I‚Äôve bought. Still burns long and clean but the scent isn‚Äôt, wasn‚Äôt there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: mary
review: I had to put it in a warm oven for a couple minutes to soften the wax so I could dig out the wick to light the candle. It arrived packed well but on it's side-not a good idea for a candle  in Arizona! But I am very happy with the size of the candle and the  strong scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Christine
review: As much as we adore winter holiday festivities, we're definitely a summertime family. So we'd love to thank Yankee Candle for coming up with an appropriate candle for us! All Is Bright smells just like citronella on a balmy August night! Love it! Seriously though, would love to see White Christmas candles back. At least something similar?

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ralph
review: Smells great. Buybit now... All powerful pineapple scent though... cilantro smell is barely there. A 7 minute burn generated lots of smell in 25¬≤ room

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Riq
review: This candle will literally last you months if you don‚Äôt constantly burn it. Even if you do it will still last long and the smell is amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Cindy Kates
review: This lemon candle does have a scent but it's more like a citronella candle than lemon. I cant review the longevity of it because I put it out due to the smell. You could gift this but make sure the person likes citronella.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: EG
review: Long lasting and the fragrance is evident but not overwhelming .. not like some candles where there is no smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: J. Solomon
review: I was hoping for something like limoncello and got something a little more lemon house cleaner - will not repurchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Steven Nikolakis
review: This candle smells so good, anytime I light it before guests come over they rave about the scent. It‚Äôs smells like citrus with a hint of sweetness that is very subtle and pleasant. I would 100% buy this again for spring/summer season

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: TJ
review: I am a Yankee Candle junkie.  This candle smells like a soy candle. I just happen to not like the chemical smell of soy candles. The first 1 hour it smells like sweet lemons and then it gets bad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: cady
review: I was excited when I purchased this item regardless of the high price. It arrived yesterday and I lit it but even after an hour there was no scent. I am very disappointed with this product. I would not recommend for anyone else to make the same mistake I did by purchasing this through Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: John C. Sievers
review: Great candle- smells wonderful (especially for summer) and doesnt tunnel so it lasts a long time! Stop buying crap candles and just spend the money on a nice candle like this- would recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sabrina Bateman
review: I bought 3 of these candles thinking they would last a while. nope. don't waste your money on this scent. I could have bought a cheap fragrance less candle to the same effect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Magnolia
review: Hardly any scent. Not my experience with Yankee candles. Pretty color . Don‚Äôt know if would give as a gift due to poor scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Tmat360
review: The candle smelled great in the paper bag package, but it wasn't wrapped in bubble wrap or in a cardboard candle holder so the glass tumbler that held the candle was broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: cheetocheeto
review: Expensive for no reason. I can barely smell this so it's a waste of money. It's a totally weak scent. Big mistake buying this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Joshua Berger
review: The candle, although lovely to look at, melted very quickly down the middle which caused problems in re- lighting.  The scent is good, however.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Nicole A.
review: This is a favorite scent of mine. I absolutely adore it. It's fresh and relaxing. I will buy this again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Nancy L.
review: The yellow color is beautiful and cheerful and it will burn a long time.  HOWEVER, if you are looking for fragrance you should keep looking.  The fragrance here is SOOOOOOOO subtle that it's undetectable  (which defeats the intent of a scented candle).

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smelled great when I got it out of the box. I lit the candle and it smells like old laundry detergent . The lemon scent completely disappeared . This was for the Sicilian lemon scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: It‚Äôs smells really good and I will come back in the near future for more purchases. Candle last for a really long time. The fragrance last a really long time

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: topshelfproducts
review: This candle has no scent and burns black. I have never been so disappointed in a Yankee candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: TS
review: No scent. When unlit you can kinda smell something, so I thought the scent would get stronger when I lit the candle. Nope. I even asked others in my house and they didn‚Äôt even realized a candle was lit. Disappointing since I normal get candles for half this price during Bath and Body Works sales.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sheila B
review: It's a nice light lemon scent, it actually smells like fresh squeezed lemons, one of my favorite scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Daniel koski
review: We ordered the Macintosh candle. When we got it, the initial smell was amazing. Exactly what we wanted. But by the 2nd or 3rd day the smell wasn‚Äôt there anymore? It was more faint than strong. I saw in the reviews that others were having that issue with the smell as well but I figured we‚Äôd give it a chance. Kinda disappointed in it. Gonna be trying it out in a smaller space such as a bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sharon Kayal
review: I love this scent so much but it was melted and I‚Äôm not sure this is even salvageable, which is very disappointing because I was looking forward to burning this

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Mom.Nurse.Wife.08
review: My candles from Walmart smell much stronger. I let this burn all day and I smelled nothing. Waste of money. No idea why there are so many good reviews on the honey clementine...

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Supermom225
review: Was surprised at the fact that this candle had zero scent. Paying the price that I paid for Yankee Candle, I expected so much more. Instead all I got was a plain candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Art Department
review: Favorite candle. Long lasting smell. Best value Bought 6 in the last 6 months. Great gifts

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: angela avery
review: There was absolutely no smell to this candle unless you count the 1 you get when you blow it out. Very dissapointed. I gave 2 stars because yes it is a candle, and it did stay lit for a long time. I had a hope there might be a point where I would hit a burst of lemon smell. Never happened.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Staci N.
review: I love my candle. One of my favorites of Yankee candle. Will be buying more. Fresh/ clean sceny

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Barbara Giddens
review: I ordered 2 of these; the first one came and it was perfect, great packaging.  The 2nd one came on a different day and I thought I would have to throw it away.  Even with the great packaging, it was leaking outside the base and melted wax was everywhere, it even came through the packaging...what a mess.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Gina
review: These candles were for years highly scented, burned evenly and just all around, a great candle. But unfortunately, they haven't had the quality for a long time. I stay away from purchasing them for periods of time because of the lack of quality and return again to find they're the same or a bit worse. No more Yankee for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: sk
review: I usually enjoy candles with fruity scents but this one is terrible. Plus the smell is so strong it gives me a headache. A rare miss by Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Gessica Absi
review: This sicillian lemon is the least smelling  candle of the Yankee candle I have ever bought.  I had really high hopes and I have bribed it for hours and can‚Äôt smell it but a teeny tiny bit...so disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jadesky
review: Over priced, poor quality.  Cannot smell the candle when lit.  Can only smell when not lit and holding the candle to your nose.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Faith Rohde
review: It doesn't smell as fresh and lemony as I had hoped.  There is a chemical smell that over powers the scent of the wax.  Super bummer!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Kesha James
review: This candle's, wick on the 3rd time bring lit, began sparkling like a sparkler on 4th if July.  I have never had this happen before with Yankee.  Window of return has closed so I trashed it.  üôÅ

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: WOLF-359
review: Love the sent  of these candles .......how ever they could be a bit cheaper than they are

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Angelo Figallo
review: Great item and probably my favorite scent. I‚Äôm on my second jar of this. 1st jar took me almost a year to finish. With this quarantine going on I‚Äôll see how long this one takes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: T B
review: I was disappointed with this candle. I went to Yankee Candle because they have a great fragrance. This isn‚Äôt true with this one. After blowing out the candle black smoke billows off the wick for a while. I bought a candle that has no smell. Should have bought a glade candle. So disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Retail Therapist
review: Bit less throw than usual but worth the price. Arrived well packed and intact. Good gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: roger
review: There is no scent!! Loss of money, purchased Sicilian lemon it is a total lemon üçã üò¢

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amber Chaffee
review: I got the lemon candle and it smelled good in the jar until you burn it then it don‚Äôt smell at all! This company used to be good until the new owners and now the candles don‚Äôt smell! Down thumb what a waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: The Wolf
review: The wick is too low, the candle goes out. It is nearly full and I can't use it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jeana Lee Paccasassi
review: No scent! What a waste of $30 bucks! I‚Äôm sending back or asking for a credit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: L. Jones
review: Although the new jar shape has two wicks, these original Yankee jars last far longer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Charles Lamb
review: My favorite scent from yankee candle. the smell is crisp and refreshing. These candles also last a long time. the price was unbeatable normally 27.99 found it here for 16$ worth every penny

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ashley
review: I'm usually loyal to B&BW candles, but this was a gift. I was pleasantly surprised with the honey clementine scent and how evenly this burned with just one wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: DTT
review: Excellent packaging for  the candle to ensure non-breakage.  Love the scenf!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: katrina lomneck
review: Oh My Gosh!! this candle is AMAZING!! well worth the money!! My house smells soooo good!! Thank you so much! I will be buying more from you!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sable Jean
review: Love the smell and the color is great! I wasn‚Äôt sure buying a candle over the internet that I never got to smell but after reading the reviews I gave it a try. I was not disappointed. Great size, doesn‚Äôt take up room on the counter with its slim style and the beautiful purple glow it gives off is really relaxing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Mary Sunshine
review: could be more lemony, but it is quite nice and long lasting and i love the fresh color

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Lisa
review: I love Yankee Candles. This one did not disappoint! Smells just like fresh apples. Very happy with purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: S Radikal
review: My mother and I love love love yankee candles. The lemon lavender is her favorite of hers for sleep. Burns for 2 hours in the room before bed and just puts her right to sleep when she goes in! Anything and everything yankee is top notch!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: marjorie e.
review: I like Yankee Candles and strong but non-flowery scents. These were $16.99 with free shipping. Yankee candle wanted $29,99 plus $9.99 for shipping!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Paul
review: The candle smells fine. No issues with that. It came packaged in bubble wrap and cardboard but the glass container was still broken. Not sure if this happened at the warehouse or in transit. I can still use it but the cap doesn't fit the base due to the rim being broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Dancing Nanny
review: NOTE TO SELF: Do not buy candles online unless you have smelled the scent in person! I love yankee candles and have several favorites but this one... omg!  NO!  Just...NO! This awful scent was so bad it actually gave me a headache and negativity impacted my emotions for the entire day..after only having it lit for 20 minutes!  I had to put it out in the garage because the smell lingered in the house and stuck to the inside of my nostrils the rest of the day.  Seriously... it smells like a urinal cake... my husband confirmed this assessment!  He walked into the house and was like, ‚ÄúUm...did you use the restroom at a gas station today?!?‚Äù  This would make a great gift for someone who‚Äôs not your favorite person!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Glitter, sparkle, shine, but most of all BE KIND!!
review: This lemon lavender is my favorite scent from yankee candle. But... lemon lavender is sold out in all stores. I ordered one not too long ago here on Amazon. I needed another just because... but Amazon didn‚Äôt have them in stock. I sent hubby to the stores and hubby said there was none in stock anywhere. I had him get home sweet home instead.  Just seen Amazon had them in stock and ordered this amazing calming beautiful scent! I‚Äôm feeling like it‚Äôs Christmas. These candles fill a whole 1,750 sqft area easily. They are absolutely worth every penny. I like home sweet home too but lemon lavender is the absolute best! Both are amazing and my preference. But lemon lavender omg amazing!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: NinaPurr
review: I was very disappointed. I saw the great reviews and figured this would be an amazing candle but I was ver let down. I will say, when I opened the box, I immediately smelled the lavender. However once it started to burn, I needed 2-3 hours in my bedroom with the door closed for the smell to linger. All to go away once I open another door. Pros: big and will take long to burn - the light scent it has is pleasant in small rooms - cute colors - great for gift Cons: - smell won‚Äôt last - takes too long to actually smell. - overpriced for the quality

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: MilsNY
review: I bought this for the first time shortly before Christmas 2021 and lit it for several hours almost every day. The scent is very strong, and it smells like real so yummy - a delicious combination of lavender and lemon. I've been looking for a scent with lavender essential oils for a while, because of the great benefits in relaxing the spirit. Combining lavender with lemon is perfect for me, as it relaxes me but also uplifts me, and so I used this during the day, and absolutely LOVE it. I extinguish the flame by putting back the lid, so the smoke stays inside the container. I noticed that the smell lasts long even after I had extinguished it, and even the days I don't lit it and the container is closed I can still smell the scent. Super high quality and lovely. Highly recommended. NOTE - I have never tested CVD  positive in the two years here in NYC, and never lost my sense of smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: P. Thompson
review: First of all, Yankee Candles are one of the best that I've found and one of my go to candle companies.  Even unlit, the scent is pleasantly alive, though not as strong as when lit. For this particular scent, I was looking for a lavender scented candle specifically to burn in the evening to relax me before going to bed.  While this one isn't entirely lavender, the combination is almost mouthwatering.  Must be the addition of the lemon.  Lemon, or any citrus, is a fond favorite of mine as well. It's been a while since I've been able to burn candles and I'm so glad I can still get my favorites from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Stargazer Lily
review: The reviews are for lemon, lilac, balsam, all different scents.  Seems every once in a while someone gets a knock off.  I have ordered quite a few from Amazon and some are as strong as the ones I get from the Yankee Candle Company website directly.  Some are not.  Check the label on the bottom if you order multiple candles.  When I ordered from this page it showed 'lemon lavender'.  It does not throw a strong scent.  However, it lasts longer than my other yankee candles.  It has a different label on the bottom.  I think I got a knock off that was not as strong, but lasted longer.  The Yankee Candle Website sells Large Jar candles for $20 or less in their clearance section.  I will buy from there in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: ilsa mayer
review: Received the candle today and couldn‚Äôt wait to light it.  But what a disappointment.  Hardly any fragrance, according to the write up there should be a lot of lemon scent. It isn‚Äôt.  I ordered it because of the glowing reviews, but most of them are from 2018. So what happened.  At least I got it at the Prime day price. Won‚Äôt buy it again. A week earlier I received candles Midsummer Night and Sage Citrus.  They are both wonderful and the scent covers a couple of rooms at least.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: KatMal
review: It‚Äôs always risky purchasing something with a scent online but I‚Äôm glad I took a chance with this Lemon and Lavender Yankee Candle. I enjoy lemon and lavender but never experienced them together and I needed a new scent for my home since we‚Äôre all stuck here. I would say that the scent is a bit sweet/sugary but is not overwhelming for someone who isn‚Äôt too sensitive to smells. I‚Äôm happy with my choice and will purchase this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Chalcopyrite
review: I hate the smell of maple bacon, and my brother bought like 3 yankee candles that were not maple bacon but smelled like it. After a month of trying not to puke whenever I smelled it, I bought him this one and it's much more tolerable. Stop making gross smelling candles, thanks.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender

I didn't realize that my brother doesn't like the scent of lavender and this seemed to be a minor issue as she doesn't want to burn it at her office because of a co-worker that complains about everything... but other than that it was a hit!

Every yankee candle I've ever opened can be lit for 15 minutes and the smell flows through the entire house. With this one, I can hardly smell it while standing right next to it. product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender

Oh well, back to the Walmart ones I go!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender

However, she got into a car accident and forgot to take it out of the car, so this candle melted to the seat. After the candle was removed (the stain stays to this day) she brought it into our home and was actually able to light it for 12 more hours! This candle has long-lived past what we ever imagined it could. HIGHLY SUGGESTED!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Passionflower Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: JPH
review: This is my first, and probably my last, Yankee Candle. Takes a while to get going and would probably have been more effective as a 3-wick rather than 2-wick candle.  Scent throw is very good, subtle but pervasive over a wide area and remains in the air for a while after the candle is extinguished/covered.  The scent is very floral, pleasant, but I don't pick up the advertised lime/jasmine tea. As one reviewer has noted, after the candle burns down a bit, it really does look like a brain.  There are channels throughout the candle, making it look like the amygdala.  Perhaps a cost-cutting measure, candle burns using less wax. This candle was a nice one-off, nothing about the candle that would compel me to purchase it again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Passionflower Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Sarah Griffin
review: Scent

product_title: Yankee Candle 1131264Z Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Samantha
review: This was my first purchase of Yankee candles and I can't believe I haven't invested in them yet. First off, I got the tall tumbler with the 2 wicks. It was only $14 which was well worth it, in my opinion. These candles live up to the hype. The scent is wonderful and aromatic. Reminds me of fall which is exactly what I was trying to go for. These candles burn so evenly. I don't know if that's due to the brand and their formula in general or the double-wick, but I love it. I've burned for hours already and it's only gone down maybe about half an inch. I'm in love and a forever customer of Yankee Candle now.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1131264Z Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Amy
review: I love this candle. My landlord is also refinancing our building and had a guy from the bank look over my apartment, and the first thing he said when he walked in (into the room next to the room where the candle was burning) was, "It smells lovely in here." Perfect for apple cider lovers and fall! Would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1131264Z Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Chris
review: Bought this as a gift for my wife. Really wanted to get one called ‚ÄúRed Apple Orchard‚Äù that she had used up and really enjoyed. Took a chance on this scent and she really likes it. It‚Äôs not too strong, but strong enough to fill the house with its pleasant aroma. She‚Äôs been using is just about every other day (roughly 2 to 5 hours straight) for the last month and it‚Äôs still got a lot of candle left to burn.

It's not worth the trouble to return and after all it is a yankee candle. Just beware you may not get what you ordered.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Psalm 144 1-2
review: After reading the reviews I was reluctant to order but decided to give it a try. First time ordering a candle online, fall is our favorite time of year so I chose, autumn wreath. It arrived in 2 days (thanks prime), sealed in a cardboard container with more than enough packaging, all in one piece. Even though it‚Äôs hot here in Florida the candle didn‚Äôt melt so way to go!! The smell is a perfect blend of clove, leaves and a hint of allspice. Not over powering just right. My mom happened to be visiting when the package arrived. She has a very sensitive nose yet she loved it so much I‚Äôm now ordering her one. My husband also loves it, he‚Äôs from the Blue Ridge Mountains and said the scent reminds him of autumn up there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Psalm 144 1-2
review: After reading the reviews I was reluctant to order but decided to give it a try. First time ordering a candle online, fall is our favorite time of year so I chose, autumn wreath. It arrived in 2 days (thanks prime), sealed in a cardboard container with more than enough packaging, all in one piece. Even though it‚Äôs hot here in Florida the candle didn‚Äôt melt so way to go!! The smell is a perfect blend of clove, leaves and a hint of allspice. Not over powering just right. My mom happened to be visiting when the package arrived. She has a very sensitive nose yet she loved it so much I‚Äôm now ordering her one. My husband also loves it, he‚Äôs from the Blue Ridge Mountains and said the scent reminds him of autumn up there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kyle H
review: During pretty much any time of year I'm burning candles. I've burned cheaper ones like "American home" or "village candle" and I've burned nicer one's like "yankee" or "kringle". The cheaper candles are always faster burning and less fragrant. It's worth it to get a decent candle. Unless you REALLY want a specific (usually seasonal) scent, don't pay more than around 18$ for one of these. I've seen a bunch on here for like 25$+ and at that cost you're better off ordering kringle or some "artisan" brand. For 18ish bucks this candle is fantastic. This specific scent has lasted longer than some others, in that everyday I light it I can still smell it despite burning it for a week. Your nose and sense of smell is logarithmic (like your other senses) and after you have been exposed to the same smell for long enough, your brain stops recognizing it as unique and potent to your environment. It helps to buy several scents and rotate between them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Cher
review: I‚Äôve always been a Yankee candle fan, until recently. The quality isnt what it used to be. I received a candle today and was shocked when I took the top off of the candle. It had mold on the top. At first I thought it was just air bubbles, but after getting a magnifying glass out and looking at it, it is definitely mold. I called customer service and they said I may have to return it for my refund. Which means I have to take it across town to the UPS store to return it. I was sold faulty merchandise and it should not be my responsibility to take care of a bad product. Beside the mold issues, which is enough, it barely had a scent. It may smell stronger once it is burning, but there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm burning this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Karina-Oh!
review: It's worth the effort to always see what Amazon Warehouse has in stock before you buy your item. I've gotten in the habit of doing this when I'm looking for a Yankee Candle. I found a Spiced Pumpkin large jar candle just a couple of days ago that was reduced to $13.39. So I decided to give it a shot. All of my past experiences have been good and this one was no exception! It arrived 1 full day early & it was very carefully packed. Upon opening, the jar was in excellent condition. Everything about the candle is authentic Yankee quality. However, when I removed the glass lid I saw that the wick was slightly singed, yet none of the wax surrounding it had been melted. Sort of like it had been lit and immediately blown out. It wasn't intended to be a gift; but if it was it wasn't giftable, so I rated it only 1 star for that category. I lit my candle and in a few seconds, no one was the wiser, lol... This candle currently costs $24.97 brand new on Amazon. I can live with the savings of $11.58, though. It pays to check the Amazon Warehouse from time to time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Nancy S.
review: It is a Yankee candle, came in a Yankee Candle box in one piece. Smells good before lighting it. But, it appears that during production the wax was old or something as there are a lot of what appears to be air bubbles through out the wax in the jar. Since its not a gift I went ahead and lit the wick. It is a faint scent, smells good, but hardly able to smell it unless I'm right up on the candle. I like candles to smell strong enough to fill my living room with scent. I wont purchase this again as not worth the money spent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Michele F
review: I have been buying Yankee Candles for years. My favorite is Macintosh apple. When I saw this scent, I decided to try it. Initially the scent was wonderful, my whole place smelled like someone was baking with cinnamon. I thought I had found a new favorite. Fast forward a couple of weeks. Once the candle had burned down about an inch, all of the scent disappeared. I am so disappointed. I have practically a whole candle that has no aroma. I've never experienced this with a Yankee Candle before, however I've read many reviews from people who have experienced a similar issue with other scents. If you're looking for a long lasting candle with a nice scent, steer clear of sugared cinnamon apple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Martha Male
review: I don‚Äôt always write a review for my orders, but after reading the reviews from previous purchasers I felt I should. My candle arrived today and it‚Äôs amazing!!! I am so pleased! With Covid, going to Yankee Candle just isn‚Äôt going to happen. Took a chance and I am so happy I did! It‚Äôs just what my home needs this fall. If I am going to continue to be stuck at home, damn sure it is going to need to smell good!! I have a husband and animals, they don‚Äôt smell good. My candle is my Covid hero!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Gina G-Lover
review: The first one I ordered arrived semi melted. See my photos. You‚Äôll see one where it actually leaked thru the cardboard it was packed in & thru that to the box it was mailed in. I returned it & got a replacement. The second one arrived semi melted too but not as bad as the first one. See photos. The top of the candle wasn‚Äôt flat & it got wax inside the cover & like stained it. I couldn‚Äôt wipe it clean. The second one wasn‚Äôt that bad so I kept it & it‚Äôs actually almost all gone because I‚Äôve been burning it. I was a big fan of Yankee candles because you could always smell the scent through out your house but I didn‚Äôt find that with this one? Not sure why?? Funny thing is I ordered this I believe in November/December & it‚Äôs not hot enough for the wax to be melting inside the candle during the shipping process. I don‚Äôt think I will buy anymore Yankee candles‚Ä¶besides the other ones I bought through here & had issues with too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: Great scent, arrived within 24 hours..the only reason for 3 stars instead of 5 is because it arrived melted (as pictured), it was supposed to be a gift, but is not presentable, so I'll just use it in my jar warmer instead. I bought 2 Harvest, still waiting on arrival of second candle, hopefully it's not melted too....*note, I also purchased 2 other yankee scents (mistletoe) ,they arrived within 24 hours & are not melted...I mentioned that because its june, & all candles are not melted.*

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Joe E.
review: I have purchased many different brands of candles over the years trying to find a company that competes in its fragrances with Yankee candles. I finally decided several years ago that I would only buy Yankee candles and stop wasting my money on the other brands, since I am always disappointed with them. I was thrilled when I found my favorite Cranberry Chutney jar candle available on Amazon a couple of weeks before Christmas. However, as I have burned it over the past several days, I have been extremely disappointed. My house used to be filled with the delicious aroma from this candle, but this time, I can barely smell it. I have heard the excuse that people are complaining about Yankee candles' scents this year due to a loss of smell from Covid-19. That is not the case with me, because I have not contracted covid, and my sense of smell is just fine. If other people are complaining, I have a feeling the Yankee Candle Company has changed something in the way it adds the different fragrances to their candles, so now, they are less potent than they always have been. I want a candle that can fill my house with a delicious scent, not one that I have to keep trying to smell! If you are expecting the Yankee Candle of old when you purchase this one, you will be disappointed. Please, Yankee Candle Company, go back to your former formulas for your candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ann McD
review: You cannot beat the price of an authentic Yankee Candle. I live in MA and it‚Äôs hard to find any on sale Amazon had the best selection. I buy them all the time for gifts. They‚Äôre packaged exactly how the company would ship them. I‚Äôve had bathe and body works candles show up broken and glass everywhere. Not these! This candle has incredible throw of scent and it lasts forever! For $19 I‚Äôm blown away. It‚Äôs like getting 4 regular candles in one. No comparison. Highest quality and timeless scent is worth the price. Thanks Amazon for letting me keep one lit every day! Makes my house homey! Perfect gifts- I recommend the sage and citrus, lilac as well. Not pink sands‚Ä¶ avoid that one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Weekend Coffee Guru
review: I am a long time purchaser of Yankee Candles and for the most part have always been satisfied with their products.  That being said, the Autumn Wreath Candle by Yankee Candle is very disappointing.  This candle has no scent what so ever unless you count the smell given off by a typical unscented candle.  Perhaps these candles lose their scent over time and this just happens to be a very old candle at the time of my purchase.  I also had made a gift of a second Autumn Wreath candle to a close friend and she also stated that her candle had no scent either.  At the same time I purchased a second scented Yankee Candle this one being Balsam & Cedar and am quite happy with that purchase.  Could it be just a bad batch of Autumn Wreath Candles?  Who knows?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Pamela Edwards
review: I bought Autumn leaves  2 years ago and absolutely loves the scent. I burned it almost every day due to a large animal population living with us at the time. It was amazing. I bought a new one a few weeks ago and I‚Äôm SO DISAPPOINTED. It barely smells, and it‚Äôs very different from the old one. I also bought Yankee candles in the past that came shattered when I opened them. I even reordered and the same thing happened. I also bought a lavender scented one that is disappointing. Yankee candles used to be the very best. My Fresh Roses one is almost gone ( it was perfect) but I doubt I will be reordering any more. I certainly hope Yankees Candles reads these reviews. It seems I‚Äôm not alone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Chase
review: Arrived completely defective. It was visually leaking outside the packaging and this was clearly on Yankee Candle's end because the rest of my products inside the same Amazon box were all completely fine. Absolutely unacceptable. I usually buy from Village Candle instead, and believe me, you should too. I have had issue with every Yankee Candle I've purchased before and never a problem with their #1 competition...I'll let you draw your own conclusions on which company to buy from!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: scarredforlife
review: The last 3 Yankee Candle purchases I made were horrible.  On 6 candles, 3 large jars, 1 large two wick tumbler, and 2 perfect pillars, the wicks will burn to the level of the wax before the top of the wax is fully melted to the edges of the glass.  The worst of the bunch was my latest, a two-wick tumbler in "Crisp Fall Night". After the 6 prior candles I bought with 6 bad wicks, I waited for a year before I bought this newest candle.  I see it's still the same.  The Crisp Fall Night candle didn't make it past 1.5 hours until the wicks were burned right to the wax level.  I don't have this problem with any other brand.  I guess Yankee will be without a customer.  Strangely, I don't think they'll miss me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: DrM
review: I purchased this from Amazon and did not use it right away. When I went to use it, the wick was not useable so I could not burn the candle. I called Yankee Candle since it was outside Amazon's return window and they refused to replace it, kept referring me back to Amazon--even though it was not Amazon's fault they made a defective product. Very disappointed in Yankee Candle customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ariana
review: What‚Äôs not to love about a nice fall/winter candle? I chose this scent because it has a lot of spice accents to it, so I can use it when fall is approaching, but I can also use it as a Christmas candle because of the warm spice scents. I also purchased one for my stepdad and he uses it all the time - and it‚Äôs still very full, so he‚Äôll get a lot more use out of it. I love Yankee Candles because they tend to last a super long time, so they may be more pricey sometimes but it‚Äôs worth the money. Not to mention, sometimes Yankee Candles sold on Amazon are marked down to $15 or $16 as opposed to the full $30 price that Yankee Candle sells them for in their stores and on their website. A huge steal in my opinion! I only ever buy my Yankee Candles off of Amazon for this reason. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: ned stone
review: The scent from this candle is unbelievably warm and long lasting. The fragrance smells like the real thing not chemically made. The jar and lid are heavy duty even surviving a fall from a desk.  The wick is thick and lights up immediately and does not turn off unless I turn it off. The fragrance extends outside my home but is not over bearing or ‚Äúfake‚Äù smelling. It‚Äôs been used for over 20 hours and it is 2/3 finished. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: I am so sad this candle sucked so bad. I bought this maybe a week or two ago. And it is literally one of the worst I have ever dealt with. It came with weird wicks. I clipped them in the hopes to fix it. But from the get it constantly will not stay lit. I have soaked out wax with cotton balls. And everything else I know to do. At this stage I am half way through it and to make it work I am dumping out wax. I bought this maybe 2 weeks ago. It‚Äôs a real shame :( something with this is just off. I have never before had a yankee candle be a dud. But I will not buy this one ‚Äòcrisp fall night‚Äô ever ever again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Hal and Michelle
review: The Cranberry Chutney Yankee Candle is even better than it's description. The fragrance is superb and fills the first floor of our home without being overpowering. The longevity is far superior to other candles and burns exactly as it should. If I had to select one word to describe this particular scent, I'd say "delicious". Several reviews mentioned that their candles arrived with the glass jar broken. That was NOT my experience. The packaging was very secure...and I ordered three others. Absolutely no issue at all. GREAT JOB!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Joe
review: Wife ordered 2 of the pumpkin spice candles.  When we opened them the smell was strong.  Hit us right in the face like a Yankee Candle normally does.  That was the end of that.  As soon as we lit it there was no smell at all.  Was lit for hours and the house just smelled like burnt wax.  2 of these burning in the house at the same time would normally make every floor in the house smell good.  Nope not these.  Disappointed in them.  Will be returning.  Seems pretty common based on the reviews not sure how people lucked out with good smelling ones and others didn't.  Maybe they are hit or miss but usually everytime I've ever bought a Yankee Candle directly from the store itself the scent was always really strong when they were burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: I buy a new pumpkin apple yankee candle every fall, and decided to try ordering through amazon and it's the exact same candle and scent. Mine arrived in one piece and I took it straight to my office and light it daily. The scent is amazing and I cannot go through fall without it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: N&G
review: I got the Sugared Cinnamon Apple and find that the scent is very similar to Home Sweet Home, but a little less "Christmas-y" and heavy in the scent like HSH. I think Sugared Cinnamon Apple a good transition into winter months, or good for warmer weather versus Home Sweet Home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Dan B.
review: The product is fantastic! The problem is Bezos taking his cut which don't leave much meat on the bone for the seller, and I think that's BULLSHlT!! I sincerely hope, from the bottom of my heart that Jeff and the Sanchez live forever! Again, fantastic product! Great seller! Thank you very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Rich Briere
review: The Candles are Fabulous........Best on Earth....but have you purchased one of these to go with it?  3 times the Candle Life by NOT using Scissors to cut the wicks on your Candles.  Don't be a Mister Bungle..... Add this to your order. "EricX Light Candle Wick Trimmer, Polished Stainless Steel Wick Trimmer".  Do I have anything to do with that Company?  Nope..... but you should get a couple of 'em with the order you're about to place. :)  RB https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01N78UYIZ/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_FctOFbPBNDNVA

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kate C
review: Received my candle quickly, however I noticed immediately when I opened it that there was liquid surrounding the lid of the candle. Prior to opening it also looked red all inside of the lid and on the upper walls of the candle. Open the lid and the candle is liquidy and getting all over my hands. The top of the candle has visible air bubbles on top of the candle with melted candle all over the sides. I would not give this for a gift, but technically is still usable it is just not visibly nice to be sitting on top of a table.  I am wondering if this will burn through quickly because the consistency does not seem to be of a usual candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: ajones
review: I have older "spiced pumpkin" candles -- it has a strong, pleasant scent. These older candles can be identified by the label: If it says "a subsidiary of Jarden Corporation", BUY IT!  If it says, "a subsidiary of Newell Brands", BUY SOMETHNG ELSE! These new ones are "meh". I'm not impressed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: EmBee
review: One of YCCs best fall scents (even good for winter). Smells like apples and woodsy as well as sweet spices. Not overpowering but excellent throw. Doesn‚Äôt tunnel too much. I use a topper and every so often push down some wax that builds up on edges with butter knife. Beautiful shade and label. Make sure you trim wick to 1/4‚Äù after each use. Burns best this way.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: LeAnne P
review: This candle was either fake or old. I've had new Yankees in Spiced Pumpkin before, and the smell is amazing. This one? Nothing. I let it burn for an hour and could not smell it. I left the room for a while and came back - still nothing. There is no point to an $18 spiced pumpkin candle if it does not smell and smell strongly. Returned.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Colton
review: Candle was shipped without the original box, loose rolling around in the Amazon box missing the lid. Pretty ridiculous to pay almost 30 dollars for a candle that was obviously not original stock. Even then the candle did not burn well the wicks burn down too short and end up tunneling, pouring out wax exposing more wick did not work either as the wick burned short again. Scent was good is about the only positive thing about it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Merressa
review: So I heard so many Good things about these candles so I decided to try one this year . I usually Grab some Bath and body works but didn‚Äôt feel like going into a store with Covid & all and that‚Äôs the fun part so decided to add one of these to my order . I‚Äôm not sure if mine was just a bad apple but I barely could smell anything I gave it about 3 tries before I decided to fill for a refund but I was definitely not satisfied. If I where you just Grab some Bath and body works They never disappoint

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smells nice but is no where near as nice as a real Yankee candle.  I think these are counterfeit - someone kept the jar and refilled it with a candle but it just is not as strong nor pleasant as a real Yankee candle.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Rambonrse
review: I LOVE the smell of fall spices. However, some of the candles made by Yankee seem to burn faster than they used to, which is disappointing. I will purchase this again because of the smell, and price was reasonable (~$18). Wish Yankee would do more quality control with their wax to slow burning time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Hope4Humanity
review: This candle doesn‚Äôt disappoint. It has a very pleasant fragrance that reminds me of holiday cooking, like pumpkin pies, apple pies, etc. It‚Äôs been a staple in my candle collection for years and I use it throughout the different seasons.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Scott Lamb
review: Everyone out there in Amazon Land take heed. Yankee Candles are not worth the money, you‚Äôre basically paying for the name. I bought 3 candles, had them lit for well over an hour and could barely pick up any scent other then the burning wicks. Granted some scents maybe stronger then others, but I‚Äôm not willing to take that chance. Will not purchase Yankee Candles again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kimigo
review: Apple Pumpkin is my very favorite harvest time scent for October and November. All the scents of the season in this one, great throw without being overpowering. The candle is a beautiful color that blends perfectly with my fall decor. Yankee Candle did a great job on Apple Pumpkin!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Laura Kirkland
review: Like many customers say in their reviews, very low scent. Not like any of the Yankee candles I've bought in the past. Also arrived shattered like so many others. What is going on, Yankee??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Todd
review: I'm a fan of Yankee Candle and have even visited their facility/headquarters. I've never purchased a candle from them and been disappointed . . . until this candle.  I ordered this and also a Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup, for the Fall season.  We can barely smell anything from the Yankee Spiced Pumpkin.  For a similar seasonal scent, I'd recommend the Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup. Great scent. Yankee needs to go back to the drawing board on the Spiced Pumpkin.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Rcbird
review: I ordered the Honey Crisp Apple Cider candle. It‚Äôs been burning for at least an hour and there is little to no smell. I‚Äôve never had this issue with Yankee Candles in the past so not sure if this is a fake or they are starting to lack. Would leave 0 stars if I could. Don‚Äôt waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Mimi
review: I am very disappointed in this Yankee candle. I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for more than 20 years. This my first Yankee Candle purchase on Amazon. In the past, I have always purchased from Hallmark Stores or Bed, Bath & Beyond, and never suffered a low quality Yankee Candle. This candle from Amazon vendor has a very weak scent. Past purchases had scents so strong the fragrance required burning a short 10 minutes only.  I have burned this fake candle almost 2 hours to only get a faint Autumn Harvest scent by sniffing near the jar. Having bought a same scent Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer, I am astounded at the difference being night & day. This is a knock-off Yankee Candle and my last purchase of such on Amazon. I would not recommend any fragrance offered of this cheaper version. You get what you pay for‚Ä¶buyer beware! Burned but not by the candle wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: E
review: I read reviews that said this had a very weak scent, but I gave it a shot anyway. First, it arrived in a Yankee Candle branded box, as if it was shipped directly from the source, and it was packaged well. Although when I took the top off, there were weird bubbles on the top of the candle that deprecated when I touched them...weird! I was just in a full price Yankee Candle store yesterday and it appeared to be the same candle (I shouldn‚Äôt have hesitated and just bought it directly from the store). I lit the candle and went into another room to test it out. I waited to see if the fragrance would carry over to the room I was in, because that‚Äôs what happens with my other Yankee Candles. I checked periodically and there was zero scent. The only time I smelled anything at all was if I stood directed over the candle and put my face close to the top. This is ridiculous. I think this is an OLD candle. Just like perfume, I think candles can lose their potency. Don‚Äôt waste your money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: B. J. Cory
review: I have been buying these candles for years, maybe too many.  For the most part, I like them.  However, because the large ones last a fair amount of time, they should really have two wicks.  Most of them don't burn eve Love You and one must move the wick back to center after every burn while soft or you end up removing all the unburned wax from the edge.  Removing and letting melt usually works but, for the price, I don't think I should have to do that.  Please just add a second wick to the large size.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Florida Girl
review: Love Yankee candles but this was the very first I have purchased that had absolutely NO SCENT!  It‚Äôs still a pretty candle but without the scent‚Ä¶‚Ä¶so disappointing. What happened Yankee Candles?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: 1956netta
review: I purchased this Candle in November, & saved this particular candle to light closer to the week of Christmas. The scent whatever it is did not work for me. There is hardly a scent, & smells nothing like Apple Cinnamon. The way it burns, & aside of the wax looking really weird, I‚Äôm inclined to believe this is not an Authentic ‚ÄúYankee Candle!‚Äù Will be returning!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Bone
review: NOT an authentic Yankee candle not even close, burning in a small room for almost 3 hours now and can barely smell it. Sad that amazon keeps letting sellers rip buyers off with replica products. A true Yankee candle burning for 3 hours would over power a large house, with which ever scent is burning. This candle is 5 feet from me and I smell nothing. Got up left the room came back in a few times and could barely smell it when i re entered. Its what i get for trying to save $10 bucks. Ill be ordering directly from Yankee from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Joe Morrow
review: Love the scent of this particular candle. Seasonal and warm. My kids love it, too. These candles last forever - dozens of hours of burn time. Do need to use a wick cutter, but that's basic candle care. When these go on sale, I love to give them away as holiday gifts because there is such a variety that they are customizable in terms of who I give them to.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Chandra
review: I got an off brand yesterday (different candle. It‚Äôs 10000% better than this one) that puts this candle to shame. Also wtf is this? Messy packaging and melted. Will not be buying another yankee candle with my own money ever again. Village candle is way better and much more worth it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Nora M .
review: This is the first Yankee Candle that I didn't care for . The scent was not as I expected at all. The scent was more like a rancid and old smell . Was not giftable at all , the top of the wax was bubbly and discolored.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Dennis Husejnovic
review: I don't know if what I got was fake but I was never this disappointed by a Yankee candle. The pumpkin spice candle smelled like burning wax, no scent at all. I wonder if I was sent a fake... Never spending the money on them again, now they are expensive for no reason.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: NO SCENT...I have never had a Yankee Candle with no scent!  I was so disappointed!  If you buy Yankee you know that delicious scent usually permeates the entire room/ house.  Not sure if these are factory rejects or what?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Colette Burns
review: I was disappointed when it came and was smashed, but contacted seller and they are replacing immediately.  I bought my daughter one and hers was fine. Several are writing about the lack of fragrance, but mine is great and strong and I can smell throughout my house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Lateralus
review: This candle does not give off hardly any scent. Unfortunately this is not the first Yankee candle I have purchased that gives off almost no discernable aroma. I jumped on google to see if anyone else has had these issues with Yankee candles and apparently this has been going on for eight or nine years with even ardent candle enthusiasts and fans of the company itself blogging, filing consumer complaints, and posting to message boards with the same complaint. How can you be atop the scented candle market with the most aggressive pricing and change the potency and ingredients that got you to the top on the first place?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ben
review: The media could not be loaded. I bought this candle for about $20. It was bought using a gift card & I had no idea if it was worth it, but I wanted a candle & this scent caught my attention, and I am not dissapointed. I've had the candle lit for 12+ hours and it hardly made a dent in the wax. I've used it everyday since I recieved it 3 days ago. The scent takes just a little while to set in, but it will fill a room unlike some soy blends. I am almost certain that this candle will last me until March/April. And when that time comes, I WILL buy another. I recorded a video to show the small dent it has made. (Ignore the WAP in the back)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Brooke1982
review: I worry about buying candles online because sometimes they come melted, cracked, or older with no scent. This candle smells like it should and is in gift giving condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: Overall, my customer experience is positive. I ordered Cranberry Chutney, which smells just like a cranberry-scented Febreeze spray that I bought last fall. On a negative note, the scent isn't very strong...it's better for a small room (hence, my 4-star review). Last, although the first candle arrived shattered, I had no problem getting a free replacement. The next one arrived three days later, thankfully unbroken. In conclusion, this candle is not my favorite because of its weak throw, and I will probably purchase only if on a good sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Lisa D. Sample-Page
review: I‚Äôve always loved Yankee Candles,  I especially love the ‚Äúautumn‚Äù aromas.  This candle definitely delivered, great aroma, last forever, would make a great gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: K. Daisley
review: I can't even write a review of the product because the jar arrived smashed and the candle in pieces. Not even able to return it without risking injury. *Update* I've changed this to four stars because the company immediately replaced the broken candle for me without issue.  I love the scent and I would be happy to order again thanks to the great customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Janellemp
review: My household loves Yankee Candles. We purchased the Spiced Pumpkin scent for the fall. I've tried the votive size before and they spelled great. However, this larger jar doesn't seem to smell much. When we burn the candle, we can barely smell it. Disappointing because it's such a large jar. The candle was packaged very well so there was no issues with breaking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: QAmidala29
review: This is my least favorite of all the YC candles. You can't smell anything within the first 30 minutes; after that it just smells like a burning candle. I would not recommend. I'm going with my normal smells next time. Don't get me wrong I still love YC candles but I'm also trying to go towards SOY candles to help with in home toxins and help out my air filter.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Courtney
review: I bought 5 of these for myself and my family as gifts. I feel terrible i gave these to my fam. They don‚Äôt smell like anything at all. Not my experience with yankee candles.. don‚Äôt know what to make of how not good these are.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: kathy b.
review: I always buy yankee candles but I think this is the last time I have bought 3 in the last 2 or 3 months and I do not get that high smell like I got in the past years.  I don't know what you have done but the candels are not the same the smells are VERY VERY FAINT  I AM UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER AS OF NOW

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Nonnie
review: I burned this candle for 3 hrs & it gave off no scent, at all. I grew up in MA where authentic Yankee Candles were manufactured. The reason everyone paid extra was for the extraordinary scent, which filled the New England homes. I bought 2 of these & neither of them give off any scent. Dollar store candles are better than these. Do Not  Buy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Moby
review: I am so Disappointed. I read several of the reviews that said that this Yankee pumpkin spice candle had very little scent but others  were very positive so I decided to go ahead and purchase it. Well I‚Äôm here to tell you there is NO SCENT WHATSOEVER! It‚Äôs been a number of years since I bought a Yankee candle as I had become disillusioned with less and less scent that they gave off but this is the worst ever. Grateful that I didn‚Äôt pay full price for this although it‚Äôs a total waste of money for me. Never again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Mike Graff
review: Smell is good, but it is the name you're paying for. Plenty of less expensive candles that last as long and smell as strong and good for about half the price. Burnt the candle about 1/3 of the way and the way it was made,, the wick was too close to the glass and it cracked from the heat.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Jaclyn Hensley
review: It was major savings and a risk (scent). Hope it smells better while burning. Apple is great, but the pumpkin or combining it has that indescribable unnatural tinge I dont like.  Packaged was impressive! Always worry about glass! Egg carton around the candle and fit snuggled in Yankee candle box, shipped in another box.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Philly T.
review: This candle burned out constantly. I trimmed wick but every time there was a pool of melted wax that would put out flame. This candle did not smell on opening ! It may be old but did not work like atypical Yankee. It was tossed when at half full ,the glass cracked. Very unhappy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Wright
review: This scent sugar pumpkin swirl smells so good and delicious. The scent last forever in your house. I used it one night and came home the next day at 6 pm and my house still smelled wonderful. Coming back for more. Reminds me of the maple bar doughnuts I use to eat as a kid.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Bgood
review: I am a frequent yankee candle shopper. I like my candles on the stronger side and this fell way short of that. Its a Light, crisp, sweet, fall scent. Nice for a small space but does nothing in a larger room. Kept it lit for hours, smell didnt last. Wasted money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Diann
review: Very disappointed in these candles. Very little to no  fragrance. I burned and also tried to even use as a tart melt. I would not suggest this candle if you‚Äôre looking for a scented candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: MCM
review: Very strong, smells like Fall, and permeates through the house. For awhile Yankee Candle's candles were not as strong as they used to be. This is a winner! Will order more!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Marta
review: Read all the raving reviews and had to get it now for the holidays. My family walked in Thanksgiving and immediately mentioned how wonderful my home smelled and they weren't talking about the turkey. Fills your home with this cozy, warm smell. I'm glad I got 2 of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: CarrieJo-83
review: While I will admit the scent of the candle is WONDERFUL! The whole candle is garbage. I ordered this on 12/27. This is how it arrived. Melted and not usable. I contacted Amazon.com who said I had to contact Yankee Candle and I did. No response. No refund. No replacement. So this $20 candle is garbage. Pretty disappointed. Especially in the Yankee Candle brand who claims they pride themselves on customer satisfaction. Buyer beware! If it arrives damaged, you‚Äôre stuck with it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ann Marie Thompson
